DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Modus Toscana IGT, Italian Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Modus Toscana Red Wine is full-bodied with a modern style and rich with silky tannins, making it the perfect addition to an elegant wine and cheese party.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Modus Toscana Red Wine weaves together vibrant fresh fruit flavors from sangiovese, cabernet sauvignon and merlot red grapes with finesse, each adding their own distinctive characteristics. Sangiovese lends texture, merlot works in smoothness and cabernet gives structure. This red wine blend is intriguing on the nose with initial aromas of mature red and black fruits, such as cherries, plums, and small black berries. These intense aromas are complemented by hints of spices, sweet tobacco and refined balsamic notes. Full-bodied with a modern style, this red wine blend is rich with silky tannins and a long finish of vanilla and red berry. Containing the best grapes from the Poggio Casciano estate, this Italian wine reveals itself without coaxing or manipulation. Pair a glass with duck and pancetta, beef-stuffed manicotti and aged cheeses. Store this bottle of wine at room temperature, but refrigerate for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring a glass. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Vendange Chardonnay white wine has an inviting aroma of freesia, along with green apple and added layers from oak. It is full-flavored, balanced making it an idea wine for entertaining.
ProductDescLong: Established as one of America’s best-selling wines, Vendange offers a selection of well-balanced and high-quality varietal wines at reasonable prices. Easily recognized by its elegant and distinctive triangle-shaped label, Vendange is the ideal wine for entertaining or enjoying with a meal at home. With its fruit-forward varietal characteristics, Vendange wine is perfect for everyday consumption. This chardonnay has an inviting aroma of freesia, along with green apple and added layers from oak. It is a full-flavored, balanced, delicious wine with some apple and pear notes and a hint of toasted oak.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Cribari Cellars Dessert Madeira, Red Wine, 5 L Box
ProductDescShort: Cribari Cellars Dessert Madeira is sweet, slightly crisp, with a nutty flavor complemented citrus and pears. Use this red wine to enhance your meals by adding it to your chicken or veal recipe.
ProductDescLong: Traditional dessert wines that are perfect for any culinary application, Cribari offers a range of premium flavors that add to any chef’s arsenal. Cribari Cellars' award-winning madeira is made by a method called baking which recreates the flavor created centuries ago during transport from Spain to the West Indies. Cribari Madeira is a deep amber color, sweet, slightly crisp, with a full nutty flavor complemented by a fragrant bouquet of citrus and pears. You can enjoy this fine red wine as an aperitif or enhance your meals by adding it to your favorite chicken or veal recipe. Cribari brings out the flavor in wine-based dishes.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Estancia Zinfandel, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: We grew the fruit for this Estancia Zinfandel in our Keyes Canyon Vineyard in Paso Robles, where vines struggle to produce fruit. This red wine is deeply concentrated with intense varietal flavors.
ProductDescLong: Estancia's vineyard lies in the Thermal Rainbow of Monterey County, which features midday heat tempered by morning and late-afternoon fog - perfect for developing the intense fruit character. Pinnacles Vineyard was one of the first vineyards in the Paso Robles appellation to be planted with a permanent irrigation system. This zinfandel displays densely packed black raspberry, dark chocolate and cinnamon flavors followed by a long, rich finish. Enjoy and indulged with friends for an unforgettable food and wine experience. Varietal: 100% zinfandel.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Franciscan Vineyard Signature Napa Valley Reserve Merlot, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Franciscan Napa Valley Reserve Merlot red wine has aromas of pretty berry, sweet cherry vanilla, and milk chocolate. Textured and rich, the flavors echo the aromas with anise, toffee and plum.
ProductDescLong: Founded in 1973, Franciscan has a long tradition of crafting wine with a highly meticulous approach. Franciscan's home estate is located in Oakville, right in the heart of the Napa Valley appellation. This 240-acre parcel of land features loamy, gravelly, well-draining soil which adds structure to the wines. At Franciscan Estate, the wine lots are kept separate from the vineyard until just before bottling. After picking by hand, every load of grapes is assigned its own tank. Franciscan Napa Valley Reserve Merlot red wine has aromas of pretty berry, sweet cherry vanilla, and milk chocolate. Soft and seamless, neatly woven with a velvety mouthfeel. Textured and rich, the flavors echo the aromas with anise, toffee and plum. Varietal: 93% merlot, 7% syrah.
ProductBullet05: Soft and seamless, neatly woven with a velvety mouthfeel
ProductBullet08: Napa Valley appellation

DigitalCatalogProductName: Clos du Bois Pinot Grigio, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Clos du Bois Pinot Grigio has aromas of white peach, melon, and pink grapefruit with delicate floral notes. This white wine has a mouthfeel of a vibrant, lively acidity and a long, crisp finish.
ProductDescLong: Clos du Bois Winery farms almost 800 acres in the vibrantly diverse wine regions of Sonoma County and Coastal California. Working with a family of trusted growers from some of the best vineyards, each vintage is crafted to achieve balance, intensity, and true varietal character. This Clos du Bois Pinot Grigio has a pale silver straw color with aromas of white peach, melon, and pink grapefruit, with delicate floral notes. In the mouth, this white wine exhibits a vibrant, lively acidity with bright citrus flavors of lime zest, grapefruit, and stone fruit, with hints of minerality and a long, crisp finish. Pair this wine with Asian food, especially anything infused with garlic and coconut-milk-based curries. It is also delicious with raw fish, oysters, mussels, and clams.

ProductDescShort: Black Box Wines Pinot Noir displays aromas of strawberry and cherry with hints of toasty oak. Berry and cocoa flavors and a delicate, lingering finish that complements roasted poultry or vegetables.
ProductDescLong: Made from grapes harvested in world-class appellations, Black Box Wines have won over 70 Gold Medals at wine competitions throughout the US and have been awarded over 34 Wine Enthusiast Best Buys. Through a meticulous winemaking process, each of our wines is crafted to be food-friendly, fruit-forward and easy-to-drink. DigitalCatalogProductName: Mark West Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mark West Chardonnay has citrus and pear aromas followed by lush peach, melon, green apple, and mineral flavors with a toasty oak finish. This white wine pairs with cobb salad or grilled salmon.
ProductDescLong: Mark West Wines accepts nothing less than the best, which is why we source the fruit for our the wines is sourced from the finest vineyards throughout California. After harvest, the grapes were gently crushed and underwent two to three weeks of cool fermentation—that's what makes it fresh! The wine was aged in French oak. This chardonnay has citrus and pear aromas followed by lush peach, melon, green apple, and mineral flavors with a toasty oak finish. This white wine pairs best with grilled cheese with tomato soup, a cobb salad, grilled salmon, or really go for it with apple pie à la mode.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Lightly Oaked Chardonnay, White Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Lightly Oaked Chardonnay White Wine offers a consistent, approachable, and perfectly balanced wine with bright fruit flavors and a creamy finish.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Lightly Oaked Chardonnay White Wine presents the premium taste and quality that comes from state-of-the-art winemaking technology and unique growing techniques. Sourced from California's Central Coast, Woodbridge Chardonnay grapes undergo light aging in oak casks that results in a wine with fresh, balanced acidity. This crisp white wine features fragrant citrus and floral aromas that give way to luscious flavors of lemon cream, green apple and juicy nectarine. That refreshing and vibrant taste makes this California chardonnay excellent on its own or an ideal pairing for grilled shrimp or pasta pomodora. For the best taste, refrigerate this bottle of wine for at least two hours, then serve it chilled. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day, choose Woodbridge wine to be your next table side companion. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Simply Naked Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Simply Naked Chardonnay has tropical fruit, citrus, and pear notes with layers of melon, fig, and a touch of honey. This white wine pairs well with chicken, salmon, turkey, and pasta.
ProductDescLong: Simply Naked wines reveal themselves as they really are, without being hidden by the flavor of oak. By choosing not to oak-age our wines, we are allowing the crisp fruit flavor and the true varietal characteristics to shine through. We start with the best quality fruit from California’s appellation and manage the entire process very carefully. It takes a lot of discipline but it's worth it in the end when you have a great tasting wine in the bottle. This chardonnay has tropical fruit, citrus, and pear notes with layers of melon, fig, and a touch of honey. It pairs well with chicken, salmon, turkey, and pasta.

ProductDescShort: Unshackled Red Blend opens with aromas of raspberry, blueberry and crushed violets. Spiced dried cherries, florals and white pepper flavors pair well with BBQ Ribs or a Portebello Mushroom burger.
ProductDescLong: Unshackled Red Blend opens with aromas of raspberry, blueberry and crushed violets. Flavors of spiced dried cherries, florals and a hint of white pepper translate to a balanced red blend wine supported with a generious mouthfeel. A blend of Zinfandel, Malbec, Petite Sirah, Syrah and Grenache is barrel aged in French and American oak casks for 11 months before bottling. DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Heritage, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Heritage Red Wine showcases flavors of ripe raspberry, cherry and chocolate and decadent aromas of strawberry and vanilla that pair perfectly with spicy dishes.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Heritage Red Wine showcases ripe, fruit-forward flavors blended primarily from syrah and merlot grapes. This red blend opens with decadent aromas of chocolate-covered cherry, strawberry shortcake and vanilla bean. On the palate, flavors of strawberry preserves, raspberry tart, cherry cola and milk chocolate give way to soft tannins with a bright, lingering finish. Malolactic fermentation enhances this California wine's roundness and depth. Fruit from the Central Coast vineyards ripens slowly in the cool climate by the Pacific Ocean, encouraging complexity and depth of flavor. The phenomenal grapes ultimately become Central Coast wine of the utmost quality, offered at a more accessible price by Robert Mondavi Private Selection. Serve this full bodied red wine blend with a variety of spicy barbecue and Mexican dishes. Store at room temperature, but refrigerate this bottle of wine for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring a glass, serving cool for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Red Blend Red Wine brings you a deliciously rich, full-bodied blend of warm, toasty aromas and flavors, including jammy blackberry, vanilla, and baking spices. This California wine combines some of the best attributes of three different grape varieties that notably highlight blackberry and vanilla flavor. Syrah, zinfandel and petite sirah grapes are sourced from California's famous Lodi region and then combined with a touch of other complementary reds for a full and rich California red wine blend that gives way to a lingering finish. DigitalCatalogProductName: SIMI Sonoma County Chardonnay, White Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: SIMI Sonoma County Chardonnay White Wine is a California white wine with fresh flavors and a crisp and creamy finish. This food-friendly wine pairs well with seafood, salads, grilled pork and pasta.
ProductDescLong: SIMI Sonoma County Chardonnay White Wine is a food-friendly table white wine with expressive fruit flavors and aromas. Notes of tangerine, white peach, green apple, Meyer lemon and orange blossom combine with hints of butter, cream, vanilla and flint. Aged for eight months in French and American oak barrels, this California wine combines chardonnay grapes from the most prestigious regions of Sonoma County, producing zesty, fresh flavors of tangerine, lemon curd, stone fruit, white peach and nectarine that awaken the palate with every sip. This crisp white wine has a creamy finish with hints of orange peel and vanilla, making it the perfect companion to caprese salad, smoked salmon, prawns, poached halibut with salsa verde, tortellini alla panna, grilled pork loin with stone fruit compote or asparagus with hollandaise sauce and a soft poached egg. For best taste and quality, chill this luscious SIMI chardonnay for two to two and a half hours at around 50 degrees before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 SIMI Winery, Geyserville, CA

DigitalCatalogProductName: J. Roget American Champagne Brut, White Sparkling Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: J. Roget Brut Sparkling Wine is medium-dry with crisp fruit flavors. The aromas are balanced with a bouquet of toasty yeast notes and floral nuances. J. Roget offers great-tasting champagnes.
ProductDescLong: J. Roget offers great-tasting champagnes that also blend beautifully into full-flavored cocktails. This American sparkling wine is medium-dry with crisp fruit flavors. 100% stainless steel tanks are used for the base wine and then secondary fermentation takes place in the Charmat tanks. This process preserves the fruit character, making a fresher, more flavorful wine. The aromas are balanced with a bouquet of toasty yeast notes and floral nuances.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Chardonnay White Wine combines vibrant, fruit flavor with a defining creaminess and refreshing acidity to complement a variety of seafood, pork and poultry dishes.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Chardonnay White Wine showcases intense, vibrant flavors of fresh apple, melon, and fig with notes of honey and cream, making this table white wine a great companion for a variety of dishes. A refreshing acidity elevates the defining creaminess of this California chardonnay wine and carries the fruity, toasty flavors to its deliciously rich finish. The unique geography and climate of Napa Valley produce delicious grapes that give Robert Mondavi wine its distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. Seventy percent of this California wine is fermented in French oak barrels, while the remainder is cold fermented in stainless steel tanks to retain brightness and purity of fruit. Partial malolactic fermentation balances the lively acidity and added complexity. Pair this chardonnay wine with any fish, seafood, pork or poultry dish. Refrigerate for two to two and a half hours before serving chilled for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA.

To make the best pinot noir, vintners first gently de-stem and crush the grapes when they come into the winery. Daily punch-downs and pump-overs extract flavor and color. At Mark West, there's nothing more important than sharing a passion for pinot with others.  This pinot is the original. ProductDisclaimerSparkling: SPARKLING WARNING: BE CAREFUL! Point bottle away from self and others to avoid serious eye injury.  Stopper may eject forcefully while you are removing the hood or at any time after hood removal.  Bottle contains high pressure which increases with warmth or shaking. ProductDescShort: Cooper and Thief Bourbon Barrel Aged Dark Red Wine Blend comes in a convenient package with two whiskey glasses to give the gift of this rich and bold California red wine to your favorite connoisseur.
ProductDescLong: Cooper and Thief Bourbon Barrel Aged Dark Red Wine Blend is aged in bourbon barrels for three months, giving it a velvety mouthfeel with subtle heat. You can now give the gift of that bold taste in this convenient package, featuring two whiskey glasses in addition to a bottle of Cooper and Thief wine. Merlot, syrah, zinfandel, petite sirah and cabernet sauvignon collide in one bourbon barrel to create this dark and jammy wine, featuring true bourbon flavor. Crafted by Cellarmaster Jeff Kasavan, each taste of this California red wine gives way to hints of dark fruit and vanilla. This dark red wine gets its unique taste from varietals found across California's prime winegrowing regions. Present this wine gift to a friend who needs a burst of flavor with their next lamb or chicken dinner. The barrel aging gives this wine soft tannins that deliver a full-bodied and lingering finish in each sip. Born from mischief, Cooper and Thief Wine celebrates doing things differently. DigitalCatalogProductName: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Blend, The Prisoner Wine Company, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Wine Blend features bold tastes of berry and vanilla with notes of dark chocolate and roasted fig, making this red blend perfect at your next barbecue.
ProductDescLong: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Wine Blend is ripe and luscious with a diverse combination of grapes that gives it a distinct quality and character. This red blend is inspired by the mixed blacks first made by the Italian immigrants who originally settled in Napa Valley. Crafted through the unlikely mix of zinfandel, cabernet sauvignon, petite sirah, syrah and charbono, this California red wine features enticing aromas of bing cherry, dark chocolate, clove and roasted fig. Those scents give way to persistent tastes of raspberry, boysenberry and pomegranate with a lingering vanilla flavor. Aged in a combination of French and American oak barrels, the full flavors of this Napa Valley wine make it a great match for grilled and barbecued meats, especially if you throw sweet or tomato-based sauce on top. Top off a meal with this red blend for a smooth and luscious finish that lingers on the palate. Choose The Prisoner wine to add a little edge to your glass of wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 The Prisoner Wine Company, St. Helena, CA USA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Pinot Noir Red Wine is a distinctive, fruit-forward wine that delivers intense flavors of red plum, dark cherry and vanilla with a silky texture and long finish.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Pinot Noir Red Wine is a fruit-forward red table wine that complements a variety of dishes. Each glass showcases intense flavors of red plum, dark cherry and vanilla. The silky texture of this pinot noir wine carries its pure, vibrant flavors gracefully into a long, fruit-filled finish. The unique geography and climate of Napa Valley produce delicious grapes that mature slowly, giving Robert Mondavi wine its distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. Enjoy a glass of this delicious red wine on its own, or pair it with your favorite beef, chicken, fish or pasta dishes. For optimal taste, store at room temperature, then refrigerate this Napa Valley red wine for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring a glass. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Milestone Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Rich and velvety smooth, Milestone Cabernet Sauvignon's luscious, jammy notes of blackberry and dark fruit are followed by subtle hints of vanilla and spice. A premium-quality red wine.
ProductDescLong: Milestone is crafted with the best fruit sourced from acclaimed California (91% Lodi, 8% Central Coast) appellations. The goal is to make premium-quality, easy-drinking, yet somewhat complex wines that everyone can enjoy, no matter what the occasion. It is crafted to deliver a fruit-forward, full-bodied, easy-drinking style, ready for a special event or simply a relaxed evening with great friends. Rich and velvety smooth, Milestone Cabernet Sauvignon's luscious, jammy notes of blackberry and dark fruit are followed by subtle hints of vanilla and spice. Varietal: 76% cabernet sauvignon, 13% petite sirah, 9% merlot.

DigitalCatalogProductName: J. Roget American Champagne Brut, White Sparkling Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: J. Roget Brut Sparkling Wine is medium-dry with crisp fruit flavors. The aromas are balanced with a bouquet of toasty yeast notes and floral nuances. J. Roget offers great-tasting champagnes.
ProductDescLong: J. Roget offers great-tasting champagnes that also blend beautifully into full-flavored cocktails. This American sparkling wine is medium-dry with crisp fruit flavors. 100% stainless steel tanks are used for the base wine and then secondary fermentation takes place in the Charmat tanks. This process preserves the fruit character, making a fresher, more flavorful wine. The aromas are balanced with a bouquet of toasty yeast notes and floral nuances.

ProductDisclaimerSparkling: SPARKLING WARNING: BE CAREFUL! Point bottle away from self and others to avoid serious eye injury.  Stopper may eject forcefully while you are removing the hood or at any time after hood removal.  Bottle contains high pressure which increases with warmth or shaking.  To open: (1) chill well, (2) do not shake, (3) point bottle away from self and others, (4) remove hood, (5) twist stopper out slowly by hand.  NEVER use a cork remover or reinsert stopper.

Crafters Union Brut Bubbles Sparkling Wine is bright and mouthwatering with radiant notes of orange blossom, white peach and lemon cream. Our portable, unbreakable canned wine allow you to enjoy bubbly whenever and wherever you go. Each Crafters Union Brut Bubbles can is equal to half a bottle of wine, and is best enjoyed chilled. 11% ABV

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Napa Valley Fume Blanc, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Napa Valley Fume Blanc is a distinctively bright, fresh and creamy Napa Valley wine with intense flavors of succulent ripe white peach, lemon verbena and lime blossom.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Napa Valley Fume Blanc is a distinctively bright, fresh and creamy Napa Valley wine. Dry, intense flavors of succulent ripe white peach, lemon verbena and lime blossom seamlessly integrate across the palate, complemented by a subtle hint of fresh herbs. This fume blanc wine combines sauvignon blanc along with a small percentage of semillon grapes to give the final blend a broader mouthfeel and enhanced complexity. The unique geography and climate of Napa Valley produces delicious grapes that give Robert Mondavi wine distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. Pair this California white wine with your favorite food, or enjoy a glass on its own. For optimal taste, refrigerate this bottle of wine for two to two and a half hours before serving at about 50 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Inniskillin Niagara Icewine VQA Vidal Gold, White Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Inniskillin Niagara Icewine VQA Vidal Gold opens with aromas of apricot, peach and pineapple with flavors of mango, clove and orange. This white wine pairs with salted caramel or French onion soup.
ProductDescLong: Inniskillin Icewine, recognized as one of the world’s great wines, is truly winter’s gift to wine lovers. Harvested at the pinnacle of Canada’s crisp winter, the grapes are naturally frozen on the vine and picked when the temperature drops to -10 degrees C. Only a few drops of luscious nectar can be squeezed from each bunch, which is then expertly guided through fermentation to achieve this rich and alluring specialty wine. This Niagara River appellation wine opens with abundant aromatics of apricot, peach and pineapple integrate well with the French oaks and flavors of mango, clove and orange peel. Pairs well with salted creme caramel or traditional creme brule, any ash aged cheeses, tarte tatin, Vidal French onion soup or caramelized onion tart. Serve chilled.
ProductBullet05: Flavors of mango, clove and orange peel
ProductBullet08: Appellation: Niagara River
ProductBullet09: Pairs well with salted creme caramel, creme brule, ash aged cheeses
ProductBullet12: One of the world’s great wines; truly winter’s gift to wine lovers

DigitalCatalogProductName: Hogue Pinot Grigio, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Hogue Pinot Grigio has aromas of pear, melon, guava, tropical fruit, stone fruit, and fresh herb. This white wine has flavors of pear, guava, and stone fruit followed with a crisp finish.
ProductDescLong: The majority of Washington’s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing. Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. Our pinot grigio shows a complexity of pear, melon, guava, tropical fruit, stone fruit, and fresh herb aromas. Fresh flavors of pear, guava, and stone fruit follow, with a crisp finish. Pair this food-friendly wine with fresh oysters, grilled wild salmon, or grilled asparagus.
ProductBullet05: Fresh flavors of pear, guava, and stone fruit with a crisp finish

DigitalCatalogProductName: Diseno Red Blend, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Diseno Red Blend has raspberry and blueberry aromas with notes of violet, cocoa, and coffee from oak aging. It shows pleasant acidity and soft tannins, finishing with a lingering note of toastiness.
ProductDescLong: Argentina’s best-known appellation, Mendoza, instills confidence plus consistency with every vintage as we source from the premium sub-regions Valle de Uco and Lujan de Cuyo. Inert, flavorless, colorless, and odorless gases preserve the wine as it is pushed through the barrels, eliminating oxidation and preventing spoilage. This red wine has intense raspberry and blueberry aromas with notes of violet, cocoa, and coffee from oak aging. It shows pleasant acidity and soft tannins, finishing with a lingering note of toastiness.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Buttery Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Buttery Chardonnay White Wine is named for the rich, creamy flavors derived from its distinct winemaking style.  Lush notes of ripe apple and white peach compliment.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Buttery Chardonnay White Wine is named for the rich, creamy flavors imparted by its distinct winemaking style. Our coastal California vineyards deliver lush notes of ripe apple and white peach, balanced with bright, mouth-watering acidity. Malolactic fermentation then enhances the wine's body and complexity. Aging in French and American oak adds the finishing touches of brown spice and vanilla aromas and notes of toasty brioche to complement the decadent buttery profile.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Napa Valley Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Napa Valley Pinot Noir Red Wine is a complex and delicious red wine with a silky mouthfeel. Enjoy this wine on its own or paired with fish, poultry or vegetarian dishes.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Napa Valley Pinot Noir Red Wine is a richly complex Napa Valley wine that offers vibrantly intense red plum and dark cherry coulis flavors and aromas highlighted by sweet clove, cinnamon and vanilla. Crafted with carefully sorted pinot noir grapes from the Carneros region in Napa Valley, this California wine matures for nine months, resulting in a delicious red wine with a soft and silky mouthfeel that carries the concentrated fruit flavors gracefully into a long finish. Enjoy this versatile and food-friendly Robert Mondavi red wine by itself or pair it with pink-fleshed fish, beef, veal, game or poultry dishes. It also pairs well with mushroom, parmesan arugula salad or vegetarian dishes such as a cheesy eggplant bake. For best taste and quality, store this red table wine at room temperature and chill for 60 minutes before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi Winery, Oakville, CA USA

ProductDescShort: La Terre Cabernet Sauvignon tastes of blackberry and black cherry with just a hint of green pepper. This red wine is rich and full flavored, with a bold finish highlighted by a touch of oak.
ProductDescLong: La Terre, which means “the earth” in French, is a tribute to the soil that nourishes the vine. At La Terre, the emphasis on grape quality is foremost in creating the wines. La Terre's winemaking philosophy is simple: ensure that every bottle of La Terre consistently expresses the varietal character of the grape with underlying complexity and richness. This American appellation cabernet sauvignon tastes of blackberry and black cherry with just a hint of green pepper. It is rich and full flavored, with a bold finish highlighted by a touch of oak.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Double Diamond Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon 2016, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Double Diamond Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon opens with layered  aromas of black currants, dark cherries, blackberry, toast and oak spice. This red wine is rich and juicy, bursting with big  flavor.
ProductDescLong: In 2000, Fred Schrader created Double Diamond as part of his continuing quest to make the best cabernet sauvignon that Napa Valley appellation can offer. This unique expression of the region carries on the tradition of earning critical acclaim and drawing passionate fans. Aged 16 months in French oak barrels, Double Diamond Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon red wine opens with layered, intriguing aromas of black currants, dark cherries, blackberry, cherry compote, toast and oak spice. The palate is rich and juicy resulting in a big, bursting flavor. The tannin structure makes this a great wine to enjoy upon release, but it will also mellow nicely for the next two to six years. Varietal: 98% cabernet sauvignon, 2% merlot.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Manischewitz Cream Red Concord Kosher, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Manischewitz Cream Red Concord Kosher is smooth with plenty of grape flavors. The crisp acidity balances the sweetness and fruit aromas. This red wine goes wonderfully with roasted meats or desserts.
ProductDescLong: The Manischewitz winery is located in Canandaigua, New York, and is best known for its budget concord wine. It is aged in steel tanks at cold temperatures to maintain fruit aromas. A sweet wine with a pleasant mouth feel and a smooth aftertaste. A smooth, fruity wine with plenty of grape flavor and a subtle aroma of confectionery flavors. The crisp acidity balances the sweetness and up front fruit aromas. The natural fruitiness allows this wine to be served chilled. Goes wonderfully with roasted meats with fruit sauces or paired with berry-based desserts.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Rex Goliath Pinot Grigio, White Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Rex Goliath Pinot Grigio has citrus aromas with layers of stone fruit and floral notes. Bright acidity is balanced with citrus, for a crisp refreshing finish. This white wine pairs well with seafood.
ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. This American appellation pinot grigio has big citrus aromas with layers of fresh stone fruit and intense floral notes. Bright acidity is balanced with fresh citrus, leading to a crisp refreshing finish. This wine pairs especially well with seafood dishes like fresh fish tacos and steamed mussels with broth.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine presents with both power and finesse, showcasing intense flavors of dark cassis and black cherry with a velvety, lingering finish.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine presents with both power and finesse. This Napa Valley cabernet sauvignon delivers intense flavors of deep, dark cassis and juicy black cherry with sage, nutmeg and vanilla spice. With a velvety texture and a plush finish, this full-bodied wine lingers luxuriously on the palate. The unique geography and climate of Napa Valley produce delicious grapes that give Robert Mondavi wine its distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. This cabernet sauvignon wine undergoes a total of 31 days of wine to skin contact, maximizing the extraction of varietal character and complexity while keeping the tannins fleshy and supple. Malolactic fermentation in French oak barrels assures seamless integration of fruit and oak in this delicious red wine. Pair a glass of this dark red wine with your favorite chicken, pork, beef or pasta dishes. For optimal taste, store this bottle of wine at room temperature, but refrigerate for about 30 to 60 minutes before serving cool. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ravenswood Vintners Blend Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California’s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence. Big, bold Vintners Blend wines are crafted for those who refuse to flock to the latest fad. This chardonnay is a dry, medium body, juicy white with green apple, pear, and vanilla oak spice. Varietal: 100% chardonnay.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Zinfandel, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Zinfandel Dark Red Wine features flavors of blackberry and plum, as well as notes of jam and spices, making it a delicious complement for a salmon meal.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Zinfandel Dark Red Wine features bright aromas and a full-bodied taste that pairs beautifully with a variety of protein-based dishes. This California wine is full of personality with juicy flavors of blackberry and plum. Each glass produces vibrant notes of blackberry jam, cherries and black pepper. Grown and harvested in Woodbridge's Lodi region, the smooth and layered flavors of this red zinfandel wine pair beautifully with grilled salmon, grilled chicken or lamb kebabs. The full body of this Woodbridge wine stands up to even the boldest flavors that finishes with soft, velvety tannins. Save this 1.5 liter bottled wine for the next time you're entertaining at home. To preserve the taste of Woodbridge's red Zinfandel wine, simply chill it for 30 to 60 minutes before breaking out the wine glasses. ProductDescLong: Notable wines are carefully crafted to deliver delicious layers of flavor that you can see on the bottle and savor in the glass. This California appellation wine undergoes a malolactic fermentation to soften its acidity and enhance the smooth mouthfeel. The wine was aged for nine months with French oak, imparting toasty vanilla notes. Bright golden in color, this chardonnay opens with stone fruit and apple aromas. These are layered with baking spices and the essence of butter on a smooth palate of toasted vanilla oak, culminating in a vibrant finish. It’s delicious paired with risotto, shrimp, and halibut. DigitalCatalogProductName: Eternally Silenced Pinot Noir, The Prisoner Wine Company, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort:
The Prisoner Wine Company's Eternally Silenced Pinot Noir is rich and elegant, soft and well-balanced. Aromas of pine needles, cranberry, dark cherry, and brown spice lead to fresh
red berry flavors.
ProductDescLong:
The Prisoner Wine Company takes an unconventional approach to winemaking by working with impassioned growers to source varietals from vineyards and appellations across California. Alongside a family of growers, The Prisoner winemaking team pushes boundaries as they craft a selection of unexpected, yet artful wines. Eternally Silenced sources Pinot Noir and Syrah from vineyards Santa Barbara, Sonoma Coast, Napa Valley, Edna Valley and Monterey. This red wine is rich and elegant, soft and well-balanced. Aromas of pine needles, cranberry, dark cherry, cedar, clove, and brown spice lead to fresh
red berry flavors, an ample structure, and seamless tannins.

DigitalCatalogProductName: SIMI Sonoma County Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: SIMI Sonoma County Chardonnay White Wine is a California white wine with fresh flavors and a crisp and creamy finish. This food-friendly wine pairs well with seafood, salads, grilled pork and pasta.
ProductDescLong: SIMI Sonoma County Chardonnay White Wine is a food-friendly table white wine with expressive fruit flavors and aromas. Notes of tangerine, white peach, green apple, Meyer lemon and orange blossom combine with hints of butter, cream, vanilla and flint. Aged for eight months in French and American oak barrels, this California wine combines chardonnay grapes from the most prestigious regions of Sonoma County, producing zesty, fresh flavors of tangerine, lemon curd, stone fruit, white peach and nectarine that awaken the palate with every sip. This crisp white wine has a creamy finish with hints of orange peel and vanilla, making it the perfect companion to caprese salad, smoked salmon, prawns, poached halibut with salsa verde, tortellini alla panna, grilled pork loin with stone fruit compote or asparagus with hollandaise sauce and a soft poached egg. For best taste and quality, chill this luscious SIMI chardonnay for two to two and a half hours at around 50 degrees before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 SIMI Winery, Geyserville, CA

ProductDisclaimerSparkling: SPARKLING WARNING: BE CAREFUL! Point bottle away from self and others to avoid serious eye injury.  Stopper may eject forcefully while you are removing the hood or at any time after hood removal.  Bottle contains high pressure which increases with warmth or shaking.  To open: (1) chill well, (2) do not shake, (3) point bottle away from self and others, (4) remove hood, (5) twist stopper out slowly by hand.  NEVER use a cork remover or reinsert stopper.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Prosecco DOC, Italian White Sparkling Wine, 3 pk 187 mL Bottles
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is a creamy and crisp Italian prosecco with flavors of peach and golden apples. It is ideal on its own or paired with pizza, seafood and shellfish dishes.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is an Italian sparkling wine meant to be sipped and enjoyed. This creamy and crisp extra dry white wine offers fruity aromas accompanied by hints of wisteria, with an intense peach and golden apple flavor. This Italian wine begins in the hilly area of Valdobbiadene, with glera grapes that undergo a traditional wine vinification. The winemakers then use selected yeasts in a natural refermentation process to create this clean and delicate Ruffino prosecco wine with refined bubbles and a pleasant finish. Enjoy this Italian prosecco as an aperitif, mix it into your favorite cocktail or pair it with margherita pizza, seafood, shellfish and white meat dishes. For the best quality and taste, drink this Ruffino wine young. Refrigerate for three to three and a half hours and serve at a temperature between 45 and 48 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Hogue Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Hogue Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of black currant, blueberry, lavender, black pepper, cocoa, molasses, and dried tobacco, with hints of toast. On the palate, this red wine is rich and creamy.
ProductDescLong: The majority of Washington’s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing. Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. This cabernet sauvignon offers enticing scents of black currant, blueberry, lavender, black pepper, cocoa, molasses, and dried tobacco, with touches of cream and toast. On the palate, it’s rich and creamy with flavors of blackberry, cherry, dark chocolate, maple, vanilla, and spice. Pair with pepper steak, prime rib, and dark chocolate.

ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Chardonnay White Wine offers a vibrant and medium body that pairs easily with appetizers and entrees. Tropical fruit aromas mix with spice, leading to a toasty finish.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Chardonnay White Wine displays aromas of rich tropical fruit combined with a hint of cinnamon and maple. A medium body with vibrant acidity showcases characteristic flavors of ripe pear and green apple, leading to a toasty finish with vanilla oak notes. Sip this chardonnay wine on its own or pair it with delightful appetizers and hearty dishes like lemon pepper chicken. Grapes in this California wine are sourced from the Lodi region. By using state-of-the-art winemaking technology, employing unique growing techniques and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to produce high quality grapes for an excellent bottle of wine. Chill this chardonnay wine in the refrigerator for 2 to 2 and a half hours before serving at around 50 degrees. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day, Woodbridge offers approachable white wines that you don't have to overthink. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Cuttings Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, The Prisoner Wine Company, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Cuttings Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a delicious red blend with rich flavors of blueberry, dark cherry and cocoa that pairs well with steak and vegetables, lamb or a cheeseburger.
ProductDescLong: Cuttings Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a delicious red wine blend with rich flavors of blueberry, dark cherry and cocoa, enhanced by scents of fresh roasted coffee, black currant, vanilla bean, brown spice and wild berries. Inspired by the age-old method of using cuttings from idyllic sites for the propagation of new vines, this California red wine combines grapes from premier hillside vineyards in Napa Valley. The intense flavor of cabernet sauvignon joins with the structure of petite sirah and syrah, with a small amount of zinfandel that adds a nice layer of complexity and spiciness, earning this red blend the title of Best in Class at the 2018 San Francisco Chronicle Wine Competition. Aged in French oak casks for 18 months, this full-bodied cabernet sauvignon wine has a smooth finish that pairs well with steak and vegetables, lamb or a cheeseburger. For best taste and quality, store this barrel aged wine at room temperature and refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 The Prisoner Wine Company, St. Helena, CA USA

Hailing from California's famous Lodi region, this light wine is made from pinot grigio grapes originating in the northern coast of Italy. ProductDescLong: Situated at a midpoint in the Central Coast, the Templeton vineyard and winery location is ideal for sourcing fruit from vineyards north and south of the winery, along with its low-vigor soils, proven ground water table, and rural atmosphere. The varieties of soil composition and micro-climates that can be found within the expansive Central Coast appellation present the opportunity to cultivate the same varietal in a wide range of growing conditions. Wild Horse Reserve Cheval Sauvage Pinot Noir is driven with earthy-spicy aromas and notes of strawberry, rhubarb, and dark cherry that are pleasing to the senses. The palate opens with minerality and earth. The mid-palate is elegantly structured and balanced with flavors of bright red fruit and spice. Cuvée Sauvage meaning ‘wild blend’ marries untamed terroir with restraint in the cellar to yield an elegant Chardonnay. Our winemaker, Melissa Stackhouse, believes that her role is to shepherd the wines, guiding the fruit and terroir to its ultimate expression. She focuses on selecting grapes from the most renowned vineyards while taking a minimalist approach to winemaking. Our Chardonnay offers layered notes of lemon curd and crème brûlée with a palate of yellow apple, cinnamon and custard.

Made with pinot noir grapes from the exceptional maritime regions of Monterrey, Sonoma and Santa Barbara, this California wine goes through the traditional press and saignee methods followed by cold fermentation in stainless steel tanks, creating a light and flavorful palate that delivers a lush mouthfeel, bright acidity and a cool minerality on the finish. This silky rose wine complements chicken dishes, roasted beet salad, soft and creamy cheeses, fruit and vegetable dips and halibut fish tacos. To preserve its taste and quality, refrigerate this dry wine for two to two and a half hours, then serve chilled at around 50 degrees. ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Malbec Red Wine offers juicy fruit notes of plum and blackberry and bold aromas of cedar and blueberry. This bold, California wine pairs perfectly with spicy meat dishes.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Malbec Red Wine is a bold wine that offers juicy fruit flavors of plum and blackberry with a touch of vanilla. Bold aromas of cedar, fresh black cherry and blueberry draw you into a medium bodied wine that's richly complex but approachable. The malbec grapes used in this California red wine are sourced from Lodi, then aged in French and Hungarian oak barrels. The distinctive notes of spicy oak that result allow this malbec wine to pair perfectly with intense meat dishes, such as smoky cured meats, lamb chops or carne asada. It's also delicious to sip on its own. For the best flavor, store this bottle of wine at room temperature, then chill in the refrigerator for 30 to 60 minutes before serving. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day, Woodbridge offers approachable fine wine that you don't have to overthink. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA.

A medium body with vibrant acidity showcases characteristic flavors of ripe pear and green apple, leading to a toasty finish with vanilla oak notes. Sip this chardonnay wine on its own or pair it with delightful appetizers and hearty dishes like lemon pepper chicken. Grapes in this California wine are sourced from the Lodi region. By using state-of-the-art winemaking technology, employing unique growing techniques and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to produce high quality grapes for an excellent bottle of wine. Chill this chardonnay wine in the refrigerator for 2 to 2 and a half hours before serving at around 50 degrees. ProductDescShort: Wild Horse Pinot Noir has complex aromas of ripe cherry, dark fruit, nutmeg, earth, strawberry pie, and vanilla. The flavors of this red wine are fresh, balanced, and bright.
ProductDescLong: Situated at a midpoint in the Central Coast, the Templeton vineyard and winery location is ideal for sourcing fruit from vineyards north and south of the winery, along with its low-vigor soils, proven ground water table, and rural atmosphere. The varieties of soil composition and micro-climates that can be found within the expansive Central Coast appellation present the opportunity to cultivate the same varietal in a wide range of growing conditions. Wild Horse Pinot Noir has complex aromas of ripe cherry, dark fruit, nutmeg, earth, strawberry pie, and vanilla. The flavors are fresh, balanced, and bright, including cranberry, strawberry, and vanilla. Pairs well  with roasted pork tenderloin or grilled salmon. Varietal: 100% pinot noir.

ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Merlot Red Wine is smooth and complex, delicious with daily meals and made for sharing. Crafted using unique growing techniques and state-of-the-art technology for winemaking, this California wine is made with high-quality grapes from the Lodi region. With a well-balanced acidity, this red merlot wine features beautifully integrated tannins that create complexity and structure. Rich aromas of blackberry, cherry, chocolate and red berries complement an enticing ripe plum, toasty mocha oak and cherry cola flavor. This full-bodied Woodbridge merlot wine has a soft and versatile style that pairs well with hearty pasta with Bolognese sauce, grilled steak, lamb, pork chops and hamburgers. ProductDescShort: Rex Goliath Sauvignon Blanc has bright citrus and summer fruit flavors like honeydew, nectarine, and pear. This white wine is perfect for picnics, entertaining on the patio, or rewarding yourself.
ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. With bright lively citrus and summer fruit flavors-like honeydew melon, nectarine, and pear-this sauvignon blanc is perfect for picnics, entertaining on the patio, or rewarding yourself after a long day.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Drylands Sauvignon Blanc, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Drylands Sauvignon Blanc opens with layers of passion fruit and tropical fruit. The palate offers juicy fruit balanced with acidity. This white wine pairs well with delicious seafood and poultry.
ProductDescLong: Planted in 1980 in the esteemed Marlborough, New Zealand appellation, Drylands Home Block Vineyards is one of the oldest sauvignon blanc vineyards. Regarded as one of the pioneers of winemaking, Drylands continues to carry on its vision. Drylands Sauvignon Blanc opens with layers of passion fruit, fruit zest, and tropical fruit on the nose with a hint of elderflower. The palate offers juicy, weighty sweet fruit balanced with clean acidity. Concentrated citrus flavors with layers of passion fruit, pink grapefruit, and pomelo linger through the finish. This white wine pairs well with delicious seafood and poultry. Varietal: 100% sauvignon blanc.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Meiomi Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Meiomi Pinot Noir Red Wine features grapes harvested from three of California's top winegrowing regions for a bold taste. This Meiomi wine pairs well with dark chocolate or thin crust pizza.
ProductDescLong: Meiomi Pinot Noir Red Wine brings you structure and depth seldom seen in a pinot noir wine, thanks to its unique and meticulous aging process. Aged for six months in French oak barrels, this California red wine's juicy strawberry flavor and notes of dark berries and toasted mocha add complexity and depth on the palate. With a rich garnet color and a ruby edge, this pinot noir wine permeates aromas of bright fruit jam, mocha and oak. This California wine owes much of its complexity to its varied upbringing, featuring grapes harvested from Monterey, Santa Barbara and Sonoma. The silky texture and balanced acidity of this Meiomi wine make it a perfect table top companion for dark chocolate or thin crust pizza. Meiomi Pinot Noir offers a full-bodied taste that stays with you for a lengthy finish no matter the meal. It's that unrivaled taste that earned this California red wine 92 points from The Tasting Panel. Bring out this bottle of wine at your next get-together for a lasting impression. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Meiomi Wines, Acampo, CA USA.

ProductDescLong: 7 Moons Red Wine Blend is a fruity wine that celebrates the phases of the moon by combining seven grape varietals into a balanced and easy to drink red blend with superb color, depth and complexity. This California wine opens with aromas of chocolate-covered cherries, baking spices and vanilla bean, enhancing the intense flavors of strawberry preserves, cherry cola and milk chocolate. Crafted with syrah, merlot, petite sirah, zinfandel, cabernet sauvignon, malbec, and grenache grapes sourced from prime vineyards up and down the Central Coast and Lodi regions, this full-bodied California red wine has a smooth, fruit-forward finish that lingers on the palate. Store this delicious red wine blend at room temperature, then chill for 30 to 60 minutes before serving. Pair this Central Coast wine with a broad range of foods, from barbecued chicken and Caprese salad to Chinese cuisine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 7 Moons Wine Co., Oakville, CA USA

ProductDescLong: The unique geography and climate of Napa Valley are what allows Robert Mondavi Winery Wines to grow a variety of delicious grapes that give the wines their distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. DigitalCatalogProductName: Auros Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Auros Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon opens with aromas of blackberry and blueberry. The palate unveils layers of black currant jam, coffee, tobacco and vanilla. This red wine has a velvety finish.
ProductDescLong: Auros is crafted with hand-selected fruit from a combination of vineyards blocks in our Napa Valley appellation. The grapes were hand-picked and hand-sorted, and then briefly cold soaked to enhance the extraction of vivid color from the cabernet fruit. The juice was kept in contact with the skins for two weeks to build rich, soft tannins in the wine. Aged in French oak barrels for 18 months, this cabernet sauvignon opens with dark fruit aromas of cassis, blackberry, and dried blueberry. The rich, full-bodied palate unveils layers of black currant jam, roasted coffee, tobacco, dried fig, and vanilla bean. Soft, supple tannins frame a plush velvety finish. Varietal: 77% cabernet sauvignon, 17% merlot, 3% petite verdot, 2% syrah, 1% cabernet franc.

ProductDescLong: Situated at a midpoint in the Central Coast, the Templeton vineyard and winery location is ideal for sourcing fruit from vineyards north and south of the winery, along with its low-vigor soils, proven ground water table, and rural atmosphere. The varieties of soil composition and micro-climates that can be found within the expansive Central Coast appellation present the opportunity to cultivate the same varietal in a wide range of growing conditions. Wild Horse Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of dark fruit, blackberry, and cassis with light notes of blue fruit, vanilla, cola spice, and subtle tobacco notes. Flavors of sweet oak, vibrant red and dark fruit, light herbs, and bramble spice. Pairs well with grilled steak, blue cheeseburger with sautéed mushroom and a side of truffle fries. Dusty tannins add structure to the juicy fullness of the fruit, followed by a lingering, velvety finish. Fruit for this Napa Valley wine is sourced from two of the valley's most renowned sub-appellations: Oakville and Stag's Leap district. The fruit is combined with other grapes from a number of the area's finest vineyards, creating a cabernet sauvignon wine that is the perfect expression of the region. This Robert Mondavi red wine undergoes 24 days of wine to grape skin contact, to maximize the extraction of varietal character while keeping the tannins fleshy and supple. Pair a glass of this delicious red wine with your favorite beef, steak, lamb or pasta dishes. For optimal taste, store this bottle of wine at room temperature, but refrigerate for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring a glass. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA.

ProductDescLong: La Terre, which means “the earth” in French, is a tribute to the soil that nourishes the vine. At La Terre, the emphasis on grape quality is foremost in creating the wines. La Terre's winemaking philosophy is simple: ensure that every bottle of La Terre consistently expresses the varietal character of the grape with underlying complexity and richness. Medium to dark red in color, this American appellation merlot has aromas of cherries and blueberries with a slight herbal undertone. It is medium-bodied with strong fruit flavors and a soft finish.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Franciscan Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Franciscan Chardonnay has aromas of bright fruit, minerals, and honeyed pear-apple. This white wine has a bright and vibrant palate, rich flavors evoking apple galette, honey, and creamy vanilla bean.
ProductDescLong: Founded in 1973, Franciscan has a long tradition of crafting wine with a highly meticulous approach. Franciscan's home estate is located in Oakville, right in the heart of the Napa Valley (57% Monterey County, 43% Napa County) appellation. This 240-acre parcel of land features loamy, gravelly, well-draining soil which adds structure to the wines. At Franciscan Estate, the wine lots are kept separate from the vineyard until just before bottling. After picking by hand, every load of grapes is assigned its own tank. This chardonnay has aromas of bright fruit, minerals, and honeyed pear-apple. A bright and vibrant palate shows rich flavors evoking apple galette, honey, and creamy vanilla bean. Varietal: 100% chardonnay.

ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Bourbon Barrel-Aged Cabernet Sauvignon red wine has aromas of vanilla and cocoa with rich flavors of blackberry, plum, and toasted marshmallow.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Bourbon Barrel-Aged Cabernet Sauvignon is a full bodied red wine with aromas of vanilla, oak spice, and cocoa. Ripe fruit flavors of blackberry and plum are complemented with hints of vanilla bean and toasted marshmallow. This California wine is sourced from premium California vineyards, selected for their varietal expression and style complimentary to Bourbon barrel aging. A select portion of the blend is aged in used Bourbon barrels to impart a rich, toasty finish.  This Cabernet pairs well with comfort food -- try it with a braised oxtail and mashed root vegetables.  Store at room temperature, then chill for 30 to 60 minutes before serving at around 60 degrees. Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi offers 40 years of heritage and Robert Mondavi's relentless pursuit of quality in every bottle to ensure everyone has access to better wine. ProductDescShort: The Dreaming Tree Sonoma County Sauvignon Blanc White Wine is brimming with tropical fruit aromas and vibrant pineapple flavor. Light and refreshing, it's great with lobster salad or spicy food.
ProductDescLong: The Dreaming Tree Sonoma County Sauvignon Blanc White Wine, part of an exciting collaboration between musician Dave Matthews and winemaker Sean McKenzie, hits all the right notes. Fresh, juicy and great for sipping, this crisp white wine exudes tropical aromas of passion fruit and kiwi. The pineapple flavor and hints of zesty lime and grapefruit bring harmony to the structure of this California white wine. With grapes harvested from the notable Sonoma County winegrowing region, this sauvignon blanc wine maintains the youthful characteristics of its fruit, thanks to a quick and efficient bottling process. The lightness of this white wine makes it a perfect match for seafood dishes like lobster salad and a natural companion to spicy food. With its bright and vibrant taste, it's no wonder this California wine took home a Gold Medal from the World Value Wine Challenge in 2017. Keep the flavors of this sauvignon blanc wine singing by refrigerating it for at least two hours before serving chilled. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 The Dreaming Tree, Geyserville, CA USA.

Inert, flavorless, colorless, and odorless gases preserve the wine as it is pushed through the barrels, eliminating oxidation and preventing spoilage. DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Made With Organic Grapes, Italian White Sparkling Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Prosecco made with Organic Grapes DOC Sparkling Wine is made from grapes cultivated without chemical products or synthetic fertilizers and has hint of apple, pear, elderberry and citrus.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Prosecco made with Organic Grapes DOC Sparkling White Wine is an Italian sparkling wine meant to be savored and enjoyed. The wine is made from grapes cultivated without chemical products or synthetic fertilizers. This elegant sparkling wine is made with organic grapes and has hints of apple, pear, elderberry and citrus. The bouquet is fragrant and bursting with fruit notes along with delicate bubbles on the palate. This Italian wine begins in the hilly area of Valdobbiadene, with glera grapes that undergo a traditional wine vinification. The winemakers then use selected yeasts in a natural refermentation process to create this clean and delicate Ruffino prosecco wine with refined bubbles and a pleasant finish. Enjoy this Italian prosecco as an aperitif and it is quite versatile with appetizers. For the best quality and taste, drink this Ruffino wine cold. Refrigerate for three to three and a half hours and serve at a temperature between 45 and 48 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA.

ProductDescShort: Red Guitar Tempranillo Garnacha has a wonderfully complex bouquet of cherries, leather, and even a touch of earthiness. This red wine has explosive raspberry fruit characters and soft tannins.
ProductDescLong: The prized old vines of Tempranillo and Garnacha dig deep into the gravel soils of Navarra, Spain, to produce wines of incredible character and quality, year after year. Blended together, each vintage in equal portions, winemakers craft a fruity and concentrated wine made in a vibrant “New World” style. Tempranillo produces wines that have a wonderfully complex bouquet of cherries, leather, and even a touch of earthiness. Garnacha produces wines of great concentration, with explosive raspberry fruit characters and soft tannins. A rich and smooth celebration of the Spanish lifestyle, la buena vida - the good life.

ProductDescLong: Situated at a midpoint in the Central Coast, the Templeton vineyard and winery location is ideal for sourcing fruit from vineyards north and south of the winery, along with its low-vigor soils, proven ground water table, and rural atmosphere. The varieties of soil composition and micro-climates that can be found within the expansive Central Coast appellation present the opportunity to cultivate the same varietal in a wide range of growing conditions. Wild Horse Pinot Gris is a delightfully rich, complex wine with aromas of lychee, stone fruit, passion fruit, and tropical fruits with a touch of slate and minerality. These are followed by flavors of key lime zest, pineapple, and ripe Nashi pear. Pairs well with grapefruit and arugula salad, a cheese plate, grilled red snapper, and spicy dishes. ProductDescShort: The bold, dark fruit flavors of this full-bodied red wine reveal why Paso Robles is an emerging region for producing this delicious California Estancia Cabernet Sauvignon.
ProductDescLong: Estancia's vineyard lies in the Thermal Rainbow of Monterey County, which features midday heat tempered by morning and late-afternoon fog-perfect for developing the intense fruit character. Pinnacles Vineyard was one of the first vineyards in California to be planted with a permanent irrigation system. This Paso Robles appellation cabernet sauvignon opens with brambleberry and floral aromas with notes of tobacco and leather. Lavish, silky tannins mid-palate, complemented with black currant, vanilla, and dark chocolate flavors and a nice lingering finish. Pairs well with aged gouda or parmesan, salads, potatoes, steak and red sauce pasta. Varietal: 100% cabernet sauvignon.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ravenswood Pickberry Vineyard Meritage, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California’s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence. Aged 19 months in French oak barrels, this meritage from the Pickberry Vineyard displays aromas of cherry, plum, currant, cigar box, and leather. It is a wonderfully balanced wine with a lingering finish. Varietal: 39.4% cabernet sauvignon, 33.9% merlot, 14.6% malbec, 12.1% petit verdot.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Maestro, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Maestro Red Wine is a vintage-driven red blend that displays vibrant flavor and plush tannins, making it ideal for pairing with beef, pork, lamb or pasta dishes.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Maestro Red Wine is a true vintage-driven red blend created to honor Robert Mondavi. A crescendo of dark, juicy plum and cassis fruit, violet, cinnamon and unsweetened cocoa linger on the palate, while each sumptuous sip boasts vibrant flavor and plush tannins with a lingering finish. Created based on what the vintage provides, this red wine blend of cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc, merlot and petit verdot is sourced from two prized sub-regions of Napa Valley: Oakville and Stags Leap. This Napa Valley wine undergoes a total of 24 days of wine to skin contact, maximizing the extraction of varietal character while keeping the tannins fleshy and supple. Malolactic fermentation in French oak barrels assures seamless integration of fruit and oak. Pair a glass of this dark red wine with pork, beef, steak, pasta or lamb dishes. For optimal taste, store at room temperature, then refrigerate this bottle of wine for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi Winery, Oakville, CA

ProductDescShort: Mark West Carneros Sonoma Pinot Noir is dark ruby-red with red cherry and cranberry aromas and rhubarb, nutmeg, and toasty caramel flavors. This red wine pairs with beef, pork chops, and grilled fish.
ProductDescLong: Mark West Wines accepts nothing less than the best, which is why the fruit for the wines is sourced from the finest vineyards throughout California. To make the best pinot noir, vintners first gently de-stem and crush the grapes when they come into the winery. Daily punch-downs and pump-overs extract flavor and color. This wine is a dark ruby-red masterpiece with red cherry and cranberry aromas and raspberry, rhubarb, nutmeg, and toasty caramel flavors. Pair perfectly with beef stroganoff, roasted pork chops, and grilled fish with a light cream sauce. At Mark West, there's nothing more important than sharing a passion for pinot with others.

ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Rose Wine blends premium grapes primarily from the syrah and tempranillo varieties to highlight refreshing flavors of strawberry, floral, watermelon and grapefruit. Grapes sourced from California's Lodi region give this light wine intense fruity aromas and please the palate with a crisp finish and fresh acidity. This rose wine's lively bouquet makes it the perfect addition to a cheese and wine party. Enjoy a glass on its own before dinner or pair with a light salad, goat cheese or even seafood pasta.  Chill this blush wine in the refrigerator for at least two hours before serving cold at around 50 degrees. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day, choose Woodbridge wine for a taste that's vibrant yet delicate. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA.

Flavors of fresh blackberry, wild berry compote, cassis and dark cocoa powder dance on the tongue, while notes of forest floor, allspice and sweet vanilla provide complexity. This Napa Valley red wine blend contains cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc and petite verdot grapes, all hand-harvested from Kalon Vineyard in west Oakville. This cabernet sauvignon wine undergoes 34 days of wine to skin contact, maximizing the extraction of varietal character and complexity while keeping the tannins round and supple and the acidity balanced. Malolactic fermentation in French oak barrels assures a delicious red wine with seamless integration of fruit and oak. Pair a glass of this Napa Valley cabernet sauvignon with your favorite pork, beef, steak, lamb or pasta dishes. ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc White Wine features the refreshing flavors of passion fruit, melon, and grapefruit, making this Marlborough region white wine a brilliant complement to seafood or salad.
ProductDescLong: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc White Wine is fresh and juicy with ripe, tropical flavors of passion fruit, melon, and stone fruit. Each sip of wine reveals classic Marlborough sauvignon blanc aromas of lifted citrus, tropical fruit, and crushed herbs, along with vibrant acidity and plenty of weight and length on the palate. This New Zealand sauvignon blanc is made with grapes specially selected from vineyards in Marlborough's Wairau Valley and the neighboring Awatere Valley. The climate and fast-draining soil in this region offer winemakers a selection of grapes that deliver the consistently flavorful wine for which Kim Crawford is known. Pair this Kim Crawford white wine with fresh oysters, asparagus, lobster, or a light salad. For optimal taste, refrigerate this sauvignon blanc wine for at least two hours then serve chilled. ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Chardonnay White Wine offers a vibrant and medium body that pairs easily with appetizers and entrees. Tropical fruit aromas mix with spice, leading to a toasty finish.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Chardonnay White Wine displays aromas of rich tropical fruit combined with a hint of cinnamon and maple. A medium body with vibrant acidity showcases characteristic flavors of ripe pear and green apple, leading to a toasty finish with vanilla oak notes. Sip this chardonnay wine on its own or pair it with delightful appetizers and hearty dishes like lemon pepper chicken. Grapes in this California wine are sourced from the Lodi region. By using state-of-the-art winemaking technology, employing unique growing techniques and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to produce high quality grapes for an excellent wine. Chill this chardonnay wine in the refrigerator for 2 to 2 and a half hours before serving at around 50 degrees. ProductDescLong: The Prisoner Wine Company takes an unconventional approach to winemaking by working with impassioned growers to source varietals from vineyards and appellations across California. Alongside a family of growers, The Prisoner winemaking team pushes boundaries as they craft a selection of unexpected, yet artful wines. We created Saldo to feature this outstanding fruit from Dry Creek, Lodi, and Amador, where zinfandel has thrived for decades. Dark ruby color with bold aromas of black licorice, black pepper, cherry, and baking spice. The entry is rich, full, and scintillating. The palate is mouthwatering and smooth with a hint of chocolate. The finish is voluptuous with soft, velvety tannins. Varietal: 85% zinfandel, 15% blend of petite sirah and syrah.

ProductDescShort: Clos du Bois Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of black currant, blackberry, and oak barrel spice. It is a full-bodied red wine with a smooth texture that leads to a complex and slightly dry finish.

Working with a family of trusted growers from some of the best vineyards, each vintage is crafted to achieve balance, intensity, and true varietal character. The wine is deep purple in color with a ruby red hue; it displays aromas of ripe blackberry with hints of milk chocolate and oak barrel spice. This lush Cabernet Sauvignon red wine pairs well with grilled meats and veggies.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Modus Toscana IGT, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Modus Toscana Red Wine is full-bodied with a modern style and rich with silky tannins, making it the perfect addition to an elegant wine and cheese party.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Modus Toscana Red Wine weaves together vibrant fresh fruit flavors from sangiovese, cabernet sauvignon and merlot red grapes with finesse, each adding their own distinctive characteristics. Sangiovese lends texture, merlot works in smoothness and cabernet gives structure. This red wine blend is intriguing on the nose with initial aromas of mature red and black fruits, such as cherries, plums, and small black berries. These intense aromas are complemented by hints of spices, sweet tobacco and refined balsamic notes. Full-bodied with a modern style, this red wine blend is rich with silky tannins and a long finish of vanilla and red berry. Containing the best grapes from the Poggio Casciano estate, this Italian wine reveals itself without coaxing or manipulation. Pair a glass with duck and pancetta, beef-stuffed manicotti and aged cheeses. Store this bottle of wine at room temperature, but refrigerate for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring a glass. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Rex Goliath Pinot Noir has true varietal flavors, an easy drinking fruit-forward profile. A fine balance between soft, subtle, complex and bold. This red wine can be paired with a variety of foods.
ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. With true varietal flavors and an easy drinking, fruit-forward profile, this pinot noir reaches a fine balance between soft and subtle, complex and bold. It is the perfect wine for everyday drinking, and can be paired with a wide variety of foods.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Hogue Genesis Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Hogue Genesis Cabernet Sauvignon opens with blueberry, cherry, strawberry, molasses, dried tobacco leaf, toast, and cream. The palate of this red wine is rich and creamy along with spice flavors.
ProductDescLong: The majority of  Washington’s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing.  Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. The Genesis Cabernet Sauvignon's grapes were picked at mid-day and during the late afternoon to encourage fermentation. This cabernet opens with blueberry, cherry, strawberry, molasses, dried tobacco leaf, toast, and cream. The palate is rich and creamy with blackberry, vanilla, maple, cocoa, and spice flavors. Pair with braised short ribs, roast pork, or grilled salmon.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Merlot, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Merlot Red Wine has intense, ripe flavors and bright acidity, making it a great addition to a wine and cheese pairing or a dinner party.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Merlot Red Wine has intense, ripe flavors and bright acidity that pairs well with a variety of dishes. Distinctive aromas of ripe red cherry, Asian plum and cranberry, along with hints of black olive, tea leaf, baking spice and sweet oak, make this red merlot a unique dark red wine. Mocha, brown sugar and sweet oak round out the nose, while the palate brims with dark ripe cherry, Marion berry and plum flavors. Oak aging lends sweet toast and brown sugar notes to the lingering finish. This Robert Mondavi red wine is crafted with fruit from California's Central Coast vineyards, where slow ripening in the cool climate by the Pacific Ocean encourages complexity and depth of flavor. Made with phenomenal grapes, Central Coast wine is of the utmost quality and is offered by Robert Mondavi Private Selection at a more accessible price. Pair this merlot wine with rotisserie chicken, meat ravioli, wild salmon and herbed cheese. Serve cool at around 60 degrees for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA
