ProductDescLong: Situated at a midpoint in the Central Coast, the Templeton vineyard and winery location is ideal for sourcing fruit from vineyards north and south of the winery, along with its low-vigor soils, proven ground water table, and rural atmosphere. The varieties of soil composition and micro-climates that can be found within the expansive Central Coast appellation present the opportunity to cultivate the same varietal in a wide range of growing conditions. Wild Horse Viognier has aromas of lychee, stone fruit, passion fruit, slate, and bright minerality. This white wine is ripe with an opulent acidity. Flavors of zesty lime, pineapple, and Nashi pear lead to a clean, fresh finish. Enjoy this wine with seared scallops, Pad Thai, or aged cheese. Varietal: 88% viognier, 12% grenache blanc.

ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Pinot Noir Red Wine offers rich, fruit-forward flavors and bright aromas of strawberry and cherry with a hint of spice. This wine matches best with light red meats.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Pinot Noir Red Wine offers a bright, fruit-forward glass of wine with strawberry and cherry aromas set off by a hint of spice and toast. Ripe cherry flavor and rich cocoa stand out in this full-bodied California red wine that culminates in a velvety, smooth finish. Sourced from the region of Lodi, these pinot noir wine grapes are grown by local producers and processed with Woodbridge's unique growing techniques and state-of-the-art technology for winemaking. Enjoy this Woodbridge wine on its own, or pair it with light meat dishes, pork chops or even pasta with red sauce. Keep this bottle of wine stored at room temperature, but let it chill in the refrigerator for 30 to 60 minutes before serving it cool for that perfect taste. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day, Woodbridge offers approachable red wines that you don't have to overthink. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Rex Goliath Free Range, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Red Goliath Free Range is full-bodied with juicy red fruit flavors. Slightly sweet with plum and cocoa, for a smooth delicious finish. This red wine is easy to share with your fellow wine adventurer.
ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. Full-bodied with big and juicy red fruit flavors, Free Range Red is slightly sweet with ripe plum and cocoa, and delivers a mild tannin structure for a smooth, delicious finish. It’s smooth and easy to share with your fellow red wine adventurer.

ProductDescShort: From our famed To Kalon Vineyard. Robert Mondavi Winery Cabernet Sauvignon has concentrated dark fruit aromas that lead to a savory, earthy complexity with a long, luxurious finish.
ProductDescLong: The unique geography and climate of Napa Valley are what allows Robert Mondavi Winery Wines to grow a variety of delicious grapes that give the wines their distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. The grapes soak up sun in the afternoon and are cooled by evening fog. They mature slowly, developing intense, pure fruit flavors unique to California Coastal vineyards. This Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon is grown in Napa Valley, California and is a 2014 vintage. This cabernet sauvignon tastes of sweet dark cherry and richly concentrated blackberry fruits. It has a savory, earthy complexity, and toasty oak, vanilla, and spice which lingers through the luxuriously long finish. This wine is composed of 93% cabernet sauvignon, 6% cabernet franc, and 1% petit verdot.

DigitalCatalogProductName: SIMI Sonoma County Dry Rose, Blush Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: SIMI Sonoma County Dry Rose Wine is a versatile and refreshing, fruity wine with balanced acidity and a lengthy finish, ideal as an aperitif or to pair with chicken, pork, pasta, cheese or salad.
ProductDescLong: SIMI Sonoma County Dry Rose Wine is a versatile, blush wine that invigorates the palate with bright, luscious flavors. Brimming with tastes of fresh strawberry, red cherry, citrus, and melon, this rose wine is made with a variety of grapes. Each batch is then pressed and saignéed before fermenting in stainless steel tanks. Blending cabernet sauvignon grapes from Sonoma County with merlot for softness, malbec to spice things up a bit, and syrah, zinfandel, and graciano for structure, this California wine is forward and focused with a velvety texture, bright and balanced acidity and a lengthy tart cherry finish. Each glass delivers delightful aromas of ripe strawberry, watermelon, tangerine and a hint of white flower. Enjoy this refreshing, light wine as a tasty aperitif or as the perfect companion to a green salad, chicken and pork dishes, pasta or even fresh fruit and feta. To preserve its taste and quality, refrigerate this SIMI wine for at least two hours, and serve chilled. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 SIMI Winery, Geyserville, CA

ProductDescShort: Cuvée Sauvage Russian River Pinot Noir offers balanced acidity and a refined finish, bursting with notes of wild strawberry and rose petal, followed by a palate of cherry and sassafras.
ProductDescLong: Dense fog. Rugged earth. The wild terrain of the Russian River Valley produces Pinot Noir with rich ?avor, balanced acidity and a re?ned ?nish. Cuvée Sauvage meaning ‘wild blend’ marries untamed terroir with restraint in the cellar to yield an elegant Pinot Noir. Our winemaker, Melissa Stackhouse, believes that her role is to shepherd the wines, guiding the fruit and terroir to its ultimate expression. She focuses on selecting grapes from the most renowned vineyards while taking a minimalist approach to winemaking. Our Pinot Noir offers layered notes of wild strawberry and rose petal, followed by a palate of cherry and sassafras.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Wild Horse Reserve Cheval Sauvage Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Wild Horse Reserve Chardonnay has aromas of caramel, crème brulee, freshly baked pastry, lemon zest, pineapple, coconut, and spice. The flavors are a delicious balance of freshness and creaminess.
ProductDescLong: Situated at a midpoint in the Central Coast, the Templeton vineyard and winery location is ideal for sourcing fruit from vineyards north and south of the winery, along with its low-vigor soils, proven ground water table, and rural atmosphere. The varieties of soil composition and micro-climates that can be found within the expansive Central Coast appellation present the opportunity to cultivate the same varietal in a wide range of growing conditions. Wild Horse Reserve Cheval Sauvage Chardonnay offers an inviting blend of aromas, including caramel, crème brulee, freshly baked pastry, lemon zest, pineapple, coconut, and spice. The flavors are a delicious balance of freshness and creaminess, with vanilla, apple and lemon. Pairs well with brie and smoked gouda cheese, pork chops and apple compote, pumpkin risotto, and fried chicken. Varietal: 100% chardonnay.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Aziano Chianti Classico DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Aziano Chianti Classico Red Wine is aged for 11 months to bring out its inviting flavors of red berries and elegant, long finish. Savor this dark red wine with roasted veal or chicken.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Aziano Chianti Classico Red Wine delivers a taste straight from the heart of Tuscany. Building on a time honored tradition, this Ruffino Chianti comes from a grape-growing region that began producing the chianti varietal in 1398. With notes of sweet violet, red berries and wild cherries, this Italian red wine adds aromatic hints of plum. This dark red wine is bold yet inviting, a combination specific to Ruffino Chianti produced in the stretch of Tuscany south of Florence. Aged for 11 months in vats, then another four months in the bottle, this red table wine is versatile and pairs well with several dishes. Keep a bottle of this Tuscan wine handy for traditional Italian dishes such as roasted veal or grilled chicken with olive oil and rosemary. Savor each taste of this dark red wine, known for its velvety tannins and an elegant, long finish. For the best taste, keep this Italian red wine stored at room temperature and chill for up to an hour before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA.

ProductDescShort: Paul Masson Dessert Marsala is sweet, slightly crisp, with a full nutty flavor complemented by a fragrant bouquet of citrus and pears. This red wine is perfect for an after dinner drink.

Paul Masson uses an old-world method of aging in small oak casks, resulting in a smooth flavor and finish. These wines are available in the only carafe package in the industry. DigitalCatalogProductName: Mount Veeder Cabernet Franc, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mount Veeder Cabernet Franc has a smooth entry of mixed berries and cherry cordial leading to a good depth of flavor. This red wine has aromas of luscious blackberry, bay, anise and cocoa.
ProductDescLong: Mount Veeder Winery was the first vineyard in the Napa Valley appellation to have all five of the grape varieties used in a classic Bordeaux blend. Mount Veeder Winery feels that blending is the key to crafting the most complete, balanced wine. Artisanal winemaking skills, beginning with gentle handling in the vineyard and finishing with extended barrel aging in the cellar, ensure the wines are enjoyable upon release, yet capable of graceful aging. Smooth entry of mixed berries and cherry cordial lead to black pepper and savory notes with good depth of flavor. Abundant with pepper and tobacco notes on the long finish. Aromas of luscious dark cherry, blackberry, bay, anise and cocoa are rich and inviting on the nose. Varietal: 76% cabernet franc, 24% cabernet sauvignon.

ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is medium bodied with ripe fruit flavors and bright acidity. It pairs well with hearty pasta and roasted or grilled meats.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine has a fresh fruit character and bright acidity that pairs well with a variety of dishes. This delicious red wine has flavors of ripe Bing cherries, blackberries and plum, accented with vanilla, toasty oak and hints of coffee. Aromas of red berry and spice, juicy cherry, black currant and black pepper complete this cabernet sauvignon wine. Crafted with grapes from the cool-climate Central Coast vineyards, this California red wine has a complexity and depth of flavor influenced by its slow ripening by the Pacific Ocean. Made from phenomenal grapes, Central Coast wine is ultimately of the utmost quality and is offered by Robert Mondavi Private Selection at a more accessible price. This medium bodied cabernet sauvignon wine pairs well with roasted or grilled meats, hearty pasta or strong cheese. Serve cool at around 60 degrees for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Mark West Willamette Valley Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mark West Pinot Noir is earthy red in color, with cranberry, cherry, and red apple aromas. A touch of vanilla, baking spice, coffee, and moist, earthy soil lead to a clean, dry finish.
ProductDescLong: Mark West Wines accepts nothing less than the best, which is why the fruit for the wines is sourced from the finest vineyards throughout California. To make the best pinot noir, vintners first gently de-stem and crush the grapes when they come into the winery. Daily punch-downs and pump-overs extract flavor and color. This pinot noir is earthy red in color, with cranberry, cherry, and red apple aromas. A touch of vanilla, baking spice, coffee, and moist, earthy soil lead to a clean, dry finish.  Pair perfectly with meats...many different meats. And cheese...firm cheese like Asiago, dry jack, or manchego. At Mark West, there's nothing more important than sharing a passion for pinot with others.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Chianti DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Chianti DOCG Red Wine is an Italian wine that balances freshness with a soft and lingering finish. With fruity and floral aromatics, it pairs well with Italian dishes or a classic hamburger.
ProductDescLong: Chianti DOCG Red Wine combines sangiovese grapes with merlot and cabernet sauvignon to create this top quality red wine blend. This Ruffino wine features deep, fruity plum and intense cherry flavors, accompanied by hints of spice, hazelnut, and delicate violet aromas. Harvested from the well-known winegrowing areas of the Chianti region, this red blend goes through alcoholic fermentation aided by racking and punch-downs in stainless steel and concrete vats for two weeks, followed by four months of aging. This results in a fresh and balanced medium-bodied fruity wine that is easy to enjoy and lingers on the palate. Easy to sip and approachable, this chianti wine pairs well with Italian dishes such as ravioli, margherita pizza, and beef carpaccio, or international favorites such as a classic hamburger. As its first wine ever produced, this chianti red wine occupies a special place in the heart and history of Ruffino, serving as a benchmark for quality and consistency for many wine lovers worldwide. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescLong: The majority of Washington’s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing. Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. This gewürztraminer offers up varietal spiciness, along with intense aromas and flavors of lychee, tangerine, orange, peach, melon, apple, honey, and cream. Serve with Thai coconut milk curries or pork skewers with a peanut-ginger dipping sauce, sausages, or sauerbraten.

ProductDescShort: Cook’s California Champagne Brut is fruity and fresh. This medium-dry Prosecco-style sparkling wine features ripe aromas and flavors of apple and pear balanced by toasty yeast and floral nuances.
ProductDescLong: Cook’s California Champagne is produced at the Mission Bell Winery in Madera, California. Cook’s began in 1859 when Isaac Cook created the first American champagne. Cook's wines have been continuing the tradition of being quality champagnes ever since. Fruity and fresh, this medium-dry Prosecco-style sparkling wine features ripe aromas and flavors of apple and pear balanced by toasty yeast and floral nuances. Cook's California Champagne sparkling wines are perfect for every celebration. Best served chill.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Richards Wild Irish Rose, Red Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. Wild Irish Rose 17% Red Wine is 100% pure grape wine with a medium body and medium sweetness.
ProductDescLong: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. One of the first branded wines in America, Wild Irish Rose has been delivering quality, full-flavored, and fruity fortified wines for more than 50 years. The lambrusco and vinifera juices are cool fermented in stainless steel. The wine is then blended, sweetened, and fortified with citrus brandy. Wild Irish Rose 17% Red Wine is 100% pure grape wine. A proprietary blend of native New York grape juice and white grape juice is used. Special care is taken to preserve the delicate, concord grape taste profile and color. Balance: medium body and medium sweet. Fruit: concord grape character.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Pinot Grigio, White Wine, 500 mL Go Pack
ProductDescShort: With aromas of nectarine and fresh peach, this crisp and refreshing Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Pinot Grigio is a food-friendly white wine. It is well-rounded with a refreshing peach-citrus finish.
ProductDescLong: As the central valley heats up, cool maritime breezes are drawn across Woodbridge's Lodi region winery creating a Mediterranean-like climate of warm days and cool nights ideal for growing premium grapes. By using modern technology for winemaking, employing unique growing techniques, and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to help ensure high quality grapes that would produce excellent wines. With aromas of nectarine and fresh peach, this crisp and refreshing Pinot Grigio is a food-friendly wine and a delightful addition to any warm and sunny afternoon and pairs well with seafood and other light dishes. Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Pinot Grigio is a well-rounded white wine with a refreshing peach-citrus finish that pairs nicely with oysters, roast chicken or Brie. Serve slightly chilled. Fine wines for everyday enjoyment, since 1979.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Prosecco DOC, Italian White Sparkling Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is a creamy and crisp Italian prosecco with flavors of peach and golden apples. It is ideal on its own or paired with pizza, seafood and shellfish dishes.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is an Italian sparkling wine meant to be sipped and enjoyed. This creamy and crisp extra dry white wine offers fruity aromas accompanied by hints of wisteria, with an intense peach and golden apple flavor. This Italian wine begins in the hilly area of Valdobbiadene, with glera grapes that undergo a traditional wine vinification. The winemakers then use selected yeasts in a natural refermentation process to create this clean and delicate Ruffino prosecco wine with refined bubbles and a pleasant finish. Enjoy this Italian prosecco as an aperitif, mix it into your favorite cocktail or pair it with margherita pizza, seafood, shellfish and white meat dishes. For the best quality and taste, drink this Ruffino wine young. Refrigerate for three to three and a half hours and serve at a temperature between 45 and 48 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA.

ProductDescShort: Cribari Cellars Dessert Sherry is a slightly sweet, full-bodied sherry, with a nutty, caramel aroma and flavor. Use this red wine to enhance your meals by adding it to your favorite recipe.
ProductDescLong: Traditional dessert wines that are perfect for any culinary application, Cribari offers a range of premium flavors that add to any chef’s arsenal. Cribari Cellars’ award-winning sherry is made by a method called baking which recreates the flavor created centuries ago during transport from Spain to the West Indies. Cribari Sherry is a pale straw color, slightly sweet, full-bodied sherry, with a nutty, caramel aroma and flavor. You can enjoy this fine red wine as an aperitif or enhance your meals by adding it to your favorite recipe. Cribari brings out the flavor in wine-based dishes.

DigitalCatalogProductName: SIMI Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: SIMI Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon Dark Red Wine is an incredibly food-friendly drink with fruity flavors and notes of cocoa. It will especially bring out the best flavors in grilled steaks.
ProductDescLong: SIMI Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon Dark Red Wine is welcoming and inviting with pleasing flavors that make it a no-brainer when it comes to food and wine pairing. Characterized by balanced flavors of red and black fruits, this red wine gives way to complex notes of cocoa, cassis, pepper berry and cedar. The red grapes for this cabernet sauvignon are specially selected from the warmer Alexander Valley sub-district of Sonoma County, giving each sip of this red California wine a supple, velvety finish with notes of roasted coffee on the palate. That lingering taste brings out the best flavors in grilled steaks with roasted mushrooms, as well as duck or lamb. You can't go wrong adding a glass of this SIMI wine to a wide variety of savory dishes. Store this bottle of red wine at room temperature, and chill for 30 minutes before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 SIMI Winery, Geyserville, CA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Mark West Russian River Valley Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mark West Pinot Noir, sourced from the finest vineyards throughout California, is richly aromatic with a dark ruby red color and flavors of fresh black plum, ripe cherry, and toasty oak.
ProductDescLong: Mark West Wines accepts nothing less than the best, which is why the fruit for the wines is sourced from the finest vineyards throughout California. To make the best pinot noir, vintners first gently de-stem and crush the grapes when they come into the winery. Daily punch-downs and pump-overs extract flavor and color. This pinot noir is richly aromatic with a dark ruby red color and flavors of fresh black plum, ripe cherry, and toasty oak. Pair perfectly with some of our favorites: baked honey mustard chicken, beef Burgundy, and crab cake Benedict. At Mark West, there's nothing more important than sharing a passion for pinot with others.

ProductDescShort: Rex Goliath red moscato is the king of sweet, with majestic jam and strawberry punch flavors. Best served chilled or ice-cold, enjoy this sweet wine alongside your favorite fruit or cheese.
ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. This red moscato is the king of sweet, with majestic jam and strawberry punch flavors. Best served chilled or ice-cold, enjoy this refreshingly sweet wine alongside your favorite fruit or cheese.

DigitalCatalogProductName: 7 Moons Dark Red Blend, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: 7 Moons Dark Side Red Wine Blend is a complex California wine with a smooth and rich finish that complements a broad range of foods, from bacon cheeseburgers and mushroom risotto to Thai food.
ProductDescLong: 7 Moons Dark Side Red Wine Blend celebrates the phases of the moon by combining seven different grape varietals. The result is a complex but easy to drink dark red wine that perfectly complements a broad range of foods. This red blend opens with aromas of currant, blackberry and toasty oak that lead into dark berry, caramel and brown sugar flavors. This California wine sources syrah, merlot, petite sirah, zinfandel, cabernet sauvignon, malbec and grenache grapes from prime vineyards up and down the Central Coast and Lodi regions, creating a red wine blend with a superb color and great depth, varietal intensity and balance. With a smooth and rich finish that carries delicious, fruity flavors, this lush, dark wine pairs well with bacon cheeseburgers, mushroom risotto or Thai food. For best taste, store this Central Coast wine at room temperature, then chill for 30 to 60 minutes before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 7 Moons Wine Co., Oakville, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Lodola Nuova Vino Nobile Di Montepulciano DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Lodola Nuova Vino Nobile Di Montepulciano DOCG Red Wine is an elegant and traditional Italian red wine with an intense fruit flavor and flower scent that pairs well with rich dishes.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Lodola Nuova Vino Nobile Di Montepulciano DOCG Red Wine is an elegant deep ruby red wine with intense notes of ripe plum, followed by delicate scents of fresh meadow flowers. With spicy sensations and hints of leather and nutmeg, this Italian wine blends sangiovese, merlot and cabernet sauvignon grapes from the Lodola Nuova Estate in the Montepulciano area. Aged for 18 months in oak barrels after malolactic fermentation and a brief rest in stainless-steel vats, this varietal blend results in a top-quality Italian red wine that exemplifies Ruffino's unique and artisanal approach to winemaking. Each sip features a fruity core highlighted by a well-balanced structure, velvety tannins, and a smooth and lingering finish. Enjoy this fine wine with richly flavored dishes such as roasted game, braised lamb with rosemary, veal marsala, cassoulet, seared duck breast, or a famed Florentine steak. Store this bottle of wine at room temperature, chill for 30 to 60 minutes before serving.  Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

Pinnacles Vineyard was one of the first vineyards in California to be planted with a permanent irrigation system. ProductDescLong: Situated at a midpoint in the Central Coast, the Templeton vineyard and winery location is ideal for sourcing fruit from vineyards north and south of the winery, along with its low-vigor soils, proven ground water table, and rural atmosphere. The varieties of soil composition and micro-climates that can be found within the expansive Central Coast appellation present the opportunity to cultivate the same varietal in a wide range of growing conditions. Wild Horse Pinot Noir has complex aromas of ripe cherry, dark fruit, nutmeg, earth, strawberry pie, and vanilla. DigitalCatalogProductName: Black Box Malbec, Red Wine, 3 L Box
ProductDescShort: Black Box Wines Malbec explodes with rich blackberry aromas, juicy plum flavors and hints of leather and chocolate. Balanced acidity leads to a velvety finish. Pair with meats or grilled vegetables.
ProductDescLong: Made from grapes harvested in world-class appellations, Black Box Wines have won over 70 Gold Medals at wine competitions throughout the US and have been awarded over 34 Wine Enthusiast Best Buys. Through a meticulous winemaking process, each of our wines is crafted to be food-friendly, fruit-forward and easy-to-drink. DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Chianti DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Chianti DOCG Red Wine is an Italian wine that balances freshness with a soft and lingering finish. With fruity and floral aromatics, it pairs well with Italian dishes or a classic hamburger.
ProductDescLong: Chianti DOCG Red Wine combines sangiovese grapes with merlot and cabernet sauvignon to create this top quality red wine blend. This Ruffino wine features deep, fruity plum and intense cherry flavors, accompanied by hints of spice, hazelnut, and delicate violet aromas. Harvested from the well-known winegrowing areas of the Chianti region, this red blend goes through alcoholic fermentation aided by racking and punch-downs in stainless steel and concrete vats for two weeks, followed by four months of aging. This results in a fresh and balanced medium-bodied fruity wine that is easy to enjoy and lingers on the palate. Easy to sip and approachable, this chianti wine pairs well with Italian dishes such as ravioli, margherita pizza, and beef carpaccio, or international favorites such as a classic hamburger. As its first wine ever produced, this chianti red wine occupies a special place in the heart and history of Ruffino, serving as a benchmark for quality and consistency for many wine lovers worldwide. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Cooper and Thief Bourbon Barrel Aged Red Blend, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Cooper and Thief Bourbon Barrel Aged Red Wine Blend celebrates doing things differently with a bold, bourbon-inspired taste and dark fruit notes that complement the likes of beef, lamb and poultry.
ProductDescLong: Cooper and Thief Bourbon Barrel Aged Red Wine Blend is aged in bourbon whiskey barrels for three months, giving it a velvety mouthfeel with subtle heat. Merlot, syrah, zinfandel, petite sirah and cabernet sauvignon collide in one bourbon barrel to create this dark and jammy wine, which features true bourbon flavor. Crafted by Cellarmaster Jeff Kasavan, each taste of this California red wine gives way to aromatic hints of fruit and toasty vanilla. This dark red wine garners its unique taste thanks to varietals found all across California's prime winegrowing regions. Bring this red blend along on your next picnic and enjoy it on its own, or stack this rich, bold taste up against lamb or poultry. The bourbon barrel aging gives this wine soft tannins that deliver a full-bodied and lingering finish in each sip. For a devilishly good taste, keep this red wine blend stored at room temperature, and chill it before serving. Born from mischief, Cooper and Thief Wine celebrates doing things differently. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Cooper & Thief Cellarmasters, Lodi, CA USA.

ProductDescShort: Simply Naked Sauvignon Blanc is a juicy and refreshing wine with flavors of tangerine, lime, and a burst of pineapple on the finish. This white wine pairs well with lobster, sushi, and grilled pork.
ProductDescLong: Simply Naked wines reveal themselves as they really are, without being hidden by the flavor of oak. By choosing not to oak-age our wines, we are allowing the crisp fruit flavor and the true varietal characteristics to shine through. ProductDescShort: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Wine Blend features bold tastes of berry and vanilla with notes of dark chocolate and roasted fig, making this red blend perfect at your next barbecue.
ProductDescLong: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Wine Blend is ripe and luscious with a diverse combination of grapes that gives it a distinct quality and character. This red blend is inspired by the mixed blacks first made by the Italian immigrants who originally settled in Napa Valley. Crafted through the unlikely mix of zinfandel, cabernet sauvignon, petite sirah, syrah and charbono, this California red wine features enticing aromas of bing cherry, dark chocolate, clove and roasted fig. Those scents give way to persistent tastes of raspberry, boysenberry and pomegranate with a lingering vanilla flavor. Aged in a combination of French and American oak barrels, the full flavors of this Napa Valley wine make it a great match for grilled and barbecued meats, especially if you throw sweet or tomato-based sauce on top. Top off a meal with this red blend for a smooth and luscious finish that lingers on the palate. Choose The Prisoner wine to add a little edge to your glass of wine. ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Riesling White Wine pairs with a variety of foods, offering flavors and aromas of orange rind, jasmine, stone fruit, and crisp citrus.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Riesling White Wine is a refreshing and easy to enjoy wine that displays aromas of jasmine, stone fruit and crisp citrus combined with flavors of orange rind, ending in a long, crisp finish. Made with grapes sourced from Lodi, this table white wine displays true riesling varietal character. Sip a glass of this richly textured riesling wine on its own on a warm afternoon or serve with lightly sauteed chicken, seared scallops, or a crisp apple tart. By cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to produce high quality grapes for a bottle of wine that is approachable and perfectly balanced. Chill this delicate white wine for at least two hours before serving for the best taste. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day, Woodbridge offers easy-drinking white wines that you don't have to overthink. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Bourbon Barrel Aged Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Bourbon Barrel Aged Chardonnay White Wine is the first chardonnay wine aged in bourbon barrels. It pairs well with halibut, shrimp scampi or bacon wrapped dates.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Bourbon Barrel Aged Chardonnay White Wine is the world's first and only chardonnay wine aged in bourbon barrels. With intense aromas of ripe pineapple and toasted coconut framed by hints of toasted marshmallow and vanilla bean custard, this aged wine offers rich, creamy flavors of grilled pineapple, juicy peach, lemon custard, graham cracker, toffee and vanilla bean. Crafted from coastal fruit in Monterrey County, this California chardonnay wine is aged for at least two months in new bourbon barrels that give it its rich and toasty flavor. It's also aged in used bourbon barrels from a Kentucky distillery, which add notes of vanilla and baking spices, reflecting the expressive character of this original approach to barrel aging. Balanced by bright acidity and a lingering finish, enjoy this decadent Robert Mondavi wine with grilled halibut, shrimp scampi or bacon wrapped dates. For best taste, refrigerate this white wine for at least two hours before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

Soft supple tannins, a rich mouthfeel and a long, silky finish provide a memorable ending to this luscious and expressive wine. Varietal: 72% cabernet sauvignon, 2% merlot, 5% petit verdot, 1% malbec, 1% cabernet franc.

Pinnacles Vineyard was one of the first vineyards in California to be planted with a permanent irrigation system. Lavish, silky tannins mid-palate, complemented with black currant, vanilla, and dark chocolate flavors and a nice lingering finish. DigitalCatalogProductName: Franciscan Halo Napa Valley Magnificat Meritage, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Franciscan Napa Valley Magnificat red wine opens with a beautiful nose of cherry, notes of vanilla, and sandalwood. The smooth finish lingers with notes of toasty oak, and chocolate to the finish.
ProductDescLong: Founded in 1973, Franciscan has a long tradition of crafting wine with a highly meticulous approach. Franciscan's home estate is located in Oakville, right in the heart of the Napa Valley appellation. This 240-acre parcel of land features loamy, gravelly, well-draining soil which adds structure to the wines. At Franciscan Estate, the wine lots are kept separate from the vineyard until just before bottling. After picking by hand, every load of grapes is assigned its own tank. Franciscan Napa Valley Magnificat red wine opens with a beautiful nose of ripe, perfumed cherry, with notes of vanilla, dark berry, sandalwood and creme brulee. The smooth finish lingers with notes of ripe cherry, toasty oak, and bittersweet chocolate to the finish. Varietal: 70% cabernet sauvignon, 22% merlot, 4% petit verdot, 4% malbec.

ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Merlot Red Wine showcases glorious richness and mouthwatering fruit flavors that pair well with a variety of proteins, such as chicken, lamb, pork or duck.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Merlot Red Wine showcases glorious richness and mouthwatering fruit flavors. Deeply intense blackberry and black plum flavors layer with oak spices and a fresh, earthy complexity on the palate. Firm, velvety tannins are balanced by the refreshing acidity and long finish. The unique geography and climate of Napa Valley produce delicious grapes that give Robert Mondavi wine its distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. This merlot wine undergoes 22 days of maceration to maximize color and flavor extraction and polish the tannins for a lush, round mouthfeel. Cabernet sauvignon is included in the blend to enhance the wine's structure, balance and complex flavor profile. Pair a glass of this delicious red wine with your favorite chicken, pork, beef, lamb or duck dishes. Store at room temperature, but refrigerate this bottle of wine prior to serving for about 30 to 60 minutes. Serve cool for optimal taste. ProductDescShort: Cribari Cellars Dessert Madeira is sweet, slightly crisp, with a nutty flavor complemented citrus and pears. You can enjoy this fine red wine as an aperitif or add it to your favorite chicken or veal recipe.
ProductDescLong: Traditional dessert wines that are perfect for any culinary application, Cribari offers a range of premium flavors that add to any chef’s arsenal. Cribari Cellars' award-winning madeira is made by a method called baking which recreates the flavor created centuries ago during transport from Spain to the West Indies. Cribari Madeira is a deep amber color, sweet, slightly crisp, with a full nutty flavor complemented by a fragrant bouquet of citrus and pears. DigitalCatalogProductName: Inniskillin Niagara Icewine VQA Riesling, White Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Inniskillin Niagara Icewine Riesling opens with aromas of orange, spice and lime. Flavors of peach and apricot balanced by a crisp acidity. This white wine pairs well with scallops or baked apples.
ProductDescLong: Inniskillin Icewine, recognized as one of the world’s great wines, is truly winter’s gift to wine lovers. Harvested at the pinnacle of Canada’s crisp winter, the grapes are naturally frozen on the vine and picked when the temperature drops to -10 degrees C. Only a few drops of luscious nectar can be squeezed from each bunch, which is then expertly guided through fermentation to achieve this rich and alluring specialty wine. This Niagara River appellation wine opens with aromatics of fresh orange, spice, lemon and lime. On the palate this rich and elegant wine shows great texture with concentrated flavors of peach, apricot along with a hint of clove, balanced by a crisp and lively acidity. Pairs well with brie with lavender honey, firm aged cheddar, seared scallops or classic baked apples. Serve chilled.

ProductDescLong: Founded in 1973, Franciscan has a long tradition of crafting wine with a highly meticulous approach. Franciscan's home estate is located in Oakville, right in the heart of the Napa Valley appellation. ProductDescShort: 240 Days Riesling shows expressive aromas of lime zest and white peach. This white wine has an off-dry palate, crisp with zesty acidity and a long finish.
ProductDescLong: 240 Days represents the epitome of winemaker precision amid regional complexity, highlighting some of the best-quality wines the Finger Lakes have to offer. The grapes were whole-cluster pressed immediately after harvest to preserve their fresh, aromatic flavors. The juice was settled and racked into both temperature-controlled stainless steel and 6-year old, neutral French oak barrels. The two wines were blended to create this riesling. A stunning example of the Finger Lakes appellation signature varietal. This white wine shows expressive aromas of lime zest and white peach. The off-dry palate is crisp with zesty acidity and a long finish. Varietal: 100% riesling.

ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Red Blend Red Wine brings you a deliciously rich, full-bodied blend of warm, toasty aromas and flavors, including jammy blackberry, vanilla, and baking spices. This California wine combines some of the best attributes of three different grape varieties that notably highlight blackberry and vanilla flavor. Syrah, zinfandel and petite sirah grapes are sourced from California's famous Lodi region and then combined with a touch of other complementary reds for a full and rich California red wine blend that gives way to a lingering finish. Store this red wine blend at room temperature, but chill in the refrigerator for 30 to 60 minutes before serving cool at around 60 degrees. Crafted for over 40 years and perfect for every day. DigitalCatalogProductName: Franciscan Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Franciscan Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of lush berry fruit, hazelnut, and vanilla. This red wine has notes of fruit, vanilla, clove, and tobacco, leading to a seamless, soft, and gentle finish.
ProductDescLong: Founded in 1973, Franciscan has a long tradition of crafting wine with a highly meticulous approach. Franciscan's home estate is located in Oakville, right in the heart of the Napa Valley appellation. This 240-acre parcel of land features loamy, gravelly, well-draining soil which adds structure to the wines. At Franciscan Estate, the wine lots are kept separate from the vineyard until just before bottling. After picking by hand, every load of grapes is assigned its own tank. This cabernet sauvignon has aromas of lush berry fruit, hazelnut, and vanilla. This wine has notes of fruit, vanilla, clove, and tobacco, leading to a seamless, soft, and gentle finish. Varietal: 87% cabernet sauvignon, 9% merlot, 2% malbac, 2% petit verdot.

ProductDescLong: As the central valley heats up, cool maritime breezes are drawn across Woodbridge's Lodi region winery creating a Mediterranean-like climate of warm days and cool nights ideal for growing premium grapes. By using modern technology for winemaking, employing unique growing techniques, and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to help ensure high quality grapes that would produce excellent wines. Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Cabernet Sauvignon opens with aromas of cherries, berries, cedar, brown sugar, and toast. Flavors of berries, toasted marshmallow, chocolate, and graham cracker follow with a toasty caramel finish. This medium-bodied red wine pairs deliciously with grilled meats and tomato-based pasta dishes. Wines for everyday enjoyment, since 1979

ProductDescShort: Ruffino Orvieto Classico White Wine has a smooth, refreshing flavor and a unique mineral character that makes a delicious aperitif and pairs beautifully with crostini, vegetables and grilled fish.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Orvieto Classico White Wine has a fruity and floral bouquet reminiscent of green apples and meadow flowers. This Italian wine's smooth, refreshing flavors balance beautifully with its structure and acidity. Orvieto Classico offers a unique mineral character that comes from the chalky limestone soil called tufa. The finish of this white wine is long and fragrant, with hints of almond. The grapes sourced for this Ruffino wine come from the well-known DOCG winegrowing regions of Orvieto Classico. Ruffino's traditional winemaking process, combined with a brief aging in stainless steel vats, delivers an Italian wine that reveals itself without coaxing or manipulation. Enjoy this refreshing white wine as an aperitif, or pair a glass with crostini, grilled vegetables, soup or grilled fish. This 1.5 liter bottle of wine holds an ideal amount for large gatherings. Refrigerate this bottle of wine for at least two hours, and serve chilled for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is a creamy and crisp Italian prosecco with flavors of peach and golden apples. It is ideal on its own or paired with pizza, seafood and shellfish dishes.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is an Italian sparkling wine meant to be sipped and enjoyed. This creamy and crisp extra dry white wine offers fruity aromas accompanied by hints of wisteria, with an intense peach and golden apple flavor. This Italian wine begins in the hilly area of Valdobbiadene, with glera grapes that undergo a traditional wine vinification. The winemakers then use selected yeasts in a natural refermentation process to create this clean and delicate Ruffino prosecco wine with refined bubbles and a pleasant finish. Enjoy this Italian prosecco as an aperitif, mix it into your favorite cocktail or pair it with margherita pizza, seafood, shellfish and white meat dishes. For the best quality and taste, drink this Ruffino wine young. Refrigerate for three to three and a half hours and serve at a temperature between 45 and 48 degrees. ProductDisclaimerSparkling: SPARKLING WARNING: BE CAREFUL! Point bottle away from self and others to avoid serious eye injury.  Stopper may eject forcefully while you are removing the hood or at any time after hood removal.  Bottle contains high pressure which increases with warmth or shaking.  To open: (1) chill well, (2) do not shake, (3) point bottle away from self and others, (4) remove hood, (5) twist stopper out slowly by hand.  NEVER use a cork remover or reinsert stopper.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ravenswood Old Hill Vineyard Zinfandel, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California’s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence. Aged 19 months in French oak barrels, this zinfandel is refined and reserved yet assertive. It displays aromas of red fruit, dried flowers, anise, and bramble spice. It as firm but very fine tannins, leading to a long enjoyable finish and terrific aging potential. Varietal: 96.8% zinfandel, 3.2% mixed blacks.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Kim Crawford Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Pinot Noir Red Wine features ripe, dark berry flavors with scents of dark cherry and spicy oak to complement savory dishes like rack of lamb.
ProductDescLong: Kim Crawford Pinot Noir Red Wine reflects the care that went into its creation. The high quality grapes used in this pinot noir wine are harvested in the cool night or early morning New Zealand air, producing a pinot noir with ripe, dark berry flavors of blackberry and black currant. Each glass of this red wine permeates aromas of red berry with dark cherry notes, complemented by savory undertones and spicy oak. This Kim Crawford wine starts on New Zealand's South Island, where it begins to develop the bold flavors that make it a great table-side companion for rack of lamb or mushroom risotto. This dark red wine has a full-bodied taste that helps bring a silky, satisfying finish to your meal. To keep this pinot noir wine tasting its best, store it at room temperature and chill for 30 to 60 minutes before serving. For a true taste of New Zealand, Make it Amazing with Kim Crawford Wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Constellation Imports, Rutherford, CA USA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Oro Gran Selezione Chianti Classico DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Oro Gran Selezione Chianti Classico DOCG Red Wine is an elegant and well-structured fruity wine with spicy notes. It pairs well with traditional Italian and American dishes.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Oro Gran Selezione Chianti Classico DOCG Red Wine is an elegant and well-structured red wine blend that expresses a distinctive Tuscan bouquet of violet, cherry and plum, with scents of chocolate and spice. Made with meticulously hand-harvested chianti, merlot and colorino grapes from Ruffino's acclaimed Gretole and Santedame estates in the Castellina sub-region of Chianti Classico, this Italian red wine offers powerfully fruity flavors with intriguing notes of cinnamon and clove. This red blend ages in oak, stainless steel and concrete vats for 36 months, followed by additional months in the bottle before release, resulting in a full-bodied chianti wine with elegant tannins, good acidity and a lasting finish with hints of chocolate and coffee. Enjoy this fine wine with traditional Italian dishes such as pasta with bolognese sauce, wild boar ragu or eggplant parmesan. It also pairs well with classic American dishes such as grilled rib eye and roasted vegetables. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Moscato White Wine is a light, fruity drink with a bright finish that complements a wide variety of foods, including roasted pears and fruit tarts.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Moscato White Wine is a delicious, balanced complement to a wide variety of foods. With a fragrant bouquet of orange blossoms and citrus, this white moscato has a light taste without being too sugary or overpowering. Perfect for afternoon sipping, each taste of this moscato wine brings out notes of Fuji apple and lemon cream. This lightly sweet white wine is crafted in the Lodi region, which is ideal for growing premium grapes thanks to its Mediterranean-like climate. Serve this moscato wine in chilled glasses alongside lightly sweet desserts like roasted pears, fruit tarts or even almond cake. The residual sugar of this white moscato is balanced out by its bright acidity, providing a delightful foil to sweet dishes. Bring out a bottle of this moscato wine when you want a bright and light finish to your meal. To get the most delicious taste, keep this white wine bottle refrigerated for at least 2 to 2 and a half hours before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Mark West Pinot Noir is medium-bodied with black cherry, cola, strawberry, plum, and soft tannins. This red wine pairs well with light, tomato-based sauces, grilled salmon, and roasted pork.
ProductDescLong: Mark West Wines accepts nothing less than the best, which is why the fruit for the wines is sourced from the finest vineyards throughout California’s appellation. To make the best pinot noir, vintners first gently de-stem and crush the grapes when they come into the winery. Daily punch-downs and pump-overs extract flavor and color. At Mark West, there's nothing more important than sharing a passion for pinot with others.  This pinot is the original. It is medium-bodied with black cherry, cola, strawberry, plum, and soft tannins. It pairs well with light, tomato-based sauces, grilled salmon, and roasted pork.

ProductDescLong: The Manischewitz winery is located in Canandaigua, New York, and is best known for its budget concord wine. It is aged in steel tanks at cold temperatures to maintain fruit aromas. This sweet wine has a pleasant mouth feel and a smooth aftertaste with plenty of grape flavor and a subtle aroma of confectionery flavors. ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Red Blend Red Wine brings you a deliciously rich, full-bodied blend of warm, toasty aromas and flavors, including jammy blackberry, vanilla, and baking spices. This California wine combines some of the best attributes of three different grape varieties that notably highlight blackberry and vanilla flavor. Syrah, zinfandel and petite sirah grapes are sourced from California's famous Lodi region and then combined with a touch of other complementary reds for a full and rich California red wine blend that gives way to a lingering finish. Store this red wine blend at room temperature, but chill in the refrigerator for 30 to 60 minutes before serving cool at around 60 degrees. Crafted for over 40 years and perfect for every day. ProductDescShort: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. This Wild Fruit Wine is balanced, medium-bodied and flavored with ginseng. It contains 13.9% ABV.
ProductDescLong: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. One of the first branded wines in America, Wild Irish Rose has been delivering quality, full-flavored, and fruity fortified wines for more than 50 years. The lambrusco and vinifera juices are cool fermented in stainless steel. The wine is then blended and sweetened. Wild Irish Rose 13.9% Wild Fruit Wine is a proprietary blend of concord grapes and native New York grape concentrate with enhanced grape character and color. Special care is taken to preserve the delicate, neutral taste profile and color. It's flavored with the earthy taste of ginseng. Balance: medium body. Fruit: tropical fruits, mango.

ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California’s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence. Big, bold Vintners Blend wines are crafted for those who refuse to flock to the latest fad. This zinfandel is a not-too-dry, medium-bodied, juicy, red wine with ripe raspberry, boysenberry, and bramble. Varietal: 76% zinfandel, 21% petite sirah, and 3% mixed blacks.

ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Chardonnay White Wine opens with delightful aromas of tropical fruit and hints of butterscotch. This table white wine pairs well with pan-seared salmon and other white meat dishes.
ProductDescLong: Kim Crawford Chardonnay White Wine is an approachable and full-bodied white wine that shows great length and persistence. It has a medium weight with aromas of ripe tropical fruit, including pineapple and ripe melon.  This chardonnay wine offers a creamy texture and hints of butterscotch, lemon meringue pie, ripe stone fruit and citrus. Kim Crawford Chardonnay contains grapes grown in selected vineyards in Marlborough and Hawke’s Bay on the East Coast of New Zealand. Exposed to plenty of sunlight and carefully selected, these grapes create an approachable, fruit-forward chardonnay wine. Secondary malolactic fermentation during the winemaking process gives nuttiness and generous mouthfeel. Serve this bottle of wine with a tasty salmon dish or other white meat favorites. This delicious table white wine is also an ideal choice for your next wine and cheese party. Serve chilled for optimal taste. Making it Amazing with Kim Crawford wine. DigitalCatalogProductName: Blindfold White Blend, The Prisoner Wine Company, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Blindfold White Wine is a unique blend of white wines showcasing inviting aromas of stone fruit, apple pie and peach. A rich, creamy finish features bold flavors of lemon zest and caramelized sugar.
ProductDescLong: Blindfold White Blend White Wine is a unique spin on blended wine, combining interesting rhone and aromatic varietals that nicely complement a classic chardonnay wine base. A luscious entry of toasted hazelnut and mandarin is balanced by bright acidity and minerality, along with inviting aromas of lychee, stone fruit, citrus, apple pie and peach. The finish is bright, rich and creamy with flavors of lemon zest and caramelized sugar. The Prisoner Wine Company takes an unconventional approach to winemaking by working with impassioned growers to source varietals from vineyards and appellations across California. The resulting wines are interesting blends with distinct quality and character. This Blindfold California white wine sources chenin blanc from a vineyard in Mendocino, while its grenache blanc, roussanne and viognier originate from growers in Santa Barbara. Pair this bottle of wine with chicken, seafood or salad, and serve chilled at about 50 degrees for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 The Prisoner Wine Company, St. Helena, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc White Wine features the refreshing flavors of passion fruit, melon, and grapefruit, making this Marlborough region white wine a brilliant complement to seafood or salad.
ProductDescLong: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc White Wine is fresh and juicy with ripe, tropical flavors of passion fruit, melon, and stone fruit. Each sip of wine reveals classic Marlborough sauvignon blanc aromas of lifted citrus, tropical fruit, and crushed herbs, along with vibrant acidity and plenty of weight and length on the palate. Sold in in a 375 mL small bottle of wine, which contains approximately two and a half glasses of sauvignon blanc, this renowned white wine is conveniently packaged for you to enjoy a little Kim Crawford wherever your social life takes you. This New Zealand sauvignon blanc is made with grapes specially selected from vineyards in Marlborough's Wairau Valley and the neighboring Awatere Valley. The climate and fast-draining soil in this region offer winemakers a selection of grapes that deliver the consistently flavorful wine for which Kim Crawford is known. Pair this Kim Crawford white wine with fresh oysters, asparagus, lobster, or a light salad. For optimal taste, refrigerate this sauvignon blanc wine for at least two hours then serve chilled. Make it Amazing with Kim Crawford wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Constellation Imports, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. This moscato is bright, crisp, and decadent. It's well-balanced with just the right acidity, combined with floral aromas that bloom into deliciously sweet flavors of peach and apricot.

ProductDescShort: Double Diamond Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon red wine opens with aromas of black currants, dark cherries, blackberry, and oak spice. The palate is rich and juicy with a burst of flavor.
ProductDescLong: In 2000, Fred Schrader created Double Diamond as part of his continuing quest to make the best cabernet sauvignon that Napa Valley appellation can offer. This unique expression of the region carries on the tradition of earning critical acclaim and drawing passionate fans. Aged 16 months in French oak barrels, Double Diamond Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon red wine opens with layered, intriguing aromas of black currants, dark cherries, blackberry, cherry compote, toast and oak spice. The palate is rich and juicy resulting in a big, bursting flavor. The tannin structure makes this a great wine to enjoy upon release, but it will also mellow nicely for the next two to six years. Varietal: 98% cabernet sauvignon, 2% merlot.

ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Pinot Grigio Dry White Wine is food-friendly with flavors and aromas of nectarine and fresh peach. Pair it with seafood and other light dishes or sip it solo.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Pinot Grigio Dry White Wine is a food-friendly wine that displays aromas of fresh peach and nectarine combined with refreshing citrus notes that end in a clean, crisp finish. Hailing from California's famous Lodi region, this light wine is made from pinot grigio grapes originating in the northern coast of Italy. Well-known as a perfect pairing for shellfish and other light fare, this pinot grigio wine is great to sip by the glass or serve with chicken, seafood or oysters. By using state-of-the-art winemaking technology, employing unique growing techniques, and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to produce high quality grapes for an excellent bottle of pinot grigio wine. Chill this crisp white wine in the refrigerator for at least two hours before serving cold at around 50 degrees. Woodbridge wine is crafted for over 30 years and perfect for any day. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA.

ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Pinot Noir Red Wine is medium bodied with soft tannins and a lingering finish, making it an elegant pairing with roast meat, poultry, seafood and cheese.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Pinot Noir Red Wine is medium bodied with soft tannins and a lingering finish, making it an elegant offering for dinner parties. Fresh flavors of rose petals, strawberry, vibrant cherry and fresh raspberry abound in this pinot noir wine, while hints of Asian spice, sweet tobacco and Madagascar vanilla bean underscore aromas of ripe red cherries and violets. This Robert Mondavi wine is crafted with fruit from California's Central Coast vineyards, where slow ripening in the cool climate by the Pacific Ocean encourages complexity and depth of flavor. The phenomenal grapes produced in the region ultimately create Central Coast wine of the utmost quality, offered by Robert Mondavi Private Selection at a more accessible price. Pair this red table wine with roast meat, poultry or seafood, or serve it at an elegant wine and cheese event. Store this bottle of wine at room temperature, but refrigerate for 30 to 60 minutes before serving at around 60 degrees for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Tom Gore Vineyards Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Tom Gore Chardonnay has intense aromas of Fiji apple with notes of citrus, toasted oak and spice. This white wine has bright acidity balanced by a creamy texture and a long, full finish.
ProductDescLong: For Tom Gore, farming isn’t a profession; it’s a way of life. His family helped develop the vineyards of Northern California appellation into a world-class winemaking region. Tom grows his grapes using meticulous farming techniques, and works closely with winemakers. Together, they taste the wines at various stages throughout their development and collaborate on the blending process. Fermented in 60% barrel and 40% stainless steel, our chardonnay is pale gold in color with intense aromas of Fiji apple with lightly tropical notes of citrus and juicy, ripe pear complemented by toasted oak and spice. The fruit follows through in the flavor with bright acidity balanced by a creamy texture and a long, full finish. Varietal: 98% chardonnay, 2% sauvignon blanc.

Pinnacles Vineyard was one of the first vineyards in California’s appellation to be planted with a permanent irrigation system. DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Il Ducale Toscana IGT Rosso, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Il Ducale Toscana IGT Red Wine is a fruit-forward Italian wine with a pleasant freshness, elegant tannins and a lingering finish that pairs perfectly with chicken, risotto, and beef carpaccio.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Il Ducale Toscana IGT Red Wine is a modern, fruit-forward wine with a pleasant freshness. Each sip features notes of cassis, cherries, plums, and chocolate, accompanied by aromas of vanilla, tobacco, eucalyptus, and spice. Born from Ruffino's century-old winemaking traditions, this fine wine combines sangiovese, syrah and merlot grapes sourced from the most prestigious winegrowing regions of Tuscany. That blend of varietals creates a well-balanced, full-bodied Italian red wine with initial bright and fruity notes, round and elegant tannins and a lingering finish which leaves traces of ripe fruits, vanilla, herbs and black pepper. This Ruffino wine is the perfect companion for herb roasted chicken, sun-dried tomato risotto, and beef carpaccio. It also pairs well with tomato bruschetta, Parmigiano Reggiano, or Pecorino Romano cheeses. For best taste and quality, store this bottle of wine at room temperature and then chill for 30 to 60 minutes before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Mount Veeder Reserve, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mount Veeder Reserve is dark garnet in color with aromas of black peppercorn, and cardamom. This red wine has a bursting palate, with a big mouthfeel and structure, stuffed with dark cherry and plum.
ProductDescLong: Mount Veeder Winery was the first vineyard in the Napa Valley appellation to have all five of the grape varieties used in a classic Bordeaux blend. Mount Veeder Winery feels that blending is the key to crafting the most complete, balanced wine. Artisanal winemaking skills, beginning with gentle handling in the vineyard and finishing with extended barrel aging in the cellar, ensure the wines are enjoyable upon release, yet capable of graceful aging. Dark garnet in color with aromas of intricately woven dense black currant, black peppercorn, and cardamom lend a very deep and complex aroma. A bursting palate, with a big mouthfeel and structure, stuffed with dark cherry and plum. A powerful flavor wine with grace and restraint, it finishes long with black currant and savory notes. Varietal: 89% cabernet sauvignon, 7% malbec, 4% petit verdot.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Carneros Napa Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Carneros Chardonnay White Wine is a Napa Valley wine with intense fruit flavors and a mouth-filling rich texture that pairs well with seafood, chicken and pasta.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Carneros Chardonnay White Wine awakens and fills the palate with commanding flavors and aromas of ripe Asian pear, juicy red apple, lemon curd and marzipan. Using classic, time-honored winemaking traditions alongside the newest technological capabilities in the wine industry, this California chardonnay wine is crafted with hand-selected grapes from the renowned Hyde ranch in the southern Carneros region of Napa Valley. Fermented with cool native yeast in Burgundian-style barrels, matured slowly and aged for 12 months, this Robert Mondavi wine develops intense and pure fruit flavors unique to its appellation. Each sip is complemented by a balanced acidity and a hedonistically rich texture that leads into a long, lingering finish. Chill this Napa Valley chardonnay for at least two hours before serving. Enjoy its crisp flavor with pasta, Alaskan king crab, grilled salmon or chicken marsala. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi Winery, Oakville, CA USA

ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex Goliath with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals and counting in the major wine competitions. Our star grape, cabernet sauvignon, is the king of all reds. It's a hearty, yet smooth wine. This regal wine is ready to be paired with herb-roasted beef, leg of lamb, brie, cheddar, or chocolate.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Kim Crawford Spitfire Sauvignon Blanc, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Small Parcels Spitfire Sauvignon Blanc is complex with layers of tropical fruit and ripe citrus flavors. This white wine has crisp acidity and a lingering finish.
ProductDescLong: Kim Crawford's philosophy on making good wine is simple: focus on flavor. The exceptional grapes were selected from small batches and crafted into our Small Parcels range. With grapes grown between the latitudes of 34 degrees and 47 degrees, Kim Crawford's growing regions cover a distance of 1,000 miles from the northern tip of New Zealand to the southern coast. Within these regions the climates vary and allow winemakers to select from an assortment of grapes producing the diverse and flavorful wines Kim Crawford is known for. Our Spitfire Sauvignon Blanc takes its name from a famous site in Marlborough that was used as an Air Force base during WWII. This white wine is complex with layers of tropical fruit and ripe citrus flavors. It has crisp acidity and a lingering finish that rounds out this stunning wine.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2015, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: From our famed To Kalon Vineyard. Robert Mondavi Winery Cabernet Sauvignon is rich, full-bodied, and concentrated. Opulent black fruit with velvety tannins and finishing long and spicy.
ProductDescLong: The unique geography and climate of Napa Valley are what allows Robert Mondavi Winery Wines to grow a variety of delicious grapes that give the wines their distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. The grapes soak up sun in the afternoon and are cooled by evening fog. They mature slowly, developing intense, pure fruit flavors unique to California Coastal vineyards. This Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon is grown in Napa Valley, California and is a 2015 vintage. This cabernet is full-bodied, rich and concentrated in the mouth, the ripe opulent black fruit is well supported by velvety tannins and plenty of freshness, finishing long and spicy. This wine is composed of 92% cabernet sauvignon, 4% merlot, 2% petit verdot, and 2% cabernet franc.

ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California’s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence. Big, bold Vintners Blend wines are crafted for those who refuse to flock to the latest fad. This merlot is a medium-bodied, dry, juicy red wine with flavors of cherry, plum, and toast. DigitalCatalogProductName: Mount Veeder Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mount Veeder Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is a distinctively rich, velvety wine showcasing flavors of berry, dark chocolate and peppercorn intertwining with aromas of plum and vanilla.
ProductDescLong: Mount Veeder Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is a distinctively rich Napa Valley red wine made with intense, concentrated, mountain grown grapes. Each bottle of wine delivers vibrant berry and dark chocolate flavors blended with black peppercorn to create a complex and full palate. The velvety structure of this wine delivers a smooth and seamless finish of cassis, blackberry pie and rosemary. Aromas of deep cherry, plum and vanilla intertwine with beautiful hints of anise and caramel. This cabernet sauvignon is a unique combination of cabernet sauvignon, merlot, petit verdot, malbec and cabernet franc grapes grown in the Napa Valley, California wine region. Artisanal winemaking skills, beginning with gentle handling in the vineyard and finishing with extended barrel aging, ensure the wine is enjoyable upon release yet capable of graceful aging. Enjoy a glass with steak, pork or fresh salad. Store this wine at room temperature, then refrigerate for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring for best taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Mount Veeder Winery, Oakville, CA

ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex Goliath with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals and counting in the major wine competitions. Our star grape, cabernet sauvignon, is the king of all reds. It's a hearty, yet smooth wine. This regal wine is ready to be paired with herb-roasted beef, leg of lamb, brie, cheddar, or chocolate.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Hogue Reserve Merlot, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Hogue Reserve Merlot is rich and weighty with great structure, nicely integrated oak, and flavors of black cherry, raspberry, vanilla, and a touch of cinnamon and nutmeg.
ProductDescLong: The majority of Washington’s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing. Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. The Reserve Columbia Valley Merlot underwent malolactic fermentation in barrel and spent 18 to 22 months aging. This merlot is rich and weighty with great structure, nicely integrated oak, and flavors of black cherry, raspberry, vanilla, and a touch of cinnamon and nutmeg. Pair with grilled steak, lamb stew, or curried lentils and wild rice.

ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Cabernet Sauvignon Merlot Red Wine offers the taste and versatility of two premium grape varieties. Sourced from California's Lodi region, the cabernet sauvignon and merlot grapes in this fine wine are processed using Woodbridge's state-of-the-art winemaking techniques. Starting with intense plummy aromas, this red wine blend gives way to luscious flavors of cherry jam, oak and blackberry. A full body and silky finish make it an delicious wine to sip on its own or pair with hearty grilled meats and game. Store this bottle of wine at room temperature, but chill in the refrigerator for 30 to 60 minutes before serving cool at around 60 degrees. DigitalCatalogProductName: Wild Horse Merlot, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Wild Horse Merlot has rich aromas of plum and raspberry with notes of blue fruit, clove, and cooking spice. This red wine has full flavors with a balanced acidity, and a long finish.
ProductDescLong: Situated at a midpoint in the Central Coast, the Templeton vineyard and winery location is ideal for sourcing fruit from vineyards north and south of the winery, along with its low-vigor soils, proven ground water table, and rural atmosphere. The varieties of soil composition and micro-climates that can be found within the expansive Central Coast appellation present the opportunity to cultivate the same varietal in a wide range of growing conditions. Wild Horse Merlot has rich aromas of plum and raspberry with notes of blue fruit, clove, and cooking spice. Brings red and black fruit flavors to a full approachable tannins, balanced acidity, and a long finish. Pairs well with roasted fennel and pork tenderloin and grilled portabella mushrooms. Varietal: 90% merlot, 6% tempranillo, 4% petite verdot.

ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Malbec Red Wine offers juicy fruit notes of plum and blackberry and bold aromas of cedar and blueberry. This bold, California wine pairs perfectly with spicy meat dishes.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Malbec Red Wine is a bold wine that offers juicy fruit flavors of plum and blackberry with a touch of vanilla. Bold aromas of cedar, fresh black cherry and blueberry draw you into a medium bodied wine that's richly complex but approachable. The malbec grapes used in this California red wine are sourced from Lodi, then aged in French and Hungarian oak barrels. The distinctive notes of spicy oak that result allow this malbec wine to pair perfectly with intense meat dishes, such as smoky cured meats, lamb chops or carne asada. It's also delicious to sip on its own. For the best flavor, store this bottle of wine at room temperature, then chill in the refrigerator for 30 to 60 minutes before serving. DigitalCatalogProductName: SIMI Sonoma County Rebel Cask Red Blend, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: SIMI Rebel Cask is a Prohibition style Red Blend aged in Rye Whiskey barrels. Sourced from Sonoma County, with flavors of blueberry, blackberry, chocolate, with warm toasty notes and a spicy finish.
ProductDescLong: Introducing the rebellious side of SIMI. Inspired by our prohibition history, Rebel Cask is a red blend aged in Rye Whiskey Barrels. When prohibition swept the nation, SIMI persevered, never missing a harvest. Rebel Cask pays tribute to our rebellious winemaking by adding wine aged in Rye Whiskey barrels to this red blend. Rye Whiskey was a hot commodity for bootleggers during prohibition, and its spiced, fruity notes make it a perfect complement to our wines today. Sourced from prestigious vineyards in Sonoma County, SIMI Rebel Cask has aromas of brambly blackberry, cardamom and spice with succulent flavors of blueberry, blackberry, and dark chocolate, with warm toasty notes, firm tannins and a spicy finish. Pair this red wine with grilled meats or vegetables, rich cheeses, or enjoy on its own. For best enjoyment, place in fridge for 20 minutes prior to serving.

ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. This wine is a true sun-kissed chardonnay with bold aromas of apple and pear, combined with the classic spices of Grandma's apple pie. We’ve added a splash of aromatic white varietals to provide layers of delicate floral notes coupled with bright citrus character. It's the ultimate food wine.

ProductDescShort: Cooper and Thief Napa Valley Rye Barrel-Aged Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a red blend that's complex on the palate, finishing with a smooth structure reminiscent of a fine rye whiskey.
ProductDescLong: Cooper and Thief Napa Valley Rye Barrel-Aged Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a red blend that's complex on the palate with rich, warm dark fruit flavors and aromas with hints of toasted rye spice. Crafted with cabernet sauvignon, merlot, cabernet franc and petit verdot grapes from Napa Valley, this California red wine blend challenges tradition by aging in High West rye whiskey barrels for six months. The unique varietal blend and barrel aging gives this Napa Valley wine a lush mouthfeel with supple tannins and a smooth finish reminiscent of a fine rye whiskey. For best taste and quality, store this Cooper and Thief wine at room temperature, then refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving, pairing it with lamb and pork dishes or steak with vegetables. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Cooper & Thief Cellarmasters, Lodi, CA USA
