ProductDescLong: Estancia's vineyard lies in the Thermal Rainbow of Monterey County appellation, which features midday heat tempered by morning and late-afternoon fog-perfect for developing the intense fruit character. Pinnacles Vineyard was one of the first vineyards in California to be planted with a permanent irrigation system. This pinot noir has aromas of cherry, raspberry, and warm spices, with flavors of luscious berries and baking spices with a lingering, silky finish. Varietal: 100% pinot noir.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Kim Crawford Fizz Methode Traditionnelle, White Sparkling Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Small Parcels Fizz Methode Traditionnelle is a blend of pinot noir and chardonnay grapes. This sparkling wine has a soft, creamy texture and a finish that is crisp and dry.
ProductDescLong: Kim Crawford's philosophy on making good wine is simple: focus on flavor. The exceptional grapes were selected from small batches and crafted into our Small Parcels range. With grapes grown between the latitudes of 34 degrees and 47 degrees, Kim Crawford's growing regions cover a distance of 1,000 miles from the northern tip of New Zealand to the southern coast. Within these regions the climates vary and allow winemakers to select from an assortment of grapes producing the diverse and flavorful wines Kim Crawford is known for. This Kim Crawford Fizz Methode Traditionnelle is a harmonious blend of the finest pinot noir and chardonnay grapes and exhibits delicate citrus fruit layered with toasty brioche characters. The palate on this sparkling wine has a soft, creamy texture and refreshing natural acidity with a finish that is crisp and dry.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Derange Napa Valley Red Blend, The Prisoner Wine Company, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Derange Napa Valley Red Wine is a delicious red wine blend full of black fruit, spice and vanilla toast flavors and aromas. It pairs well with bread and cheese, mushroom dishes or a cheeseburger.
ProductDescLong: Derange Napa Valley Red Wine is a delicious red blend full of flavors and aromas of black cherry, clove spice, blackberry cobbler and vanilla toast. Hand-picked and carefully selected cabernet sauvignon grapes provide structure and density to this California red wine, while the petite sirah varietal provides mid-palate richness and concentration. Meanwhile, merlot grapes offer juiciness and acidity and the syrah varietal adds earthiness, depth and a touch of spice. Zinfandel brings a softness that ties all the varietals together. Barrel aged in French oak casks for 18 months after going through stainless steel and malolactic fermentation, this red wine blend fills the palate with soft tannins and a balanced acidity. Store this barrel aged wine at room temperature to preserve its quality, and refrigerate for 30 to 60 minutes before serving with bread and cheese, mushroom dishes or a cheeseburger. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 The Prisoner Wine Company, St. Helena, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Cooper and Thief Napa Valley Tequila Aged Sauvignon Blanc, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Cooper and Thief Tequila Barrel Aged Sauvignon Blanc White Wine is refreshing and bursting with flavor. Its aging process gives it notes of citrus and spice, perfect with chicken or light dishes.
ProductDescLong: Cooper and Thief Tequila Barrel Aged Sauvignon Blanc White Wine fills the palate with memorable flavors derived from its unique aging process. This refreshing white wine starts out in scenic Napa Valley before being specially aged in a Casa Noble anejo oak tequila barrel for three months. The result is a rich vanilla flavor with hints of classic citrus and spice notes reminiscent of a fine, blue agave tequila. The freshness of this sauvignon blanc wine makes it a perfect partner in crime for light dishes like salad and seafood, as well as savory chicken entrees. Thanks to its barrel aged pedigree, this California white wine has an unusual richness to its structure, balancing refreshing acidity with a subtle heat similar to agave tequila. That all culminates in a smooth and lingering finish. To preserve its devilishly good taste, chill this white wine in for at least two hours before serving. Born from mischief, Cooper and Thief Wine celebrates doing things differently. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Cooper & Thief Cellarmasters, Lodi, CA USA.

ProductDescLong: Made from grapes harvested in world-class appellations, Black Box Wines have won over 70 Gold Medals at wine competitions throughout the US and have been awarded over 34 Wine Enthusiast Best Buys. DigitalCatalogProductName: SAVED, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: SAVED Red Wine Blend features bold and rich black cherry, baking spice and pomegranate flavor. This robust red blend pairs well with a bread and cheese platter, meat or chicken dishes.
ProductDescLong: SAVED Red Wine Blend is the result of a collaboration between artist Scott Campbell and winemaker Clay Brock, representing the freedom of craft by combining varietals both well loved and rare. Big, bold and rich, this red table wine boasts dominant black cherry, baking spice and pomegranate flavor, enhanced by aromas of dark plum, bramble and cocoa with spice, smoke and coconut. This robust red blend features malbec, syrah, merlot, grenache, zinfandel, pinot verdot and souzao grapes from vineyards as far south as Santa Maria Valley and as far north as King City in Monterey County. Each varietal is handled separately to maintain the delicate fruit balance and then perfected by French oak aging. That meticulous process results in a balanced red wine blend with hints of cocoa and vanilla on its long and generous finish. Enjoy this wine with a bread and cheese platter, meat or chicken dishes. Store each bottle of wine at room temperature. For best taste, chill this red blend at least 30 minutes before pouring. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 SAVED Wines, Oakville, CA USA.

ProductDescShort: Meiomi Rose Wine is a richly layered and expressive dry wine with floral aromas and mouthwatering fruit flavors that pairs well with chicken, roasted beet salad, creamy cheeses, and fish tacos.
ProductDescLong: Meiomi Dry Rose Wine is a richly layered and expressive blush wine that opens to delicate aromas of watermelon, orange peel and subtle hints of rose petal. Each glass of wine offers mouthwatering flavors of strawberry, cranberry, watermelon and a touch of honey. Made with pinot noir grapes from the exceptional maritime regions of Monterrey, Sonoma and Santa Barbara, this California wine goes through the traditional press and saignee methods followed by cold fermentation in stainless steel tanks, creating a light and flavorful palate that delivers a lush mouthfeel, bright acidity and a cool minerality on the finish. This silky rose wine complements chicken dishes, roasted beet salad, soft and creamy cheeses, fruit and vegetable dips and halibut fish tacos. To preserve its taste and quality, refrigerate this dry wine for two to two and a half hours, then serve chilled at around 50 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Meiomi Wines, Acampo, CA USA

With a palate of baked apples, poached pears, nectarine, peach and pineapple enhanced by notes of vanilla bean and baking spices, this chardonnay wine captures the delicious flavors from California's best coastal vineyards, earning it the gold medal at the 2017 Denver International Wine Competition. ProductDescLong: Crafters Union Red Wine Blend offers the style of a premium California red wine with the substance to be enjoyed alone or hold its own against hardy dishes - all in a conveniently portable can. This red blend bursts with blackberry flavor before giving way to cool aromas of chocolate, vanilla and spice. A red table wine with a daring twist, this canned wine overflows with juicy flavor in every sip. Break this chillable canned drink out at your next backyard party, where it will enhance the most savory barbecue and grilled vegetables, or enjoy its smooth finish without food by a fire pit. Unlike other red wines, Crafters Union Red Blend is a great outdoor wine and is best sipped after being chilled in a fridge or cooler. Enjoy this portable wine the next time you and your friends want to add a dash of daring to your adventure. Crafters Union: Crafters of the Uncommon. ProductDescShort: Wild Horse Chardonnay opens with aromas of butterscotch, apple cobbler, lemon meringue pie, and vanilla. The mouthfeel is lively, with bright lemon citrus, apple tart, and a lingering deliciousness.
ProductDescLong: Situated at a midpoint in the Central Coast, the Templeton vineyard and winery location is ideal for sourcing fruit from vineyards north and south of the winery, along with its low-vigor soils, proven ground water table, and rural atmosphere. The varieties of soil composition and micro-climates that can be found within the expansive Central Coast appellation present the opportunity to cultivate the same varietal in a wide range of growing conditions. Wild Horse Chardonnay starts with enticing aromas of butterscotch, apple cobbler, lemon meringue pie, and vanilla. Upon entry, the mouthfeel is lively, with bright lemon citrus, apple tart, and a lingering deliciousness. Pairs well with Dijon chicken or king crab legs. Varietal: 100% chardonnay.

ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Moscato d'Oro White Wine is a delicious Napa Valley wine with fragrant aromas and light flavors ideal for enjoying with cheeses or desserts or by itself on a hot summer day.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Moscato d'Oro White Wine is a delicious table white wine that offers light flavors of fragrant orange blossom and citrus aromas. Crafted with muscat grapes that mature slowly, this California white wine develops the distinctive character and intense fruit flavor unique to the geography and climate of Napa Valley, resulting in notes of Fuji apple and lemon cream that refresh the palate. Enjoy this Robert Mondavi wine by itself on a hot summer day or pair it with fruits, cheeses or lightly sweet desserts. To preserve its taste and quality, refrigerate this moscato wine for two to two and a half hour and serve chilled at around 50 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi Winery, Oakville, CA USA

Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. This pink moscato has pretty floral aromas, mouthwatering strawberry sweetness, and vibrant citrus finish. DigitalCatalogProductName: Inniskillin Niagara Icewine Vidal Pearl, White Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Inniskillin Niagara Icewine Vidal Pearl opens with honey and apricot on the nose with essence on the palate. Well-rounded with acidity this white wine pairs with sushi and scallops.
ProductDescLong: Inniskillin Icewine, recognized as one of the world’s great wines, is truly winter’s gift to wine lovers. Harvested at the pinnacle of Canada’s crisp winter, the grapes are naturally frozen on the vine and picked when the temperature drops to -10 degrees C. Only a few drops of luscious nectar can be squeezed from each bunch, which is then expertly guided through fermentation to achieve this rich and alluring specialty wine. This Okanagan Valley appellation wine opens with a mix of honey, beeswax, and dried apricot on the nose with a tantalizing essence of honey and dried apricot on the palate as well. A well rounded mouthfeel with acidity that balances out this naturally sweet dessert wine. Pairs well with sushi, pad thai, chicken liver pate, seared scallops and poached pears with mascarpone. Serve chilled.
ProductBullet06: A well rounded mouthfeel with acidity that balances out this dessert wine

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Fume Blanc, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Fume Blanc White Wine delivers refreshing, mouthwatering fruit flavors in every sip, making it the perfect addition to your next wine and cheese pairing.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Fume Blanc White Wine is a light wine with a refreshing, mouthwatering flavor. Deliciously complex orange marmalade, honey, marzipan, orange zest and buttery crust flavors mix together with aromas of caramelized red apples, nuts, brown sugar and nougat in every sip. This California white wine combines sauvignon blanc with a small percentage of semillon grapes to give the final blend a broader mouthfeel and enhanced complexity. The unique geography and climate of Napa Valley produce delicious grapes that give Robert Mondavi wine its distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. Ninety percent of this fume blanc wine is barrel fermented for added richness and complexity, while the remainder undergoes a cool fermentation in stainless steel to heighten the vibrant fruity and herbal flavors. Pair a glass of this table white wine with fish, oysters, cheese or vegetables. Refrigerate this bottle of wine for 2 to 2 and a half hours, then serve chilled for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Chianti Classico DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Chianti Classico Red Wine features cherry and red berry fruit notes with velvety tannins and firm acidity, making it the ideal companion to prosciutto or mushroom risotto.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Chianti Classico Red Wine is a complex and deep red wine blend containing sangiovese, merlot and cabernet sauvignon red grape varieties. This red blend is characterized by cherry and red berry fruit notes with delicately spiced hints of tobacco, leather, cedar, white pepper and a touch of flint. Featuring velvety tannins, firm acidity and a lingering finish of rosemary, this chianti wine is well balanced on the palate. Each bottle of this Ruffino wine is made with a careful selection of the best grapes from the traditional Chianti Classico production region. Secondary malolactic fermentation enhances this wine's velvety texture. Riserva Ducale then ages for 24 months in oak, stainless steel and concrete vats and spends an additional three months in bottle before release. Pair a glass of this Italian red wine with favorites like prosciutto, mushroom risotto or chicken cacciatore. Store this red wine blend at room temperature, and serve at around 60 degrees for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Richards Wild Irish Rose, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. Wild Irish Rose 17% Red Wine is 100% pure grape wine with a medium body and medium sweetness.
ProductDescLong: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. One of the first branded wines in America, Wild Irish Rose has been delivering quality, full-flavored, and fruity fortified wines for more than 50 years. The lambrusco and vinifera juices are cool fermented in stainless steel. The wine is then blended, sweetened, and fortified with citrus brandy. Wild Irish Rose 17% Red Wine is 100% pure grape wine. A proprietary blend of native New York grape juice and white grape juice is used. Special care is taken to preserve the delicate, concord grape taste profile and color. Balance: medium body and medium sweet. Fruit: concord grape character.

ProductDescShort: Estancia Pinot Grigio is grown in select California vineyards, where chilly ocean breezes produce grapes with balanced taste and concentrated flavors in this white wine.
ProductDescLong: Estancia's vineyard lies in the Thermal Rainbow of Monterey County appellation, which features midday heat tempered by morning and late-afternoon fog-perfect for developing the intense fruit character. Pinnacles Vineyard was one of the first vineyards in California to be planted with a permanent irrigation system. This pinot grigio opens with aromas of fresh jasmine, lemongrass, lychee, and lime with flavors of Fuji apple and Asian pear with hints of lemon zest on the finish. Pairs well with smoked salmon, tuna, citrus sauces, seafood, poultry and pork. Varietal: 100% pinot grigio.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2013, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: From our famed To Kalon Vineyard. Robert Mondavi Winery Cabernet Sauvignon is complex and balanced with fresh blackberry, cassis, dark cocoa, forest floor, allspice, and sweet vanilla.
ProductDescLong: The unique geography and climate of the California coast are what allows Robert Mondavi Wines to grow a variety of grapes that give the wines their distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. The grapes soak up sun in the afternoon and are cooled by evening fog. They mature slowly, developing intense, pure fruit flavors unique to California Coastal vineyards. This Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon is grown in Napa Valley, California and is a 2013 vintage. A complex blend of fresh blackberry, wild berry compote, cassis, dark cocoa powder, forest floor, allspice, and sweet vanilla, with balancing acidity, make this a perfect cabernet sauvignon. This wine is 88% cabernet sauvignon, 8% cabernet franc, and 4% petite verdot.

ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California’s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence. Big, bold Vintners Blend wines are crafted for those who refuse to flock to the latest fad. This shiraz is a dry, medium body, juicy red with blackberry, black pepper, and vanilla. Varietal: 100% syrah.

ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Oakville Fume Blanc White Wine is a bright and fresh Napa Valley wine with a creamy weight and long finish, the perfect complement for oysters, cheese, salad and vegetables.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Oakville Fume Blanc White Wine is a bright, fresh, and creamy Napa Valley wine. Succulent ripe white peach, lemon verbena and lime blossom seamlessly integrate across the palate, complemented by a subtle hint of fresh herbs. While bright and refreshing, the mouth-watering fruit in this fume blanc wine sits on the palate with a creamy weight, lingering on the deliciously long finish. The unique geography and climate of Napa Valley produce delicious grapes that give Robert Mondavi wine its distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. A combination of sauvignon blanc and semillon grapes, this California white wine is aged in French oak barrels. A portion of new barrels contributes subtle oak spices to the fruit character. Pair this table white wine with oysters, cheese, salad or vegetables. For optimal taste, refrigerate this fume blanc for two to two and a half hours before serving chilled. DigitalCatalogProductName: Kim Crawford Pinot Gris, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Pinot Gris White Wine is a crisp, fresh wine produced with minimal skin contact for a more vibrant taste of Braeburn apples, which pairs well with fresh seafood or antipasto.
ProductDescLong: Kim Crawford Pinot Gris White Wine brings you a crisp, fresh wine with vibrant, fruity flavors. This pinot gris introduces the delicious flavor of Braeburn apples with wonderfully lifted tree fruit aromatics of ripe pear, alongside honey and floral notes. Grown in the wine-making region of Marlborough, New Zealand, this Kim Crawford wine starts with pinot gris grapes crushed and direct pressed utilizing minimal skin contact. The clarified juice is then cool fermented to bring out the flavor and intensity of this white wine. Using five different yeasts, the taste of Braeburn apples becomes more pronounced. The final result is a pinot gris wine that's full-bodied and has a clean, fresh finish. Pair this wine with antipasto, fresh seafood or rack of lamb, or enjoy on its own. To enjoy this pinot gris wine at its absolute freshest, refrigerate for at least two hours and serve chilled. Make it Amazing with Kim Crawford wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Constellation Imports, Rutherford, CA.

ProductDescShort: Mark West Cellar Select Pinot Noir is medium-bodied with black cherry, cola, strawberry, and plum. This red wine pairs with pastas, a juicy cheeseburger, grilled salmon, or roasted pork tenderloin.
ProductDescLong: Mark West Wines accepts nothing less than the best, which is why the fruit for the wines is sourced from the finest vineyards throughout California. To make the best pinot noir, vintners first gently de-stem and crush the grapes when they come into the winery.  Daily punch-downs and pump-overs extract flavor and color. This pinot noir is medium-bodied with black cherry, cola, strawberry, plum, and soft tannins. Pairs perfectly with pastas with light tomato-based sauces, a juicy cheeseburger, grilled salmon, or a roasted pork tenderloin. At Mark West, there's nothing more important than sharing a passion for pinot with others

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Bourbon Barrel Aged Cabernet, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Bourbon Barrel Aged Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a flavorful California wine that pairs well with pastry straws, pork or a charcuterie board with strong cheeses.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Bourbon Barrel Aged Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a complex and decadent cabernet wine that leaps from the glass with aromas of blackberry cobbler, graham cracker, brown sugar, milk chocolate, coffee and smoke. Made with grapes selected at the peak of ripeness from coastal vineyards in Monterey County, this bold California red wine offers flavorful notes of blueberry pie, praline, sweet vanilla custard, caramel and mocha. Taking a truly original approach to barrel aging, portions of this wine are aged in new and old bourbon barrels, giving it deep toasted oak undertones, with notes of vanilla and dried herbs. Awarded Double Gold at the 2017 San Francisco International Wine Competition, this cabernet sauvignon wine is framed by soft, chewy tannins and a lingering finish that makes it a natural companion to pesto parm pastry straws or bourbon glazed ribs and a fitting part of a wine and cheese platter. Store at room temperature, then refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Blend, The Prisoner Wine Company, Red Wine, 3 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Wine Blend features bold tastes of berry and vanilla with notes of dark chocolate and roasted fig, making this red blend perfect at your next barbecue.
ProductDescLong: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Wine Blend is ripe and luscious with a diverse combination of grapes that gives it a distinct quality and character. This red blend is inspired by the mixed blacks first made by the Italian immigrants who originally settled in Napa Valley. Crafted through the unlikely mix of zinfandel, cabernet sauvignon, petite sirah, syrah and charbono, this California red wine features enticing aromas of bing cherry, dark chocolate, clove and roasted fig. Those scents give way to persistent tastes of raspberry, boysenberry and pomegranate with a lingering vanilla flavor. Aged in a combination of French and American oak barrels, the full flavors of this Napa Valley wine make it a great match for grilled and barbecued meats, especially if you throw sweet or tomato-based sauce on top. Top off a meal with this red blend for a smooth and luscious finish that lingers on the palate. Choose The Prisoner wine to add a little edge to your glass of wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 The Prisoner Wine Company, St. Helena, CA USA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: The Dreaming Tree Rose, Blush Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: The Dreaming Tree Rose Wine is a light wine that is fresh on the palate and great for any occasion. With fruity flavors and tropical aromas, it pairs well with chicken, berry tarts, bread and salads.
ProductDescLong: The Dreaming Tree Rose Wine combines pinot noir, grenache, pinot grigio and other varietals, resulting in a versatile blush wine with delicate floral and tropical aromas that are perfect for any occasion. Slowly fermented in stainless steel tanks with aromatic yeast strains for three months and featuring citrus, nectarine, strawberry and watermelon flavors, this fruity California wine is crisp and fresh on the palate. With a convenient recyclable screw top bottle that is a quarter pound lighter than regular wine bottles, this dry wine is easy to open and ready to share with friends, take to backyard gatherings. Enjoy this dry rose with a grilled chicken salad, a berry tart, bruschetta or a asparagus salad. Refrigerate this rose wine at around 50 degrees for two to two and a half hours, and serve chilled to enjoy its maximum taste and quality. The Dreaming Tree, a collaboration between musician Dave Matthews and winemaker Sean McKenzie, captures the spirit of California's wine country. ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine delivers intense blackberry fruit flavor across the palate, with a velvety finish that pairs perfectly with meat and pasta dishes.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine delivers mouth filling, deeply intense blackberry fruit flavor across the palate, with aromas of clove, cardamom and vanilla spice. Dusty tannins add structure to the juicy fullness of the fruit, followed by a lingering, velvety finish. Fruit for this Napa Valley wine is sourced from two of the valley's most renowned sub-appellations: Oakville and Stag's Leap district. The fruit is combined with other grapes from a number of the area's finest vineyards, creating a cabernet sauvignon wine that is the perfect expression of the region. This Robert Mondavi red wine undergoes 24 days of wine to grape skin contact, to maximize the extraction of varietal character while keeping the tannins fleshy and supple. Pair a glass of this delicious red wine with your favorite beef, steak, lamb or pasta dishes. For optimal taste, store this bottle of wine at room temperature, but refrigerate for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring a glass. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Mount Veeder Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mount Veeder Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon blends black peppercorn and graphite to create a complex and full palate. This red wine has aromas of deep cherry, plum with hints of anise and caramel.
ProductDescLong: Mount Veeder Winery was the first vineyard in the Napa Valley appellation to have all five of the grape varieties used in a classic Bordeaux blend. Mount Veeder Winery feels that blending is the key to crafting the most complete, balanced wine. Artisanal winemaking skills, beginning with gentle handling in the vineyard and finishing with extended barrel aging in the cellar, ensure the wines are enjoyable upon release, yet capable of graceful aging. Vibrant berry and dark chocolate flavors blend with black peppercorn and graphite to create a complex and full palate. The rich, velvety structure delivers a smooth and seamless finish of cassis, blackberry pie, and rosemary. Aromas of deep cherry, plum, and vanilla intertwine with beautiful hints of anise and caramel. Varietal: 83% cabernet sauvignon, 11% merlot, 3% petit verdot, 2% malbec, 1% cabernet franc.

ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California’s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. DigitalCatalogProductName: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Chardonnay, White Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Chardonnay White Wine offers a vibrant and medium body that pairs easily with appetizers and entrees. Tropical fruit aromas mix with spice, leading to a toasty finish.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Chardonnay White Wine displays aromas of rich tropical fruit combined with a hint of cinnamon and maple. A medium body with vibrant acidity showcases characteristic flavors of ripe pear and green apple, leading to a toasty finish with vanilla oak notes. Sip this chardonnay wine on its own or pair it with delightful appetizers and hearty dishes like lemon pepper chicken. Grapes in this California wine are sourced from the Lodi region. By using state-of-the-art winemaking technology, employing unique growing techniques and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to produce high quality grapes for an excellent bottle of wine. Chill this chardonnay wine in the refrigerator for 2 to 2 and a half hours before serving at around 50 degrees. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day, Woodbridge offers approachable white wines that you don't have to overthink. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Nobilo Icon Marlborough Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Nobilo Icon Marlborough Pinot Noir Red Wine is bright and complex with concentrated flavors of ripe blackberries and black cherries. This wine pairs perfectly with lamb, chicken and seafood dishes.
ProductDescLong: Nobilo Icon Marlborough Pinot Noir Red Wine is rich and elegant with exceptional palate weight and length that represents the pinnacle of Nobilo winemaking. Each bottle of wine opens with a great mix of red and dark berry fruit aromas and hints of lifted charry oak, offering enticing flavors of ripe blackberries, black cherries, and plums. Made with only the very best fruit from Castle Cliffs vineyard in the Marlborough region's  Awatere Valley, this New Zealand pinot noir wine is matured and aged in oak barrels for 10 months. That process gives this wine toasted oak notes that frame its concentrated fruit flavors. With clean minerality, a firm tannin structure and a bright and lingering finish, this complex and mouth-filling red table wine goes perfectly with a mustard and herb-crusted rack of lamb, char-grilled tuna, pan-roasted chicken, scallops or a delicious pavlova. For best taste and quality, refrigerate this Nobilo wine for at least an hour before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2019 Constellation Imports, Gonzales, CA.

Each bottle of this unoaked chardonnay wine has a fruit-forward palate with a bright finish and fresh, juicy acidity that complements fresh seafood, grilled vegetables and poultry dishes. DigitalCatalogProductName: Rex Goliath Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Rex Goliath Chardonnay has bold aromas of apple and pear. Splashed with the aromatic layers of delicate floral notes coupled with bright citrus character. This white wine is the ultimate food wine.
ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. This wine is a true sun-kissed chardonnay with bold aromas of apple and pear, combined with the classic spices of Grandma's apple pie. We’ve added a splash of aromatic white varietals to provide layers of delicate floral notes coupled with bright citrus character. It's the ultimate food wine.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc, White Wine, 2 pk 250 mL Cans
ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc White Wine features the refreshing flavors of passion fruit, melon, and grapefruit, making this wine can a brilliant complement to fresh oysters, lobster, or salad.
ProductDescLong: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc White Wine is fresh and juicy with ripe, tropical flavors of passion fruit, melon, and stone fruit. Each sip of wine reveals classic Marlborough sauvignon blanc aromas of lifted citrus, tropical fruit, and crushed herbs, along with vibrant acidity and plenty of weight and length on the palate. Sold in in a twin pack of 250 mL cans, each with approximately one and a half glasses of tropical wine, this renowned white wine is conveniently packaged for you to enjoy a little Kim Crawford wherever your social life takes you. This New Zealand sauvignon blanc is made with grapes specially selected from vineyards in Marlborough's Wairau Valley and the neighboring Awatere Valley. The climate and fast-draining soil in this region offer winemakers a selection of grapes that deliver the consistently flavorful wine for which Kim Crawford is known. Pair this Kim Crawford canned wine with fresh oysters, asparagus, lobster, or a light salad. For optimal taste, refrigerate this sauvignon blanc wine for at least two hours then serve chilled. Make it Amazing with Kim Crawford wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Constellation Imports, Rutherford, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: The Dreaming Tree Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: The Dreaming Tree Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine blends a variety of grapes from across the California coast for an elegant and supple taste that's perfect with savory dishes like beef flank steak.
ProductDescLong: The Dreaming Tree Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine, part of an exciting collaboration between musician Dave Matthews and winemaker Sean McKenzie, has good rhythm in its aromas and flavors, resulting in an easy-drinking cabernet sauvignon wine with lots of character. With classic aromas of blackberry, plum and cassis wrapped in rich flavors of toasted caramel and dark chocolate, this delicious red wine is ready for your dinner table. Aged for 18 months in oak barrels, this red wine blend is a harmony of cabernet sauvignon, malbec, merlot, tannat and petit verdot grapes harvested from the central and northern coasts of California. That harvesting and aging process leaves this California wine with well-preserved flavors and aromas. Each sip of this red wine blend features tannins that lend well to this wine's elegant and supple structure. Pair it with beef flank steak or grilled onion burgers for a beautiful duet. To keep those flavors singing, store this cabernet sauvignon wine at room temperature, then chill for 30 minutes before serving. © 2020 The Dreaming Tree, Geyserville, CA USA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Moscato, White Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Moscato White Wine is a light, fruity drink with a bright finish that complements a wide variety of foods, including roasted pears and fruit tarts.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Moscato White Wine is a delicious, balanced complement to a wide variety of foods. With a fragrant bouquet of orange blossoms and citrus, this white moscato has a light taste without being too sugary or overpowering. Perfect for afternoon sipping, each taste of this moscato wine brings out notes of Fuji apple and lemon cream. This lightly sweet white wine is crafted in the Lodi region, which is ideal for growing premium grapes thanks to its Mediterranean-like climate. Serve this moscato wine in chilled glasses alongside lightly sweet desserts like roasted pears, fruit tarts or even almond cake. The residual sugar of this white moscato is balanced out by its bright acidity, providing a delightful foil to sweet dishes. Bring out this larger bottle of moscato wine when you want a bright and light finish to your next dinner party. To get the most delicious taste, keep this white wine bottle refrigerated for at least 2 to 2 and a half hours before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Clos du Bois Sonoma Reserve Chardonnay has aromas of ripe pear, apple, and lemon with notes of toast and warm, brown spice. This white wine has fruit flavors with hints of roasted marshmallow.
ProductDescLong: Clos du Bois Winery farms almost 800 acres in the vibrantly diverse wine regions of Sonoma County and Coastal California. Working with a family of trusted growers from some of the best vineyards, each vintage is crafted to achieve balance, intensity, and true varietal character. This Clos du Bois Sonoma Reserve Chardonnay has a brilliant silver straw hue with intense aromas of ripe pear, apple, and lemon with notes of toast and warm, brown spice. Ripe pear, apple, and citrus flavors with hints of roasted marshmallow layer over underlying flinty minerality. This white wine is full-bodied with a rich, silky texture and a long finish. The structure of this wine will allow it to develop additional complexity with bottle age.

ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Rum Barrel-Aged Chardonnay white wine has aromas of peach and toasted coconut, with rich flavors of tropical fruit, warm spice, and molasses.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Rum Barrel-Aged Chardonnay is a medium bodied white wine with aromas of peach, tropical fruit and toasted coconut.  This California wine is sourced from premium California vineyards, selected for their varietal expression and style complimentary to Rum barrel aging. A select portion of the blend is aged in used Rum barrels which gives the wine rich flavors of tropical fruit and warm spices, with hints of coconut and molasses.  Compliment the rich character of this wine with pan seared scallops. Store this wine in the refrigerator before serving chilled.  Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi offers 40 years of heritage and Robert Mondavi's relentless pursuit of quality in every bottle to ensure everyone has access to better wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescShort: J. Roget Extra Dry Sparkling Wine is light straw in color with fruit and a mild floral character. Aromas of apple and pear are balanced with a bouquet of toasty yeast notes and floral nuances.
ProductDescLong: J. Roget offers great-tasting champagnes that also blend beautifully into full-flavored cocktails. A light straw color with pleasant fruit and a mild floral character.  This American sparkling wine is extra-dry. 100% stainless steel tanks are used for the base wine and then secondary fermentation takes place in the Charmat tanks. This process preserves the fruit character, making a fresher, more flavorful wine. The aromas of apple and pear are balanced with a bouquet of toasty yeast notes and floral nuances.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Richards Wild Irish Rose Wild Fruit, Blush Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. This Wild Fruit Wine is balanced, medium-bodied and flavored with ginseng. It contains 17% ABV.
ProductDescLong: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. One of the first branded wines in America, Wild Irish Rose has been delivering quality, full-flavored, and fruity fortified wines for more than 50 years. The lambrusco and vinifera juices are cool fermented in stainless steel. The wine is then blended, sweetened, and fortified with brandy. Wild Irish Rose 17% Wild Fruit Wine is a proprietary blend of concord grapes and native New York grape concentrate with enhanced grape character and color. Special care is taken to preserve the delicate, neutral taste profile and color. It's flavored with the earthy taste of ginseng. Balance: medium body. Fruit: tropical fruits, mango.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Santedame Chianti Classico DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Santedame Chianti Classico Red Wine is a complex wine, delivering both structure and balance with flavors of plums, blackberry and currant enhanced by velvety tannins and a lingering finish.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Santedame Chianti Classico Red Wine is a complex red wine blend containing sangiovese, merlot, colorino, cabernet and canaiolo red grape varieties. Flavors of plums, blackberry and currant enhanced by rich, velvety tannins deliver structure and balance. This red blend has an elegant, lingering finish of red berry fruits and balsamic notes. Evolved aging aromas give this red table wine tertiary notes of black pepper and tobacco. Each bottle of this Ruffino wine is made with a careful selection of grapes grown at the Santedame Estate in the heart of the Chianti Classico region. An extra week of contact with grape skins extracts additional color and flavors, while malolactic fermentation enhances this chianti wine's richness and silky texture. Pair this Italian red wine with dishes such as portobello mushroom ravioli or roasted chicken, or enjoy it with international dishes such as tandoori chicken or pork buns. Store at room temperature, but chill bottle for 30 to 60 minutes prior to pouring. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Hogue Genesis Syrah, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Hogue Genesis Syrah has white pepper, blackberry, and caramel aromas, with spicy, toasty notes and chocolate-covered dried cherries on the palate. Pair this red wine with lamb shanks or sausage.
ProductDescLong: The majority of Washington’s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing. Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. The Genesis Columbia Valley Syrah was inoculated for malolactic fermentation and aged for a year in American and French oak barrels, with 25% new oak. This syrah has white pepper, blackberry, and caramel aromas, with spicy, toasty notes and chocolate-covered dried cherries on the palate. Pair with lamb shanks, grilled sausage, or spinach and mushroom lasagna.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Toasted Head Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Toasted Head Cabernet Sauvignon opens with ripe plum and dark berry fruits on the nose and graham cracker toastiness from oak aging. Our medium-bodied red wine finishes with soft, supple tannins.
ProductDescLong: Handcrafting wines since 1995, Toasted Head's estate vineyards in Yolo's Dunnigan Hills. A designated American Viticultural Area on the eastern side of California's North Coast appellation perched on rolling hillsides with well-drained gravelly loam soils. Named for the age-old practice of toasting barrel heads with fire, which is what helps to create the distinct toasted flavors in all our wines. This cabernet sauvignon opens with ripe plum and dark berry fruits on the nose accompanied by graham cracker toastiness from oak aging. Our medium-bodied cabernet showcases flavors of blackberry, cassis with hints of cloves and vanilla, finishing with soft, supple tannins. Varietal: 100% cabernet sauvignon.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Kim Crawford Rise & Shine Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Small Parcels Rise & Shine Pinot Noir is full-bodied with rich flavors of plums, blackberries and spice. This red wine was matured in French oak barrels, giving it structure and length.
ProductDescLong: Kim Crawford's philosophy on making good wine is simple: focus on flavor. The exceptional grapes were selected from small batches and crafted into our Small Parcels range. With grapes grown between the latitudes of 34 degrees and 47 degrees, Kim Crawford's growing regions cover a distance of 1,000 miles from the northern tip of New Zealand to the southern coast. Within these regions the climates vary and allow winemakers to select from an assortment of grapes producing the diverse and flavorful wines Kim Crawford is known for. Kim Crawford Rise & Shine Pinot Noir is a luscious full-bodied wine with rich flavors of plums, blackberries and spice. This red wine was matured in French oak barrels and well framed by silk tannins, giving the wine structure and great length.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Meiomi Chardonnay, White Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Meiomi Chardonnay White Wine is elegant with smooth layers of tropical fruit and lemon peel that pairs well with roasted chicken, fresh crab, oysters, shrimp or creamy pasta.
ProductDescLong: Meiomi Chardonnay White Wine is an elegant Chardonnay wine with smooth layers of pineapple, ripe stone fruit and lemon peel. Highlighted by scents of honey, almonds and baking spices with subtle custard notes, this California white wine is made with carefully blended Chardonnay grapes from Monterey, Sonoma and Santa Barbara, providing balance, complexity and richness in every bottle. Fermented in stainless steel tanks with minimal intervention, this wine ages in French oak barrels for further depth and roundness. This process gives each glass of wine a velvety mouthfeel with succulent acidity and a mineral-driven finish. Enjoy this California Chardonnay wine with soft-ripened goat cheese, crumbly cheddar or fresh mascarpone. It also pairs well with roasted chicken, fresh crab, oysters, citrus shrimp or creamy pasta. For the best taste and quality, refrigerate each bottle of wine for at least two hours before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Meiomi Wines, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California’s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence. Aged 19 months in French oak barrels, this zinfandel has aromas of blue fruits, blackberry, licorice, dark chocolate, and black pepper. The weight and structure are nothing short of extraordinary. The finish is lengthy and enjoyable. Varietal: 78.2% zinfandel, 15.8% petite sirah, 5% carignane, 1% alicante bouschet.

ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Merlot Red Wine has intense, ripe flavors and bright acidity, making it a great addition to a wine and cheese pairing or a dinner party.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Merlot Red Wine has intense, ripe flavors and bright acidity that pairs well with a variety of dishes. Distinctive aromas of ripe red cherry, Asian plum and cranberry, along with hints of black olive, tea leaf, baking spice and sweet oak, make this red merlot a unique dark red wine. Mocha, brown sugar and sweet oak round out the nose, while the palate brims with dark ripe cherry, Marion berry and plum flavors. Oak aging lends sweet toast and brown sugar notes to the lingering finish. This Robert Mondavi red wine is crafted with fruit from California's Central Coast vineyards, where slow ripening in the cool climate by the Pacific Ocean encourages complexity and depth of flavor. Made with phenomenal grapes, Central Coast wine is of the utmost quality and is offered by Robert Mondavi Private Selection at a more accessible price. Pair this merlot wine with rotisserie chicken, meat ravioli, wild salmon and herbed cheese. Serve cool at around 60 degrees for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Red Goliath Merlot has flavors of plums, cherries, and wild berries. It is soft, supple, and complex with a decidedly spicy nose of cassis, and cedar. This red wine pairs well with pheasant or duck.
ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. Mouth-filling flavors of plums, cherries, and wild red berries dominate from start to finish in this merlot. It is soft, supple, and complex with a decidedly spicy nose of black cherry, cassis, and cedar. A perfect match for game fowl, such as pheasant or duck.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Richards Wild Irish Rose, White Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. Wild Irish Rose 13.9% White Wine has a medium body and medium sweetness. It has a neutral grape character.
ProductDescLong: Richards Wild Irish Rose White Wine is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. One of the first branded wines in America, Wild Irish Rose has been delivering quality, full-flavored, and fruity fortified wines for over 50 years. The lambrusco and vinifera juices are cool fermented in stainless steel. The wine is then blended and sweetened. DigitalCatalogProductName: Mark West Santa Lucia Highlands Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mark West Santa Lucia Highlands Pinot Noir is rich, deep, and dark, with black cherry and notes of tea, vanilla, caramel, and delicate spicy oak. This red wine pairs with salmon, sushi, and pork.
ProductDescLong: Mark West Wines accepts nothing less than the best, which is why the fruit for the wines is sourced from the finest vineyards throughout California Santa Lucia Highlands is the ideal place to grow pinot noir, where fog and cool breezes off the Monterey Bay cool hillside plantings. These vineyards yield a small harvest of well-developed fruit.  To make the best pinot noir, vintners first gently de-stem and crush the grapes when they come into the winery. Daily punch-downs and pump-overs extract flavor and color. This pinot noir is rich, deep, and dark, with black cherry, cranberry, and notes of tea, vanilla, caramel, and a delicate, spicy oak. It pairs well with salmon, sushi, and pork tenderloin. At Mark West, there's nothing more important than sharing a passion for pinot with others.

ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Chardonnay White Wine offers delicious tropical fruit flavors and aromas with sweet, creamy notes and baking spices. It pairs well with roasted chicken or pasta.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Chardonnay White Wine is a rich and creamy Central Coast wine that opens to aromas of key lime pie, honeysuckle, green apple and creme brulee. With a palate of baked apples, poached pears, nectarine, peach and pineapple enhanced by notes of vanilla bean and baking spices, this chardonnay wine captures the delicious flavors from California's best coastal vineyards, earning it the gold medal at the 2017 Denver International Wine Competition. Made with chardonnay grapes influenced by coastal Pacific breezes that ensure deep and concentrated fruit flavor in every glass of wine, the majority of this California white wine is aged in French oak barrels that give it a bright and creamy finish with notes of toasted oak. Chill this Robert Mondavi wine for two to two and a half hours and enjoy with roasted chicken or pasta with cream sauce. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Cooper and Thief Brandy Barrel Aged Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Cooper and Thief Brandy Barrel-Aged Pinot Noir Red Wine is aged in brandy barrels for 75 days. Stashing Pinot Noir in brandy barrels creates a lush mouthfeel, with salted caramel and delicious baking spices flavors. Each taste of this California Pinot Noir gives way to aromatic hints of cherry, cardamom and spiced apple. This red wine garners its unique taste thanks to Pinot Noir grapes found all across California's prime winegrowing regions. By blending a portion of Pinot Noir that’s been aged in brandy barrels, we produce a complex, smooth and rounded wine.  Stack this flavorful, bold California wine up against steak or poultry, or enjoy on its own as a new sort of night cap. For a devilishly good taste, chill this Pinot Noir for 20 minutes prior to serving. Cooper and Thief: Born from Mischief. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2019 Cooper & Thief Cellarmasters, Lodi, CA

ProductDescShort: Monterey Bay’s cool ocean breezes create perfect growing conditions for this Estancia Pinot Noir in Monterey County. One sip of this delicate, silky red wine, and you’re sure to fall in love.
ProductDescLong: Estancia's vineyard lies in the Thermal Rainbow of Monterey County, which features midday heat tempered by morning and late-afternoon fog-perfect for developing the intense fruit character. Pinnacles Vineyard was one of the first vineyards in California to be planted with a permanent irrigation system. This Monterey County appellation pinot noir opens with appealing floral notes of violet and lavender, intertwined with fruit aromas of cherry and plum. Concentrated flavors of black cherry, brown sugar, plum, and leathery notes with a silky mid-palate and a rustic toasty finish. Pairs well with smoked salmon, asparagus, pork, poultry and steak. Varietal: 100% pinot noir.

Robert Mondavi wine is crafted with fruit from Southern Monterey County in California's cool-climate Central Coast vineyards, where slow ripening encourages complexity and depth of flavor influenced by the Pacific Ocean. DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Chianti DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Chianti DOCG Red Wine is an Italian wine that balances freshness with a soft and lingering finish. With fruity and floral aromatics, it pairs well with Italian dishes or a classic hamburger.
ProductDescLong: Chianti DOCG Red Wine combines sangiovese grapes with merlot and cabernet sauvignon to create this top quality red wine blend. This Ruffino wine features deep, fruity plum and intense cherry flavors, accompanied by hints of spice, hazelnut, and delicate violet aromas. Harvested from the well-known winegrowing areas of the Chianti region, this red blend goes through alcoholic fermentation aided by racking and punch-downs in stainless steel and concrete vats for two weeks, followed by four months of aging. This results in a fresh and balanced medium-bodied fruity wine that is easy to enjoy and lingers on the palate. Easy to sip and approachable, this chianti wine pairs well with Italian dishes such as ravioli, margherita pizza, and beef carpaccio, or international favorites such as a classic hamburger. As its first wine ever produced, this chianti red wine occupies a special place in the heart and history of Ruffino, serving as a benchmark for quality and consistency for many wine lovers worldwide. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Hogue Merlot, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: The aromas of this dark red wine are earthy and toasty with black cherry, cocoa, and spice. Our Hogue Merlot's palate is rich, but not heavy, with black cherry and boysenberry fruit flavors.
ProductDescLong: The majority of Washington’s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing. Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. The aromas of this dark red wine are earthy and toasty with black cherry, cocoa, and spice. The palate is rich, but not heavy, with black cherry and boysenberry fruit flavors. Pair with roast turkey, grilled bison burgers, or butternut-stuffed ravioli.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Rex Goliath Merlot, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Red Goliath Merlot has flavors of plums, cherries, and wild berries. It is soft, supple, and complex with a decidedly spicy nose of cassis, and cedar. This red wine pairs well with pheasant or duck.
ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. Mouth-filling flavors of plums, cherries, and wild red berries dominate from start to finish in this merlot. It is soft, supple, and complex with a decidedly spicy nose of black cherry, cassis, and cedar. A perfect match for game fowl, such as pheasant or duck.

ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California’s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence.This Belloni Vineyard Zinfandel displays dried flowers and perfume with bramble spice and incredible depth of fruit. DigitalCatalogProductName: SAVED Rose, Blush Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: SAVED Magic Maker Rose Wine offers a crisp and bone dry mouthfeel with honeydew and ripe fruit flavors of grapefruit and strawberry. Pair this blush wine with pasta, salads, chicken or seafood.
ProductDescLong: SAVED Magic Maker Rose Wine is the result of a collaboration between artist Scott Campbell and winemaker Clay Brock representing the freedom and sanctuary through fearless wine blends. Each bottle of dry rose wine opens with alluring aromas of light red fruit and rhubarb, accented by a hint of thyme and grapefruit zest. This California wine is crafted with grenache, syrah, pinot noir, sangiovese and zinfandel grapes from vineyards located as far south as Santa Maria Valley and as far north as King City in Monterey County. Perfected by oak aging in French casks, each parcel is handled separately. Through this distinct, delicate process, each batch maintains a fruity balance, giving this blush wine a crisp and bone-dry mouthfeel with flavors of grapefruit, ripe strawberry and honeydew. A balanced acidity and long, generous finish make this refreshing blush wine perfect for pairing with pasta, salads, chicken or seafood dishes. For the best taste, chill this wine for at least two hours prior to pouring. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 SAVED Wines, Oakville, CA USA.

ProductDescShort: Double Diamond Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon red wine opens with aromas of black currants, dark cherries, blackberry, and oak spice. The palate is rich and juicy with a burst of flavor.
ProductDescLong: In 2000, Fred Schrader created Double Diamond as part of his continuing quest to make the best cabernet sauvignon that Napa Valley appellation can offer. This unique expression of the region carries on the tradition of earning critical acclaim and drawing passionate fans. Aged 16 months in French oak barrels, Double Diamond Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon red wine opens with layered, intriguing aromas of black currants, dark cherries, blackberry, cherry compote, toast and oak spice. The palate is rich and juicy resulting in a big, bursting flavor. The tannin structure makes this a great wine to enjoy upon release, but it will also mellow nicely for the next two to six years. Varietal: 98% cabernet sauvignon, 2% merlot.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Wild Horse Red Blend, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Wild Horse Red Blend brings softness, red fruit, and spice, with structure and color. Aromatics of blueberry pie, with intense dark fruit, and subtle hints of vanilla and brown sugar.
ProductDescLong: Situated at a midpoint in the Central Coast, the Templeton vineyard and winery location is ideal for sourcing fruit from vineyards north and south of the winery, along with its low-vigor soils, proven ground water table, and rural atmosphere. The varieties of soil composition and micro-climates that can be found within the expansive Central Coast appellation present the opportunity to cultivate the same varietal in a wide range of growing conditions. Wild Horse Red Blend brings softness, red fruit, and spice, with structure, color, and high-tone dark fruit. Aromatics are reminiscent of blueberry pie, with intense dark fruit, and subtle hints of vanilla and brown sugar. Pairs well with braised lamb chops or spicy grilled sausage. Varietal: 23% grenache, 75% syrah, 2% mourvedre.

ProductDescShort: Monkey Bay Sauvignon Blanc has aromas of vibrant grapefruit, kiwi, and pineapple with a hint of fresh cut grass. This full, easy-drinking white wine is fresh, lively and perfect for summer.
ProductDescLong: Monkey Bay wines are full of easy-drinking style and charm reflecting New Zealand’s laid-back lifestyle, they’re perfect for any social occasion. The New Zealand appellation grapes enjoy a long, even ripening season, developing the lovely fresh fruit flavors you’ll find in Monkey Bay Sauvignon Blanc. When drinking this sauvignon blanc you are transported to paradise with aromas of vibrant grapefruit, kiwi, and pineapple with a hint of fresh cut grass. This sauvignon blanc is a fresh, lively approachable wine overflowing with grapefruit, lemon, and passionfruit, and infused with a delicate, herbaceous character. Great on its own or pair it with chicken, sea bass, or shellfish, this wine is perfect for summer. Varietal: 100% sauvignon blanc.

ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi White Zinfandel Blush Wine is a refreshing with fruity flavors and aromas, making it perfect to enjoy on a warm afternoon paired with some spicy Cajun food.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi White Zinfandel Blush Wine is a refreshing wine that is perfect to share with friends around a communal table or to enjoy with daily meals. Each bottle of wine provides fruity aromas and flavors of raspberries and strawberries with a hint of citrus that beautifully complements its watermelon notes. Employing unique growing techniques and state-of-the-art technology for winemaking, this California wine uses a proprietary blend of grape varieties from the Lodi region, creating a crisp and bright light-bodied table wine with hints of cherry and juicy red fruit. Enjoy this white zinfandel wine on a warm afternoon or pair it with chicken, tangy cheeses or spicy Cajun dishes such as Andouille Cajun Fettuccine. To preserve this fine wine's taste and quality, refrigerate for at least two hours then serve chilled. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescLong: Paso Creek’s bold, juicy, full-bodied, and densely flavored wines provide a glimpse into the heartland of America. Small-lot winemaking and patient barrel aging complete the winemaking picture and enhance the robust and bold character of this Paso Robles appellation merlot. ProductDescShort: The Velvet Devil Merlot Red Wine is a fresh and appealing blend with a velvety finish and flavors of fruit, cedar and cassis. This Washington wine has floral tones that pair well with pork and steak.
ProductDescLong: The Velvet Devil Merlot Red Wine is a fresh and appealing blend, with flavors of pure velvet, black fruit, cedar, tobacco and cassis. Floral overtones and a polished core of currant combine with a full body and velvety finish for a wonderful pairing with pork, steak and burgers. This merlot wine blend is crafted in Washington state in growing regions that add unique characteristics to the wine. It contains 89% merlot, 10% cabernet sauvignon and 1% malbec for a fresh and vivid flavor and rich color. Store this bottle of wine at room temperature, then chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes before serving at around 60 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Charles Smith Wines, Prosser, WA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Hidden Crush Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Hidden Crush Chardonnay features aromas of lime, lemon, green apple, pineapple, and peach with refreshing crisp acidity and lovely lingering flavors. This white wine pairs well with creams and cheese.
ProductDescLong: Every vintage has a "hidden crush", a winemaker's careful selection of grapes from their favorite vineyards. The grapes used to craft Hidden Crush wines are hand-selected from individual lots on select Central Coast, California appellations. Each parcel is vinified separately to preserve its unique style, and every batch undergoes tank and barrel fermentation aged in oak for six to nine months until it is perfect. This chardonnay features aromas of lime, lemon blossom, green apple, pineapple, and white peach with bright fruit flavors, rich viscosity, refreshing crisp acidity, and lovely lingering flavors. Its bright citrus fruit flavors pairs well with delicate, subtle flavors, creams and cheese. Varietal: 100% chardonnay.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Meritage, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Meritage Red Wine showcases notes of black cherry, powerful tannins and a bright, lengthy finish, making this delicious red wine perfect for barbecues and gatherings.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Meritage Red Wine is a richly styled red blend composed of classic varietals, including merlot, malbec, cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc and petit verdot. The nose and palate brim with notes of ripe blackberry, mulberry and blueberry, framed by hints of violet and mulling spices. On the mid-palate, flavors of dark chocolate, cinnamon and Tahitian vanilla prevail in this red wine blend. Powerful, chewy tannins support the bright, lengthy finish, redolent with brown sugar, caramel and oak notes. Robert Mondavi wine is crafted with fruit from California's cool-climate Central Coast vineyards, where slow ripening encourages complexity and depth of flavor influenced by the Pacific Ocean. This area produces grapes and wines of the utmost quality, all at a more accessible price. Serve this full bodied red wine with grilled steak or stew. Store at room temperature, but refrigerate this bottle of wine for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring a glass. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Primal Roots Red Blend, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Primal Roots Red Blend captures wild, sweet, and intense flavors. Its rich, balanced texture makes you want to explore this red wine's many layers.
ProductDescLong: Primal Roots uses fruit from California’s appellation, harvested, crushed, destemmed, and cold-soaked for three days to allow juice/skin contact before fermentation. This process yields a deep color, rich texture, and more concentrated fruit flavors. The finished blend captures all of the wild, sweet, and intense flavors. Its rich, balanced texture makes you want to explore its many layers. Aromas of black cherry, plum, black currant, caramel, and hints of dark chocolate give way to a full bodied red blend with a soft entry, balanced fruit and tannins, and a lingering ripe cocoa finish. The rich core of black cherry, dark fruit, and spicy oak are truly uninhibited. Varietal: 34% syrah, 30% merlot, 20% zinfandel.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Maestro, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Maestro Red Wine is a vintage-driven red blend that displays vibrant flavor and plush tannins, making it ideal for pairing with beef, pork, lamb or pasta dishes.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Maestro Red Wine is a true vintage-driven red blend created to honor Robert Mondavi. A crescendo of dark, juicy plum and cassis fruit, violet, cinnamon and unsweetened cocoa linger on the palate, while each sumptuous sip boasts vibrant flavor and plush tannins with a lingering finish. Created based on what the vintage provides, this red wine blend of cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc, merlot and petit verdot is sourced from two prized sub-regions of Napa Valley: Oakville and Stags Leap. This Napa Valley wine undergoes a total of 24 days of wine to skin contact, maximizing the extraction of varietal character while keeping the tannins fleshy and supple. Malolactic fermentation in French oak barrels assures seamless integration of fruit and oak. Pair a glass of this dark red wine with pork, beef, steak, pasta or lamb dishes. For optimal taste, store at room temperature, then refrigerate this bottle of wine for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi Winery, Oakville, CA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Rex Goliath Sauvignon Blanc, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Rex Goliath Sauvignon Blanc has bright citrus and summer fruit flavors like honeydew, nectarine, and pear. This white wine is perfect for picnics, entertaining on the patio, or rewarding yourself.
ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. With bright lively citrus and summer fruit flavors-like honeydew melon, nectarine, and pear-this sauvignon blanc is perfect for picnics, entertaining on the patio, or rewarding yourself after a long day.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Hogue Genesis Meritage, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Hogue Genesis Meritage captures the best qualities of its components, merlot and cabernet sauvignon. This red wine has flavors of rich black cherry, spicy oak, and a touch of orange zest.
ProductDescLong: The majority of Washington’s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing. Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. The Genesis Columbia Valley Red Meritage captures the best qualities of its components, merlot and cabernet sauvignon. Flavors are of rich black cherry, spicy oak, and a touch of orange zest, with vanilla spice on the finish. Serve with braised short ribs, rosemary-herbed lamb chops, or grilled T-bone steak.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Prosecco DOC, Italian White Sparkling Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is a creamy and crisp Italian prosecco with flavors of peach and golden apples. It is ideal on its own or paired with pizza, seafood and shellfish dishes.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is an Italian sparkling wine meant to be sipped and enjoyed. This creamy and crisp extra dry white wine offers fruity aromas accompanied by hints of wisteria, with an intense peach and golden apple flavor. This Italian wine begins in the hilly area of Valdobbiadene, with glera grapes that undergo a traditional wine vinification. The winemakers then use selected yeasts in a natural refermentation process to create this clean and delicate Ruffino prosecco wine with refined bubbles and a pleasant finish. Enjoy this Italian prosecco as an aperitif, mix it into your favorite cocktail or pair it with margherita pizza, seafood, shellfish and white meat dishes. For the best quality and taste, drink this Ruffino wine young. Refrigerate for three to three and a half hours and serve at a temperature between 45 and 48 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ravenswood Icon Sonoma County, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California’s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence. Aged 19 months in French oak barrels, this red blend displays alluring blackberry, mulberry, and blueberry with exciting hints of anise and pie spice. Lively and weighty, this wine has wonderful tannins and texture, offering structure and grip without being aggressive. Varietal: 27% carignane, 24% petite sirah, 23% zinfandel, 21% alicante bouschet, 5% garnacha.

ProductDescLong: The Manischewitz winery is located in Canandaigua, New York, and is best known for its budget concord wine. Aged in steel tanks at cold temperatures to maintain fruit aromas. This elderberry is a hearty red wine bursting with the aroma and flavor of elderberry pie. The crisp acidity balances the sweetness and up front fruit aromas. The natural fruitiness, allows this wine to be served chilled. Goes wonderfully with roasted meats with fruit sauces or paired with fruit based desserts.

Easily recognized by its elegant and distinctive triangle-shaped label, Vendange is the ideal wine for entertaining or enjoying with a meal at home. With its fruit-forward varietal characteristics, Vendange wine is perfect for everyday consumption. This merlot is plush with highlights of spice and red berry aromas. ProductDescLong: Cook’s California Champagne is produced at the Mission Bell Winery in Madera, California. Cook’s began in 1859 when Isaac Cook created the first American champagne. Cook's wines have been continuing the tradition of being quality champagnes ever since. Sweet and brightly aromatic, Cook’s moscato offers notes of creamy peach, lychee, and citrus fruit. DigitalCatalogProductName: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Pinot Grigio, White Wine, 187 mL Go Glass
ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Pinot Grigio Dry White Wine is food-friendly with flavors and aromas of nectarine and fresh peach. Pair it with seafood and other light dishes or sip it solo.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Pinot Grigio Dry White Wine is a food-friendly wine that displays aromas of fresh peach and nectarine combined with refreshing citrus notes that end in a clean, crisp finish. Hailing from California's famous Lodi region, this light wine is made from pinot grigio grapes originating in the northern coast of Italy. Well-known as a perfect pairing for shellfish and other light fare, this pinot grigio wine is great to sip by the glass or serve with chicken, seafood or oysters. By using state-of-the-art winemaking technology, employing unique growing techniques, and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to produce high quality grapes for an excellent bottle of pinot grigio wine. Chill this crisp white wine in the refrigerator for at least two hours before serving cold at around 50 degrees. Woodbridge wine is crafted for over 30 years and perfect for any day. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Il Leo Chianti Superiore DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Superiore Chianti Red Wine is a well-structured, medium-bodied wine with elegant tannins that pairs beautifully with a wide variety of fresh, seasonal and simply prepared Italian foods.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Superiore Chianti Red Wine is an intensely flavorful and medium-bodied red wine blend containing sangiovese, cabernet sauvignon and merlot red grape varieties. This red blend showcases rich flavors of plum, dark cherry and blueberry with hints of black pepper and spice. Steady-yet-elegant tannins and a lingering finish match perfectly with the fruity body of this Italian wine. Each bottle of this Ruffino wine contains grapes from the highly sought-after sub-regions of Valdarno and Monteriggioni in Chianti. Extended grape skin contact continues for seven days to enhance this wine's rich color and flavors. After malolactic fermentation adds smooth, velvety characteristics, this chianti wine ages for at least seven months in concrete and stainless steel vats, with an additional two months of bottle aging. Pair a glass of this fine wine with Italian sausage, lasagna or meatball sliders. Keep at room temperature then serve cool at around 60 degrees for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA
