DigitalCatalogProductName: Meiomi Methode Champenoise, White Sparkling Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Meiomi Methode Champenoise Sparkling White Wine is a crisp white wine with aromas of tropical fruit and subtle notes of toasted brioche. Pair it with fresh oysters, brie, sushi or a berry tart.
ProductDescLong: Meiomi Methode Champenoise Sparkling White Wine is luscious with aromas of tropical fruit and green apple laced with hints of ambrosia. Each glass of wine offers delicious flavors of crunchy pears, zesty citrus and honey with subtle notes of toasted brioche that makes it perfect for a wine and cheese platter. This sparkling wine also pairs well with fresh oysters topped with classic mignonette sauce, sushi, warm brie or a fresh mixed berry tart. Gently crafted from grapes grown in coastal vineyards, this California white wine blends chardonnay that provides elegance and finesse, with pinot noir that adds structure and complexity. Using the traditional French winemaking process Methode Champenoise, this varietal blend transforms from still to sparkling wine entirely inside the bottle, resulting in a crisp white wine with a slight yeastiness and fresh minerality. Refrigerate this sparkling white wine for at least three hours, and serve chilled for best test and quality. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Meiomi Wines, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Chardonnay, White Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Chardonnay White Wine offers delicious tropical fruit flavors and aromas with sweet, creamy notes and baking spices. It pairs well with roasted chicken or pasta.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Chardonnay White Wine is a rich and creamy Central Coast wine that opens to aromas of key lime pie, honeysuckle, green apple and creme brulee. With a palate of baked apples, poached pears, nectarine, peach and pineapple enhanced by notes of vanilla bean and baking spices, this chardonnay wine captures the delicious flavors from California's best coastal vineyards, earning it the gold medal at the 2017 Denver International Wine Competition. Made with chardonnay grapes influenced by coastal Pacific breezes that ensure deep and concentrated fruit flavor in every glass of wine, the majority of this California white wine is aged in French oak barrels that give it a bright and creamy finish with notes of toasted oak. Chill this Robert Mondavi wine for two to two and a half hours and enjoy with roasted chicken or pasta with cream sauce. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Spoken Barrel Meritage, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Spoken Barrel Meritage Red Wine Blend is a Washington state wine with rich fruit flavors and hints of toasty oak and chocolate that pairs well with meaty dishes, bread and cheese or mushroom pasta.
ProductDescLong: Spoken Barrel Meritage Red Wine Blend is a rich and complex red table wine that's easy to pick out, open up and share with confidence. This red blend features bright, fresh fruit aromas of blueberry and red plum with dark notes of leather, black licorice and deep roasted oak, accented by flavors of bright red fruits, toasty oak, smoke, chocolate and citrus rind. Black garnet in color, this Washington State wine combines cabernet sauvignon, malbec, merlot and petit verdot varietals from top vineyards in Columbia Valley. Destemmed and fermented warm on the skins in stainless steel tanks, this meritage wine develops a dense and rich mouthfeel with ample tannins that are supple and carry the flavors through a long finish. Enjoy this delicious red wine blend with lamb, pork, beef or poultry dishes. It also pairs well with bread and cheese or mushroom pasta. ProductDescLong: SIMI Sonoma County Merlot Red Wine is an incredibly balanced cabernet sauvignon merlot blend. Packed with flavors of bright red fruit, red plum, black cherry, blackberry and blueberry, it is framed by light toast and sweet vanilla notes. Hints of spice lend weight and depth. Each bottle of wine permeates scents of blackberry, dark cherry and raspberry, with hints of cocoa, clove and lifted aromas of bay laurel and vanilla. Made with grapes hailing from the Alexander Valley in Sonoma County, this California red wine blend ferments in stainless steel tanks and ages in French and American oak barrels for 14 months, producing a medium-bodied red wine blend with rich, firm, cocoa-like tannins and a toasty oak finish. Store at room temperature, and enjoy a chilled glass of wine with a classic Margarita pizza, cedar-smoked squab with cherry compote or roasted salmon with risotto cake. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 SIMI Winery, Geyserville, CA

ProductDescShort: Hogue Chardonnay reveals juicy apple and pear on the nose, with lemon meringue pie, creamy vanilla oak, and toast. On the palate are flavors of fresh apple pie, lemon curd, and cream.
ProductDescLong: The majority of Washington’s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing. Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. This chardonnay reveals juicy apple and pear on the nose, with lemon meringue pie, creamy vanilla oak, and toast. A well-balanced palate follows with flavors of fresh apple pie, lemon curd, and cream. Pairs well with salmon-stuffed crab cakes, grilled lemon chicken, and fettuccini alfredo.

ProductDescShort: Meiomi Pinot Noir Red Wine features grapes harvested from three of California's top winegrowing regions for a bold taste. This Meiomi wine pairs well with dark chocolate or thin crust pizza.
ProductDescLong: Meiomi Pinot Noir Red Wine brings you structure and depth seldom seen in a pinot noir wine, thanks to its unique and meticulous aging process. Aged for six months in French oak barrels, this California red wine's juicy strawberry flavor and notes of dark berries and toasted mocha add complexity and depth on the palate. With a rich garnet color and a ruby edge, this pinot noir wine permeates aromas of bright fruit jam, mocha and oak. This California wine owes much of its complexity to its varied upbringing, featuring grapes harvested from Monterey, Santa Barbara and Sonoma. The silky texture and balanced acidity of this Meiomi wine make it a perfect table top companion for dark chocolate or thin crust pizza. Meiomi Pinot Noir offers a full-bodied taste that stays with you for a lengthy finish no matter the meal. It's that unrivaled taste that earned this California red wine 92 points from The Tasting Panel. Bring out this wine at your next get-together for a lasting impression. ProductDescShort: Toasted Head Merlot has plum, cherry and vanilla notes, with hints of spice and toasted oak for complexity. The palate of this medium-bodied red wine is big and soft.
ProductDescLong: Handcrafting wines since 1995, Toasted Head's estate vineyards in Yolo's Dunnigan Hills. A designated American Viticultural Area on the eastern side of California's North Coast appellation perched on rolling hillsides with well-drained gravelly loam soils. Named for the age-old practice of toasting barrel heads with fire, which is what helps to create the distinct toasted flavors in all our wines. This is a medium-bodied merlot with fragrant plum, cherry and vanilla notes, with hints of spice and toasted oak for complexity. The palate is big and soft with flavors of rich black fruits and cherry pie rounded out with a touch of smoke and chocolate. Varietal: 100% merlot.

ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Rum Barrel Aged Merlot Red Wine blends the craftmanship of California winemaking with the exotic tradition of dark rum barrel aging, resulting in a complex merlot wine with rich aromas of molasses, maple and black plum. ProductDisclaimerSparkling: SPARKLING WARNING: BE CAREFUL! Point bottle away from self and others to avoid serious eye injury.  Stopper may eject forcefully while you are removing the hood or at any time after hood removal.  Bottle contains high pressure which increases with warmth or shaking. DigitalCatalogProductName: Estancia Chardonnay, White Wine, 3 L Box
ProductDescShort: Cooled by the morning fog and far enough from the Monterey Bay to get a long, daily dose of sun, Monterey County is the ideal location for creating this Estancia Chardonnay white wine.
ProductDescLong: Estancia's vineyard lies in the Thermal Rainbow of Monterey County appellation, which features midday heat tempered by morning and late-afternoon fog-perfect for developing the intense fruit character. Pinnacles Vineyard was one of the first vineyards in California to be planted with a permanent irrigation system. This chardonnay opens with aromas of honey and tropical fruits with hints of orange and pineapple. Rich and well balanced with a delicious, creamy-textured mid-palate of ripe fruit, orange, almond, and spice flavors that leads to a refreshing and smooth finish. Pairs well with smoked salmon, cream sauce pastas, poultry, pork and mushrooms. Varietal: 100% chardonnay.
ProductBullet05: Well-balanced with delicious ripe fruit, almond, and spice flavors
ProductBullet08: Monterey County appellation

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2012, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: From our famed To Kalon Vineyard. Robert Mondavi Winery Cabernet Sauvignon is rich and spicy with blackberry and blueberry flavors complemented by cinnamon, sage, coriander, and tobacco.
ProductDescLong: The unique geography and climate of Napa Valley are what allows Robert Mondavi Winery Wines to grow a variety of delicious grapes that give the wines their distinctive character and intense fruit flavor. The grapes soak up sun in the afternoon and are cooled by evening fog. They mature slowly, developing intense, pure fruit flavors unique to California coastal vineyards. This cabernet features a deep, dark cassis and black cherry fruit, sage, nutmeg, and vanilla spice. It has a velvety texture with a plush, juicy finish that lingers luxuriously on the palate.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Richards Wild Irish Rose Moscato, White Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. This moscato provides a wonderfully floral nose and a classic moscato taste. It contains 17% ABV.
ProductDescLong: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. One of the first branded wines in America, Wild Irish Rose has been delivering quality, full-flavored, and fruity fortified wines for more than 50 years. The lambrusco and vinifera juices are cool fermented in stainless steel. The wine is then blended, sweetened and fortified with brandy. Wild Irish Rose 17% Moscato is a proprietary blend of concord grapes and native New York grape concentrate with enhanced grape character and color. Special care is taken to preserve the delicate, neutral taste profile and color. Balance: sweet. Fruit: classic muscat grape. Provides a wonderfully floral nose and a classic moscato taste.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ravenswood Lodi Zinfandel, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California’s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence. Aged 18 months in French oak barrels, this zinfandel explodes with blueberries, black plums, vanilla, and cocoa. Lush and mouth filling, with incredibly silky tannins that slide into a long, flavorful finish. Varietal: 82% zinfandel, 17% petite sirah, 1% alicante bouschet.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Rex Goliath Pink Moscato, White Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Rex Goliath pink moscato has pretty floral aromas, strawberry sweetness, and vibrant citrus finish. Deliciously versatile, chill and serve this wine with spicy dishes and your favorite desserts.
ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the “World’s Largest Rooster”, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. This pink moscato has pretty floral aromas, mouthwatering strawberry sweetness, and vibrant citrus finish. Deliciously versatile, chill and serve this refreshing wine with spicy dishes and your favorite desserts.

ProductDescShort: J. Roget Brut Sparkling Wine is medium-dry with crisp fruit flavors. The aromas are balanced with a bouquet of toasty yeast notes and floral nuances. J. Roget offers great-tasting champagnes.
ProductDescLong: J. Roget offers great-tasting champagnes that also blend beautifully into full-flavored cocktails. This American sparkling wine is medium-dry with crisp fruit flavors. 100% stainless steel tanks are used for the base wine and then secondary fermentation takes place in the Charmat tanks. This process preserves the fruit character, making a fresher, more flavorful wine. The aromas are balanced with a bouquet of toasty yeast notes and floral nuances.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Bourbon Barrel Aged Red Blend, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Bourbon Barrel-Aged Red Blend has aromas of vanilla and toasted oak with rich flavors of blackberry, blueberry and warm cinnamon
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Bourbon Barrel-Aged Red Blend is a full bodied red wine with aromas of vanilla, toasted oak, and creme brulee. Ripe fruit flavors of blackberry and blueberry are complemented with hints of toasty vanilla oak, cocoa and warm cinnamon.  This California wine is sourced from premium California vineyards, selected for their varietal expression and style complimentary to Bourbon barrel aging. A select portion of the blend is aged in used Bourbon barrels to impart a rich, toasty finish. Spice things up with this Red Blend and pair it with a hearty sirloin chili.  Store at room temperature, then chill for 30 to 60 minutes before serving at around 60 degrees.  Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi offers 40 years of heritage and Robert Mondavi's relentless pursuit of quality in every bottle to ensure everyone has access to better wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Clos du Bois Chardonnay has aromas of apple blossom, ripe pear, and sweet lemon drop complemented by toasty oak, spice, and cream. This white wine has bright, juicy flavors and a long, fresh finish.
ProductDescLong: Clos du Bois Winery farms almost 800 acres in the vibrantly diverse wine regions of Sonoma County and Coastal California. Working with a family of trusted growers from some of the best vineyards, each vintage is crafted to achieve balance, intensity, and true varietal character. This Clos du Bois Chardonnay is a brilliant silvery straw yellow in color, with intense aromas of apple blossom, ripe pear, and sweet lemon drop complemented by toasty oak. This crisp, refreshing white wine will complement a variety of foods, including fish prepared in lemon butter sauce, pasta in cream sauce, and herb-roasted chicken.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Mount Veeder Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mount Veeder Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon blends black peppercorn and graphite to create a complex and full palate. This red wine has aromas of deep cherry, plum with hints of anise and caramel.
ProductDescLong: Mount Veeder Winery was the first vineyard in the Napa Valley appellation to have all five of the grape varieties used in a classic Bordeaux blend. Mount Veeder Winery feels that blending is the key to crafting the most complete, balanced wine. Artisanal winemaking skills, beginning with gentle handling in the vineyard and finishing with extended barrel aging in the cellar, ensure the wines are enjoyable upon release, yet capable of graceful aging. Vibrant berry and dark chocolate flavors blend with black peppercorn and graphite to create a complex and full palate. The rich, velvety structure delivers a smooth and seamless finish of cassis, blackberry pie, and rosemary. Aromas of deep cherry, plum, and vanilla intertwine with beautiful hints of anise and caramel. Varietal: 83% cabernet sauvignon, 11% merlot, 3% petit verdot, 2% malbec, 1% cabernet franc.
ProductBullet05: Vibrant berry and dark chocolate flavors blend with black peppercorn and graphite
ProductBullet08: Napa Valley appellation

DigitalCatalogProductName: Hogue Riesling, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Hogue Riesling reveals ripe aromas and flavors of apple and lime, with subtle notes of peach and melon. This white wine is crisp and well balanced, with an off-dry style.
ProductDescLong: The majority of Washington’s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing.  Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. The 2015 Riesling reveals ripe aromas and flavors of apple and lime, with subtle notes of peach and melon. The wine is crisp and well balanced, with an off-dry style. Pair this fruit-driven, food-friendly wine with fresh pear and apple slices, hard cheeses with nuts, whitefish and other seafood dishes with low to moderate oil content, or spicy Thai cuisine.

ProductDescShort: SIMI Sonoma County Sauvignon Blanc Dry White Wine offers complex aromas and flavors of lime zest, Meyer lemon, pink grapefruit, lemongrass, freshly cut hay, honeysuckle, and a hint of wet stone.
ProductDescLong: SIMI Sonoma County Sauvignon Blanc Dry White Wine is a fresh, lively and crisp white wine that displays complex aromas and zesty flavors of white peach, lime leaf, lemongrass, Meyer lemon and grapefruit. A long finish leaves lasting impressions of wet stone and green citrus for a delicious solo glass. This SIMI wine is made with 98 percent sauvignon blanc wine grapes, along with 2 percent semillon, with both varietals sourced from California's Sonoma region. The flavors of this crisp white wine complement a variety of refreshing, light dishes such as goat cheese ravioli, smoked salmon and Mussels Provencal. Store this wine in the refrigerator and serve chilled for best flavor. Great wine brings people together. Logo on keg/barrel image is representational, brand logo does not appear on product. ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Sauvignon Blanc White Wine is a fruit-forward Central Coast wine with refreshing flavors and a balanced acidity that pair well with grilled shrimp or roasted chicken.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Sauvignon Blanc White Wine is a fruit-forward table white wine that offers refreshing, mouth-watering flavors at an affordable price. Awarded with a gold medal at the 2017 Denver International Wine Competition, this California sauvignon blanc wine opens with distinctive aromas of fresh-cut grass, meyer lemon and grapefruit that enhance rich and vibrant flavors of ripe mango, citrus zest, herbs, guava and honeydew melon. Capturing the delicious flavors from California's best coastal vineyards, meticulously selected high-quality grapes are fermented and aged in stainless steel, giving this California white wine a bright finish with mineral undertones and lingering notes of lively lime zest. Chill this Robert Mondavi wine for two to two and a half hours and enjoy with grilled shrimp or roasted chicken. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Simply Naked Pinot Grigio is light-bodied and has layers of lime and melon, aromas of peach and passion fruit, and hints of spice. This white wine pairs well with shellfish, salads, and pasta.
ProductDescLong: Simply Naked wines reveal themselves as they really are, without being hidden by the flavor of oak. By choosing not to oak-age our wines, we are allowing the crisp fruit flavor and the true varietal characteristics to shine through. We start with the best quality fruit from California’s appellation and manage the entire process very carefully. It takes a lot of discipline but it's worth it in the end when you have a great tasting wine in the bottle. ProductDescShort: Nobilo Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc White Wine is a refreshing New Zealand wine with rich tropical fruit flavors and citrus notes. Enjoyable on its own or with light salads, chicken or seafood dishes.
ProductDescLong: Nobilo Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc White Wine is vibrant and refreshing with rich flavors and aromas of cantaloupe, ripe passionfruit and pineapple, complemented by citrus, elderflower and herbal notes. Consistently showcasing the diverse qualities of the Malborough region, this New Zealand sauvignon blanc is primarily made with grapes from Wairau Valley vineyards that showcase tropical fruit flavors, with a small portion coming from vineyards from Awatere Valley that provide balance with citrus-driven flavors. Each bottle of wine delivers mouthwatering acidity with a crisp and smooth finish which makes this table white wine enjoyable as an aperitif or with lemon herb chicken, light salads or lighter seafood dishes. For best taste and quality, refrigerate this sauvignon blanc wine for at least two hours before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2019 Constellation Imports, Gonzales, CA USA

ProductDescShort: SIMI Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is incredibly food-friendly with juicy plum and black cherry flavors and notes of cocoa. It brings out the best flavors in grilled steaks.
ProductDescLong: SIMI Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a beautiful representation of Alexander Valley, with intriguing flavors that invite you to take another sip and enjoy with your favorite meals. Characterized by balanced flavors of blackberry, plum and black cherry, this red wine gives way to complex notes of cocoa, cassis, pepper, berry and cedar. The grapes for this cabernet sauvignon are specially selected from the warmer Alexander Valley sub-appellation of Sonoma County, giving each sip of this red California wine a supple finish with notes of roasted coffee on the palate. This delicious red wine brings out the best flavors in grilled steaks with roasted mushrooms, as well as duck or lamb. Store this bottle of red wine at room temperature, and chill for 20 minutes before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 SIMI Winery, Geyserville, CA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Kim Crawford Signature Reserve Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Signature Reserve Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc White Wine reveals powerful aromas of tropical fruit with a clean, crisp finish that pairs perfectly with rack of lamb or spinach salad.
ProductDescLong: Kim Crawford Signature Reserve Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc White Wine reveals intense, lifted aromatics of tropical fruit like passionfruit and zesty grapefruit that lead into a range of complex flavors. Distinct mineral notes accent this wine's rich, hefty palate, culminating in a clean, crisp finish. This New Zealand sauvignon blanc is sourced from select small lots along Marlborough's coastal plains and valleys, which allows grapes in each sub-region to develop characters unique to their terroir. Enjoy this bottle of wine immediately, or let the flavors continue to develop for up to two years. Pair this Marlborough region white wine and its fresh flavor with herb-crusted rack of lamb, seafood risotto, or a light goat cheese and spinach salad. Serve this crisp white wine chilled for optimal taste. Kim Crawford: Undo Ordinary. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Constellation Imports, Rutherford, CA.

ProductDescLong: Established as one of America’s best-selling wines, Vendange offers a selection of well-balanced, approachable and high-quality varietal wines that are always fresh and ready to enjoy. Easily recognized by its elegant and distinctive triangle-shaped label, Vendange is the ideal wine for entertaining or enjoying with a meal at home. With its fruit-forward varietal characteristics, Vendange wines are perfect for everyday consumption. Dark brick red in color, this cabernet sauvignon boasts rich aromas of black fruit and spice on the nose. Blackberry and black cherry flavors dominate with just a hint of green pepper. DigitalCatalogProductName: Inniskillin Niagara Icewine VQA Cabernet Franc, Red Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Inniskillin Niagara Icewine Cabernet Franc opens with strawberry, raspberry and rhubarb. A palate of red fruits complemented by balanced acidity. This red wine pairs with dark chocolate and rib eye.
ProductDescLong: Inniskillin Icewine, recognized as one of the world’s great wines, is truly winter’s gift to wine lovers. Harvested at the pinnacle of Canada’s crisp winter, the grapes are naturally frozen on the vine and picked when the temperature drops to -10 degrees C. Only a few drops of luscious nectar can be squeezed from each bunch, which is then expertly guided through fermentation to achieve this rich and alluring specialty wine. This Niagara River appellation wine opens with characteristics of strawberry, raspberry and rhubarb dominate the nose while the palate shows a robust concentration of red fruits as well, all of which complemented by a well-balanced acidity. Pairs well with salted dark chocolate, chocolate mousse with fresh berries, strawberry rhubarb pie and porcini dusted rib eye. Serve chilled.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Lumina DOC Pinot Grigio, Italian White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Lumina Pinot Grigio White Wine is a fresh and fragrant Italian wine, ideal for serving at a wine and cheese party or with linguine, spinach gnocchi or tomato bruschetta.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Lumina DOC Pinot Grigio White Wine makes a natural aperitif or companion to a variety of foods. This refreshing white wine is fragrant with bright aromas of pineapple, white peach and tropical fruit accompanied by delicate white flowers and sage, followed by flavors of apple and pear. The firm but balanced acidity and the ripe fruit taste profile confers freshness and a mineral touch to this fine wine. This Italian pinot grigio is made with grapes sourced from sought-after vineyards in the wine growing region of Friuli. Ruffino's traditional winemaking process, along with fermentation in temperature-controlled stainless steel vats, delivers a pinot grigio wine that reveals itself without coaxing or manipulation. This Italian white wine is the perfect accompaniment to fresh seafood salsa, linguine, spinach gnocchi, tomato bruschetta, Parmigiano Reggiano or Pecorino Romano. Refrigerate this bottle of wine for at least two hours, and serve chilled for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

A medium body with vibrant acidity showcases characteristic flavors of ripe pear and green apple, leading to a toasty finish with vanilla oak notes. Sip this chardonnay wine on its own or pair it with delightful appetizers and hearty dishes like lemon pepper chicken. Grapes in this California wine are sourced from the Lodi region. By using state-of-the-art winemaking technology, employing unique growing techniques and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to produce high quality grapes for an excellent bottle of wine. Chill this chardonnay wine in the refrigerator for 2 to 2 and a half hours before serving at around 50 degrees. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day, Woodbridge offers approachable white wines that you don't have to overthink. This red blend contains a strong helping of syrah, with a supporting cast of viognier and grenache wine grapes sourced from the Washington State winegrowing region using sustainable wine practices. This appellation is the second-largest premium wine producer in the United States and continues to grow in popularity thanks to its unique characteristics. ProductDescShort: Thorn Napa Valley Merlot Red Wine is a full-bodied red blend with cherry and vanilla flavors, balanced acidity and a long finish. This delicious merlot wine pairs well with pork, beef, steak or duck.
ProductDescLong: Thorn Napa Valley Merlot Red Wine is a red wine blend with layers of character and complexity. Each bottle of wine opens with earthy aromas that fade into scents of cocoa, blackberry, cedar and anise. Made with grapes sourced from small premier vineyards throughout Napa Valley, this California red wine is smooth with delicious flavors of cherry, chocolate, vanilla, and a mild toastiness that makes it the perfect companion for richer dishes such as pork, beef, steak or duck. This Napa Valley wine is aged in French and Hungarian oak barrels, combining merlot grapes with malbec and petite sirah to accentuate the fruit and syrah to create depth in the body, resulting in a full-bodied red blend with balanced acidity and a long, juicy finish. To preserve its taste and quality, store this merlot wine at room temperature and chill for 30 to 60 minutes before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 The Prisoner Wine Company, St. Helena, CA USA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Alauda Toscana IGT, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Alauda Toscana IGT Red Wine is an elegant, full-bodied red wine blend rich with ripe red fruit flavors and aromas. Pair this red blend with savory dishes or peppered cheeses.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Alauda Toscana IGT Red Wine is an elegant, full-bodied red wine blend that represents Ruffino's artisan approach to winemaking. Intense aromas of ripe red fruit fill this red blend, while complex secondary aromatics of balsamic and vanilla add character. Made with hand harvested cabernet franc, merlot and colorino grapes from very low-yielding vines grown in the Ruffino's Poggio Casciano and Montemasso estate vineyards, this red wine blend is rich with flavors of plum, cherry and ripe berry, complemented by unique notes of balsamic and dark chocolate. The final varietal blend is aged in barriques, steel tanks and finally the bottle. That extensive process gives this Italian red wine tertiary flavors of sweet spice, along with soft tannins that linger in the palate. This sophisticated Super Tuscan wine pairs well with savory dishes such as bistecca piorentina, tortelli with duck sauce or risotto with sausage and lamb shoulder. It also tastes great with peppered cheeses. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescLong: Light and refreshing, Kim Crawford Rose Wine has a lively nose that brims with bright berry and tropical fruit. Richly flavored with hints of strawberry and watermelon, this vibrantly colored pink wine is the ideal summer sipper or aperitif. DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Chianti Classico DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Chianti Classico Red Wine features cherry and red berry fruit notes with velvety tannins and firm acidity, making it the ideal companion to prosciutto or mushroom risotto.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Chianti Classico Red Wine is a complex and deep red wine blend containing sangiovese, merlot and cabernet sauvignon red grape varieties. This red blend is characterized by cherry and red berry fruit notes with delicately spiced hints of tobacco, leather, cedar, white pepper and a touch of flint. Featuring velvety tannins, firm acidity and a lingering finish of rosemary, this chianti wine is well balanced on the palate. Each bottle of this Ruffino wine is made with a careful selection of the best grapes from the traditional Chianti Classico production region. Secondary malolactic fermentation enhances this wine's velvety texture. Riserva Ducale then ages for 24 months in oak, stainless steel and concrete vats and spends an additional three months in bottle before release. Pair a glass of this Italian red wine with favorites like prosciutto, mushroom risotto or chicken cacciatore. Store this red wine blend at room temperature, and serve at around 60 degrees for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: SIMI Reserve Russian River Valley Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: SIMI Reserve Russian River Valley Chardonnay White Wine is a California wine with tropical fruit and exotic spicy flavors and aromas. It pairs well with seared scallops, halibut or lobster bisque.
ProductDescLong: SIMI Reserve Russian River Valley Chardonnay White Wine wakes up the palate. Delicious warm flavors of vanilla, toast, stone fruit, pineapple, citrus, Granny Smith apple and red apple combine with hints of nutmeg and smoke. Each bottle of wine delivers exotic aromas of sandalwood and cardamom with toasted bread, orange zest, green apple, nougat, stone fruit, and minerals, with savory notes of smoke, lush cream and lovely tropical fruit. This California white wine begins with chardonnay grapes from the Goldfields Vineyard in the Russian River Valley. The grapes ferment in barrels, followed by malolactic fermentation, adding richness and creaminess. Aged in French oak barrels for 11 months, this chardonnay wine offers mouthwatering acidity, good structure and a lingering finish with notes of sweet tropical fruit and grilled pineapple, making it the silver medalist at the 2018 Press Democrat North Coast Wine Challenge. Enjoy this SIMI wine chilled with seared scallops, seared halibut or lobster bisque. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2020 SIMI Winery, Geyserville, CA
